tika-abh03t:11_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desento bhagavā yasmiṃ samaye desesi,
tika-abh03t:11_2: vibhaṅgānantaraṃ desitassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vā “aṭṭhārasahī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:11_6: maccumārassa ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā parūpanissayarahitaṃ niratisayaṃ taṃ bhañjanaṃ upādāya bhagavā eva “mārabhañjano”ti thomito.
tika-abh03t:12_1: abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vāti katvā tesaṃ kathanato imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathāti adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t:12_2: Yadipi aññesu ca pakaraṇesu te sabhāvā kathitā,
tika-abh03t:12_3: ettha pana tesaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīsu cuddasasu nayesu ekekasmiṃ kathitattā sātisayaṃ kathananti idameva evaṃnāmakaṃ.
tika-abh03t:12_5: Khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā khandhādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādayo nayā vuttāti tattha mahāvisayānaṃ
tika-abh03t:12_6: dhātūnaṃ vasena dhātūhi kathā dhātukathāti evaṃ assa nāmaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:12_7: Dvidhā tidhā chadhā aṭṭhārasadhāti anekadhā dhātubhedaṃ pakāsesīti dhātubhedappakāsanoti.
tika-abh03t:12_8: Tassatthanti tassā dhātukathāya atthaṃ. A- kāre ā-
tika-abh03t:12_10: “Yaṃ dhātukatha”nti vā ettha pakaraṇanti vacanaseso sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattāti
tika-abh03t:12_11: tena yojanaṃ katvā tassa pakaraṇassa atthaṃ tassatthanti a-
tika-abh03t:12_14: taṃ vā atthaṃ taṃdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho.
tika-abh03t:16_3: aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pakaraṇaparicchedo vutto evāti dassento āha “cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t:16_5: khandhādayo eva vā nīyanti ñāyanti etehi pakārehīti nayā,
tika-abh03t:16_8: Etesaṃ padānaṃ mūlabhūtattāti “mūlamātikā”ti vattabbānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ padānaṃ khandhādidhammavibhajanassa
tika-abh03t:18_2: paṭiccasamuppādavacanena ca yesu dvādasasu aṅgesu paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaddo vattati,
tika-abh03t:18_3: tadatthāni dvādasa padāni dassitānīti tesaṃ tathādassitānaṃ sarūpeneva dassitānaṃ phassādīnañca padānaṃ vasena āha “pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā”ti.
tika-abh03t:18_4: Tattha kammupapattikāmabhavādīnaṃ idha vibhattānaṃ bhāvanabhavanabhāvena bhave viya sokādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇassa
tika-abh03t:18_5: viya aniṭṭhattā tannidānadukkhabhāvena ca jarāmaraṇe antogadhatāya paṭiccasamuppādassa dvādasapadatā
tika-abh03t:18_7: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ bhinditvā avissajjitānampi satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ bhinditvā gahaṇaṃ karonto tesaṃ bhinditvāpi vissajjitabbataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:19_0: Nayamātikādikā lakkhaṇamātikantā mātikā pakaraṇantarāsādhāraṇatāya dhātukathāya mātikā nāma,
tika-abh03t:19_1: tassā abbhantare vutto vibhajitabbānaṃ uddeso abbhantaramātikā nāmāti imamatthaṃ pakāsento “ayañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:19_5: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca dhātukathāmātikāya abbhantareyevāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:19_6: Tadāveṇikamātikāabbhantare hi ṭhapitā tassāyeva abbhantare ṭhapitāti vuttā.
tika-abh03t:19_8: mātikā”ti etena vacanena dhātukathāto bahibhūtā kusalādiaraṇantā mātikā pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t:19_10: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca imassa pakaraṇassa abbhantare eva sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t:19_11: Sabbassa abhidhammassa mātikāya asaṅgahitattā vikiṇṇabhāvena pakiṇṇakatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:21_1: Nayānaṃ pavattidvārabhūtā saṅgahāsaṅgahaviyogīsahayogīdhammā nayamukhānīti tesaṃ uddeso nayamukhamātikā.
tika-abh03t:21_2: Cuddasapi hi saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogānaṃ vomissakatāvasena pavattāti yehi te cattāropi honti,
tika-abh03t:21_3: te dhammā cuddasannampi nayānaṃ mukhāni hontīti.
tika-abh03t:21_4: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadādīsu saccādīhipi yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgaho yadipi vutto,
tika-abh03t:21_7: sopi “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādinā pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhāre
tika-abh03t:21_11: Pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhārepi pana pucchāvissajjanesu ca rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-abh03t:22_3: Na hi rūpaṃ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:22_5: catūheva pana khandhehi hotīti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ rūpanibbānehi vippayogopi vippayujjamānehi catūhi khandhehi niyamito tehi vinā vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:22_9: sārammaṇassa sārammaṇena anārammaṇena missakena ca hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:24_5: catūhi vippayogo”ti etenapi visuṃ yojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh03t:24_6: Tena saṅgaho asaṅgaho ca sabhāgo visabhāgo ca bhāvo,
tika-abh03t:24_7: tathā sampayogo vippayogo cāti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-abh03t:24_8: Yassa vā saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca,
tika-abh03t:26_2: mātikā”ti etena ṭhapanākārena bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t:26_3: Etena vā ṭhapanākārena kusalādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ idha aṭṭhapetvā dhātukathāya mātikato bahi pakaraṇantaramātikāya
tika-abh03t:26_4: imassa pakaraṇassa mātikābhāvena ṭhapitattā tathā pakāsitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t:27_2: Saṅgahoti atthaṃ avatvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā.
tika-abh03t:27_3: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saddesu saṅgahasaddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhetthattho.
tika-abh03t:27_4: Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso sāmaññena gahetabbataṃ patto “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”tiādīsu “saṅgaho”ti vuttoti na koci doso.
tika-abh03t:27_5: Niddhārite hi visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā,
tika-abh03t:27_7: Jātisaddassa sāpekkhasaddattā “jātiyā saṅgaho”ti vutte “attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa
tika-abh03t:27_8: avuttattāti jātisaṅgahoti rūpakaṇḍe vutto sajātisaṅgaho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t:28_1: sampayogo vippayogo”ti ime dve pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaṃ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayauddesā,
tika-abh03t:28_3: “Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti hi “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahita”nti vattabbe ekassa asaṅgahitasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:28_7: Esa nayo tatiyādīsu dasamāvasānesu nayuddesesu chaṭṭhavajjesu.
tika-abh03t:28_8: Tesupi hi vuttanayena dvīhi dvīhi padehi pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ katvā tattha
tika-abh03t:28_13: Tattha hi sabhāvantarena sabhāvantarassa visesanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:28_15: Ekādasamādīsu pana catūsu ādipadeneva dhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ katvā itarehi pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh03t:28_17: Pucchāvissajjanānañhi nissayabhūtā dhammā saṅgahitatādivisesena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttavippayuttādibhāvaṃ attano visesentīti.
tika-abh03t:29_3: Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā,
tika-abh03t:29_5: Adhimokkho hi sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttānaṃ cittuppādānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vutto,
tika-abh03t:29_7: Tattha sādhāraṇā pasaṭā pākaṭā cāti ādito pariggahetabbā,
tika-abh03t:29_9: asādhāraṇāpi pana pariggahetabbāvāti tesu mahāvisayena aññesampi saṅgahādipariggahaṃ dassetuṃ adhimokkho uddiṭṭho.
tika-abh03t:29_10: “Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā”ti ca dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṃ paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:29_12: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇatoti pana atthe sati sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu vattabbesu yo asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayo adhimokkho,
tika-abh03t:29_13: tassa vasena vuttasabbacittuppādasādhāraṇato phassādayo sabbasādhāraṇāti adhimokkho ca asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayoti
tika-abh03t:29_14: katvā vutto aññassa tādisassa abhāvāti ayamadhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:30_0: Jīvitindriyaṃ panettha rūpamissakattā na vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:30_1: cittekaggatā pana asamādhisabhāvā sāmaññasaddeneva sāmaññavisesasaddehi ca samādhisabhāvā visesasaddavacanīyaṃ
tika-abh03t:30_2: aññaṃ byāpetabbaṃ nivattetabbañca natthīti anaññabyāpakanivattakasāmaññavisesadīpanato tasseva dhammassa
tika-abh03t:30_4: na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vuttalakkhaṇaviparītehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva,
tika-abh03t:30_5: tasmā “cittekaggatā”ti ayaṃ sāmaññasaddo samādhisabhāve visesasaddanirapekkho pavattamāno sayameva visesasaddamāpajjitvā
tika-abh03t:30_7: itaro ca samādhisabhāvamevāti dvidhā bhinnā cittekaggatā asādhāraṇā ceva appavisayā cāti idha uddesaṃ na arahati.
tika-abh03t:30_8: Abhinnāpi vā phassādīnaṃ viya pākaṭattābhāvato aññadhammanissayena vattabbato ca sā jīvitañca na arahatīti na uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t:35_2: tesaṃ pana sabhāvato abhiññātānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariññeyyatādivisesadassanatthaṃ saccāni,
tika-abh03t:35_3: adhipatiyādikiccavisesadassanatthaṃ indriyādīni ca vuttānīti saccādiviseso viya saṅgahāsaṅgahaviseso
tika-abh03t:35_4: ca abhiññeyyanissito vuccamāno suviññeyyo hotīti “tīhi saṅgaho.
tika-abh03t:35_6: Evañca katvā “catūhī”ti vuttā sampayogavippayogā ca abhiññeyyanissayena khandhādīheva pucchitvā vissajjitāti.
tika-abh03t:35_7: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenāti ye dhammā “rūpakkhandho”ti vuccanti,
tika-abh03t:35_8: tesaṃ pañcasu khandhesu rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hotīti rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena,
tika-abh03t:35_9: rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā gaṇanena saṅgahaṃ gaṇanaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:35_14: Pañcasu khandhagaṇanesu ekena khandhagaṇanena gaṇitoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh03t:36_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddeseti idaṃ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti etasseva nayassa ekadesanayabhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:36_2: Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā dassitāti etena vedanākkhandhamūlakā purimena yojiyamāne
tika-abh03t:36_3: viseso natthīti pacchimeheva yojetvā tayo dukā dve tikā eko catukko,
tika-abh03t:36_5: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlako eko dukoti ete labbhantīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:36_6: Tesaṃ pana bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantaraṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ saṃkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:36_7: vuttanayena vā sakkā ñātunti pāḷiṃ na āropitanti.
tika-abh03t:38_1: Yasmā ca dukatikesūti yadipi ekakepi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:38_2: ekake pana sadisavissajjanānaṃ cakkhundriyasotindriyasukhindriyādīnaṃ dukādīsu asadisavissajjanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-abh03t:38_5: idha pana dukkhasamudayadukkhamaggadukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ tikena ca sadisaṃ vissajjananti dukatikesveva sadisavissajjanataṃ
tika-abh03t:40_2: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhenā”ti likhitabbepi pamādavasena “avijjā ekena khandhenā”ti idaṃ na likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:40_3: Sarūpekasesaṃ vā katvā avijjāvacanena avijjāvissajjanaṃ dassitanti.
tika-abh03t:40_4: Sabbampi vipākaviññāṇanti ettha vipākaggahaṇena visesanaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:40_5: Kusalādīnampi hi viññāṇānaṃ dhātukathāyaṃ saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇādipadehi saṅgahitatā vippayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese
tika-abh03t:40_6: “vipākā dhammā”ti imassa vissajjanāsadisena tesaṃ vissajjanena dassitā,
tika-abh03t:40_7: idha ca nāmarūpassa ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgahavacanena akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t:41_3: tāni rūpassa nibbattipākabhedabhūtāni ruppanabhāvena gayhantīti rūpakkhandhadhammasabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t:41_7: tathā duvidhānipi tāni cakkhāyatanādīhi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni nissattaṭṭhena dhammāyatanadhammadhātudhammehi sabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t:41_8: tena tehi khandhādīhi saṅgayhantīti “jāti dvīhi khandhehī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:44_1: Saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese yaṃ taṃ uddese asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh03t:44_3: tadeva tāva dassento “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:44_4: Sabbattha khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññānaṃ niccaṃ visesāpekkhattā bhedanissitattā ca pucchāvissajjanānaṃ savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā suddhā.
tika-abh03t:44_5: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitavacanamattena dhammavisesassa niddhāritattā tīsu saṅgahesu ekena dvīhi vā ye saṅgahitā hutvā aññehi asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t:44_6: teyeva dhammā “khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:44_7: tesaṃ pana evaṃvidhānaṃ asambhavā nayamātikāya ca abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā uddesepi yaṃ yaṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu saṅgāhakaṃ,
tika-abh03t:44_8: taṃ taṃ apekkhitvā saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitaṃ niddhāritanti viññāyatīti tena tena saṅgāhakena yathāniddhāritaṃ
tika-abh03t:44_12: itaresu ca yaṃ yaṃ pucchitabbavissajjitabbaṃ niddhāritaṃ,
tika-abh03t:44_13: tassa tassa niyāmakabhāvena rūpakkhandhādayo araṇantā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t:45_3: Ettha ca yena yena saṅgāhakena khandhādisaṅgahesu tena tena saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṃ aññaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:45_5: Rūpakkhandhena pana khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbo añño dhammo natthi,
tika-abh03t:45_7: na ca so eva tassa saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako vā hoti.
tika-abh03t:45_9: tañca na tasseva tena saṅgahitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:45_10: rūpakkhandhabhāvena pana rūpakkhandhavacanena vā gahitataṃ sandhāya vuttanti pakāsitoyamattho.
tika-abh03t:46_0: Yadi ca so eva tena saṅgayheyya,
tika-abh03t:46_2: “vedanākkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t:46_3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā”tiādi vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t:46_5: tasmā yathā cittaṃ cittena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t:46_6: evaṃ rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hoti,
tika-abh03t:46_8: Na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti.
tika-abh03t:46_15: yena te samudāyassa samudāyo ca tesaṃ sabhāgo visabhāgo ca siyāti,
tika-abh03t:46_16: tathā na samudāyo ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānaṃ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca.
tika-abh03t:46_17: Yathā dhammāyatanaṃ sukhumarūpasabhāgassa vedanādivisabhāgassa ca rūpakkhandhekadesassa khandhasaṅgahena,
tika-abh03t:46_18: jīvitindriyaṃ rūpārūpajīvitasabhāgavisabhāgassa rūpakkhandhekadesassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesassa ca jīvitavajjassa khandhasaṅgaheneva.
tika-abh03t:46_21: tasmā satipi attato attani antogadhato attekadesasabhāgato ca aññassa asaṅgāhakatte saṅgāhakattameva etesaṃ natthi,
tika-abh03t:46_22: yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakā siyunti saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:47_0: Yaṃ pana “dhammāyatanaṃ asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti,
tika-abh03t:47_1: “cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena saṅgahita”nti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:47_4: catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehi pana dhammāyatanassa gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvena pañcadhā bhinnataṃ,
tika-abh03t:47_6: Saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhānaṃ gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbānaṃ taṃtaṃgaṇanehi gaṇanadassanamattameva hi paṭhamanayo kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t:47_7: dutiyādayo pana saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakehi saṅgahitāsaṅgahitānaṃ agaṇanādidassanāni kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā.
tika-abh03t:47_8: Tathā paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t:48_1: na saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahetabbanti asaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭāni.
tika-abh03t:48_2: Dukkhasaccasadisāni tehi visabhāgasamudāyabhūtehi anekakkhandhehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:48_4: Evaṃ saṅgāhakattābhāvato asaṅgāhakattābhāvato ubhayābhāvato ca yathāvuttasadisāni anuddharitvā saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattabhāvato
tika-abh03t:48_6: Tattha “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti cakkhāyatanavajjā rūpadhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti veditabbā,
tika-abh03t:49_3: Taṃ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjatīti taṃ vissajjanaṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu saṅgāhakesu na yujjatīti attho.
tika-abh03t:49_5: saṅgahitoti etena nayena cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito,
tika-abh03t:49_6: so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthīti evaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnipi na gahetabbānīti āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t:49_12: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahitoti yathā cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanato aññampi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:49_14: na evaṃ rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhato aññaṃ khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:49_16: rūpakkhandhena pana rūpakkhandhova khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitoti ayañhettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t:49_17: Siyā panetaṃ “so eva rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahito hotū”ti,
tika-abh03t:49_18: taṃ nivārento āha “so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t:49_20: Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhassa vā tadekadesānaṃ vā cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh03t:49_21: ca na hotīti iminā pariyāyena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti yujjati,
tika-abh03t:49_22: na rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhassa tadekadesānaṃ vā aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitatāya.
tika-abh03t:49_26: Tena hi tīhipi saṅgahehi rūpakkhandho tadekadeso vā saṅgahitā siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:50_1: aññāni cāti etthāpi cakkhāyatanādīhi viya etehi aññehi ca saṅgahitānaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni
tika-abh03t:50_2: aññāni ca yathā vā tathā vā etāni viya ayujjamānavissajjanattā evarūpāni padāni saṅgāhakabhāvena na gahitānīti
tika-abh03t:51_0: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito”ti,
tika-abh03t:51_3: tañca satipi saṅgahitatte asaṅgahitatāya abhāvatoti viññāyamānaṃ samudayasaccādīsu yujjeyya sati tehi saṅgahite tadasaṅgahitattābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:51_6: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvo evettha aggahaṇe kāraṇanti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:51_7: Saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṃ yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā attano attani antogadhassa attekadesasabhāgassa ca natthi,
tika-abh03t:51_8: aññassa pana atthīti na dukkhasaccādīsu viya ubhayābhāvo cettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttoti.
tika-abh03t:51_9: Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnañca khandhacatukkadukādisaṅgāhakatte sati na tesaṃ saṅgahitānaṃ tehi dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t:51_10: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitatā natthīti asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo anekantiko,
tika-abh03t:52_0: Anidassanaṃ punadeva sappaṭighanti ettha anidassananti etena “sanidassanasappaṭigha”nti ettha vuttena
tika-abh03t:52_2: Punadevāti etena tattheva avisiṭṭhaṃ sanidassanapadaṃ nivattetvā gaṇhanto sanidassanadukapadaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:52_3: “Cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanamevekaṃ saṅgahita”nti idaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:52_4: Na hi “cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanaṃ āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahita”nti ca “asaṅgahita”nti ca vattabbanti dassitoyaṃ nayoti.
tika-abh03t:52_5: Evaṃ sabbattha tasseva samudāyekadesānañca saṅgāhakasaṅgahitanti vacanesu asaṅgāhakaasaṅgahitanti vacanesu ca tadavattabbatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t:52_6: Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva hi cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhāyatanādīhi asaṅgahitānīti na vuccanti,
tika-abh03t:55_1: Asaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitesu vedanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:55_2: nibbānassa ca sukhumarūpena saha āyatanadhātusabhāgatte satipi na sukhumarūpameva rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t:55_4: tasmā na tena tāni āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitāni.
tika-abh03t:55_6: asaṅgahitānipi tena tāni tehi saṅgahehi na honteva tadekadesena sukhumarūpena āyatanadhātusabhāgattā,
tika-abh03t:55_8: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi pana asaṅgahitā na te tehi kathañci sammissāti sabbathā te tehi na saṅgahitā.
tika-abh03t:55_9: Dukkhasaccādīhi ca pañcakkhandhasamudāyabhūtehi khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitaṃ nibbānaṃ rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t:55_10: viya āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ tehi na hoti,
tika-abh03t:55_11: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṃ asaṅgāhakabhāvena aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:55_15: na ca attano ekadeso attekadesasabhāgo ca attanā asaṅgahito hotīti attanā asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā pana vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ katanti.
tika-abh03t:56_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti,
tika-abh03t:56_2: Dhammāyatanena hi na koci dhammo kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahito atthi visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā,
tika-abh03t:56_3: khandhasaṅgahena sayameva attano saṅgāhakaṃ na hotīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi ca saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti
tika-abh03t:56_4: dassitoyaṃ nayoti etassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena gaṇitāti attho. Yāni…pe…
tika-abh03t:56_5: gahitānīti etena viññāṇasammissaṃ dhammāyatanekadesaṃ dīpentāni iddhipādādipadāni,
tika-abh03t:56_8: sakaladhammāyatanadīpakāni dhammāyatanādipadāni ca vajjetvā dhammāyatanekadesaṃ aññāyatanena asammissaṃ dīpentāni gahitānīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:59_1: Saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese yasmā yathā dutiyatatiyanayā tiṇṇaṃ saṅgahānaṃ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇappavattivisesena “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh03t:59_4: Saṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh03t:59_6: tasmā saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe saṅgahitadhammāsaṅgahitadhammavisese nissitā ete dve nayāti ettha
tika-abh03t:59_7: kenaci saṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna saṅgahito dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito saṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo
tika-abh03t:59_9: tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṃ dassento “samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandha…pe…
tika-abh03t:59_13: Ettha ca ye tīhipi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhadhammāyatanadukkhasaccādīni viya,
tika-abh03t:59_14: ye ca dvīhāyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā cakkhāyatanādīni viya,
tika-abh03t:59_15: ye ca ekena khandhasaṅgaheneva dhātusaṅgaheneva ca na saṅgāhakā vedanādikkhandhanirodhasaccajīvitindriyādīni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viya ca,
tika-abh03t:59_16: te dhammā saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh03t:59_19: Tehi saṅgahitāpi hi ekantena attano saṅgāhakassa saṅgāhakā honti,
tika-abh03t:59_20: yassa puna saṅgaho pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo cāti.
tika-abh03t:60_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakalena hi khandhādipadenāti sakalavācakena rūpakkhandhādipadenāti attho.
tika-abh03t:60_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyyā”ti,
tika-abh03t:60_2: taṃ tena khandhādipadenāti evaṃ ayojetvā taṃ aññaṃ saṅgahitaṃ nāma natthīti evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:60_7: Yathā vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañca,
tika-abh03t:60_12: Yampi cetaṃ vuttaṃ “tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh03t:60_15: Na hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitassa saṅgahitena saṅgaho ettha pucchito vissajjito ca,
tika-abh03t:60_17: tasmā ekena khandhenāti ekena khandhagaṇanenāti ayamevettha attho,
tika-abh03t:60_19: Na hi eko khandho attano ekadesassa saṅgāhakoti.
tika-abh03t:63_3: satipi ekena dvīhi vā saṅgahehi kesañci asaṅgāhakatte tīhipi asaṅgahetabbassa abhāvato paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā na honti,
tika-abh03t:63_4: abyākatadhammasadisā kenaci saṅgahena asaṅgahetabbabhāvato asaṅgāhakā eva na honti,
tika-abh03t:64_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tādisena hi padena nibbānaṃ khandhasaṅgahamattaṃ na gaccheyyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:64_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṃ vasena samodhānetvā katehi saddhinti evaṃ katehi dutiyapañhādīhi saddhiṃ paṭhamapañhanāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh03t:64_12: saddena na taṃ kadāci saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ na hotīti uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāve niyatataṃ aññassa ca aniyatataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:64_13: “Tadeva yehi asaṅgahita”nti ettha hi “niyamato”ti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti.
tika-abh03t:64_14: Atha vā tadevāti pucchāya uddhaṭameva evaṃpakārameva hutvā yehi asaṅgahitanti tassa pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvena
tika-abh03t:64_17: Pucchāya uddhaṭañhi aññasahitaṃ asahitañca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:65_0: Avasesā saṅgahitāti idaṃ avasesā asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:65_1: Tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti pucchāya uddhaṭā tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā hutvā asaṅgahitāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:65_3: Ettha ca paṭhame naye vedanādayopi viññāṇena asaṅgahitāti vuttā,
tika-abh03t:65_5: Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti oḷārikarūpehi viññāṇena ca tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti attho.
tika-abh03t:66_1: Catutthapañhe cakkhāyatanaṃ vedanādīhi catūhīti ettha cakkhāyatananti etena pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ asaṅgāhakaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:66_2: Cakkhāyatanena pana asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitāni dasa oḷārikāyatanāni na cakkhāyatanamevāti.
tika-abh03t:66_3: “Rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādinā yehi dhammehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ taṃ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t:66_4: asaṅgahitena tena asaṅgahitañca viññāṇavajjaṃ sabbaṃ teva dhamme udāneti.
tika-abh03t:66_6: Tattha paṭhamena rūpakkhandhena sadisavissajjanesu ekato udānetvā dassitesu aññe visadisavissajjanā nayadānena dassitā honti.
tika-abh03t:66_11: Yena asaṅgāhakena asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca paricchijjati,
tika-abh03t:66_12: so rūpakkhandhādiko tassa pucchāvissajjanānañca nissayabhāvato “visayo”ti vutto,
tika-abh03t:69_3: taṃ sabbaṃ pucchāya gahitanti idaṃ na rūpakkhandhādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:69_5: Rūpakkhandhādīsu hi yaṃ dhammāyatanādipadaṃ na labbhati,
tika-abh03t:69_12: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṃ sampayogo nāma natthīti ekuppādādisabhāgatāya abhāvato sampayogaṃ nivārentena
tika-abh03t:69_13: sā eva ekuppādāditā etesaṃ visabhāgatāti tadabhāvato vippayogopi nivārito eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:69_14: Catūsu hi khandhesu vijjamānā ekuppādāditā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ sabhāgatā hoti rūpanibbānehi tesaṃ tehi ca rūpanibbānānaṃ visabhāgatā ca,
tika-abh03t:69_15: na ca rūpekadesassa nibbānassa vā sā ekuppādāditā atthi,
tika-abh03t:69_16: yā rūpekadesena rūpekadesanibbānānaṃ nibbānena ca rūpassa visabhāgatā siyā.
tika-abh03t:70_0: Sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutteti yathā rūpabhavo tīhi viññāṇadhātūhi,
tika-abh03t:70_2: avitakkaavicārā ekāya vippayutte anārammaṇamissake dhamme dīpenti,
tika-abh03t:70_3: evaṃ adīpetvā ekāyapi vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā dīpentīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:70_4: Avippayutteti hi ye vippayuttā na honti,
tika-abh03t:70_7: Tena yāni tāhi sampayutte dīpenti dhammāyatanādipadāni,
tika-abh03t:70_8: yāni ca sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṃ dīpenti acetasikādipadāni,
tika-abh03t:70_10: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ anārammaṇamissakadhammadīpakānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:70_11: Na hi anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātutaṃsampayuttatadubhayasamudāyānaṃ khandhāyatanadhātūsu kenaci sampayogo vippayogo vā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:71_0: Yadi evaṃ vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t:71_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:71_10: tasmā khandhādīni anāmasitvā vippayuttatāmattena yathāniddhāritadhammadassane kusalehi itaresaṃ,
tika-abh03t:71_11: itarehi ca kusalānaṃ vippayogo na na hoti visabhāgatāsabbhāvatoti tesaṃ aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t:72_0: Uddāne pana aṭṭhārasa tato pareti idaṃ “soḷasā”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:72_3: ekadesā samudayasaccavedanākkhandhādayo ekadesasammissā ca iddhipādādayo anārammaṇehi asammissā rūpakkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t:72_4: ca sārammaṇehi asammissā sampayogīvippayogībhāvena samānakālasantānehi ca ekadesantarehi vibhattā eva
tika-abh03t:72_5: gahitāti tehi te kehici ekadesantarehi vibhattehi yathāyogaṃ sampayogaṃ vippayogañca labhanti.
tika-abh03t:72_6: Atthi hi tesaṃ ekuppādāditā sabhāgatā visabhāgatā cāti.
tika-abh03t:72_7: Tena tattha tattha “ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutta”nti ca,
tika-abh03t:72_8: “ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:72_9: Bhinnakālasamudāyā eva pana vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā vattamānā ca ekekadhammā eva,
tika-abh03t:72_10: tasmā tesaṃ samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato na sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhassa vibhāgaṃ karonti,
tika-abh03t:72_13: “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena kehici vippayuttā”ti ca evamādi na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:72_14: khandhāyatanavibhāgavirahitampi pana viññāṇaṃ dhātuvibhāgena vibhattameva vuttanti “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe…
tika-abh03t:72_16: evamevaṃ indriyavibhāgena vibhattānaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ “sukhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu yathāyogaṃ vippayogo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t:73_1: Yathā taṃsampayogībhāvaṃ sandhāya “samudayasaccaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayutta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:73_2: evaṃ taṃvippayogībhāvaṃ sandhāya “tīhi khandhehi vippayutta”nti kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-abh03t:73_4: Vibhāge hi sati samudayasaccaṃ sukhadukkhadomanassindriyehi manoviññāṇadhātuto aññaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayuttanti
tika-abh03t:73_8: Yañhi anuppannā dhammā viya āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ na hoti saṅkhataṃ uddharitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:73_10: tañca vibhāgarahitehi khandhādīhi saṅkhatehi paccuppannabhāvameva nissāya anāmaṭṭhakālabhede atthitāya eva nissitabbattā.
tika-abh03t:73_14: vippayogo pana avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite teneva visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti hoti.
tika-abh03t:73_15: Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sati sabhāgatte vijjamānatāya eva dhammānaṃ
tika-abh03t:73_16: sabhāgassa paricchindanato vijjamānatā dassitāti ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātā sabhāgatāpi gahitā eva hoti.
tika-abh03t:74_1: “Dutiyajjhānavicārañhi ṭhapetvā sesā avitakkavicāramattā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ ye padhānā vitakko viya koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā,
tika-abh03t:74_2: te eva idha avitakkavicāramattāti adhippetāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:74_3: Teneva hi anantaranaye samudayasaccena samānagatikā na savitakkasavicārehīti te na gahitā.
tika-abh03t:74_4: Dasamosānanayesu ca tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ tehi vippayuttānañca soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo aṭṭhārasasaṅgahito ca vutto.
tika-abh03t:74_5: Vitakkasahitesupi pana tesu gahitesu sabbepi te vicārena sampayuttāti “ekena khandhena kehici sampayuttā”ti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:74_6: So hi samudāyo vicāraṃ vajjetvā aññena kenaci sampayutto na hoti.
tika-abh03t:74_7: Na hi tadekadesassa vitakkassa vicārato aññena sampayogo samudāyassa hoti.
tika-abh03t:74_8: Yathā nānācittuppādesu uppajjamānānaṃ iddhipādānaṃ samudāyassa iddhipādassa ekadesānaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo samudāyassa na hoti,
tika-abh03t:74_10: Yathā pana tesu ekopi vedanāsaññākkhandhehi saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena ca asampayutto nāma natthīti samudāyassa tehi sampayuttatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t:74_11: evamidhāpi vicārena asampayuttassa avitakkavicāramattassa kassaci abhāvato samudāyassa tena sampayuttatā na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:74_12: Na hi avitakkavicāramattānaṃ dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṃ viya sampayuttatā na vattabbā.
tika-abh03t:74_13: Yathā hi dassanenapahātabbahetukesu keci saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena mohena sampayuttā,
tika-abh03t:74_14: keci asampayuttāti na samudāyo tena sampayutto,
tika-abh03t:74_16: yena so samudāyo sampayutto siyāti “dassanenapahātabbahetukā dhammā sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:74_18: Na panevaṃ yena avitakkavicāramattasamudāyo sampayutto siyā,
tika-abh03t:74_19: taṃ natthi avitakkavicāramattesu kassaci vicārena asampayuttassa abhāvā,
tika-abh03t:74_21: Sabbattha ca ekadhammepi kehicīti bahuvacananiddeso saṅkhāya aniyamitattā katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:77_1: Sampayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo tehi sampayuttābhāvato na gahitā.
tika-abh03t:77_3: sampayuttehi ca vippayutte sampayuttenavippayuttānaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:77_4: Na hi samudayasaccena sampayuttehi lobhasahagatacittuppādehi vippayuttānaṃ tato aññadhammānaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo atthi.
tika-abh03t:77_5: Nanu ca te eva cittuppādā cattāro khandhā aḍḍhadutiyāni āyatanāni aḍḍhadutiyā dhātuyo ca hontīti tehi vippayogo vattabboti? Na,
tika-abh03t:77_7: Na hi te eva dhammā cattāro khandhā,
tika-abh03t:77_8: atha kho te ca tato aññe ca,
tika-abh03t:77_10: Na ca tadaññasamudāyehi aññe vippayuttā honti samudāyekadesānaṃ ekadesaññasamudāyānañca vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:77_12: Avitakkavicāramattesupi niravasesesu adhippetesu tesaṃ savitakkasavicārasamānagatikattā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati.
tika-abh03t:78_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evarūpānīti yathā rūpakkhandhe vissajjanaṃ na yujjati,
tika-abh03t:78_4: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme dīpentīti etena vedanākkhandhādipadāni dasseti,
tika-abh03t:78_6: Tattha aññena asammissanti asampayuttena asammissanti attho.
tika-abh03t:78_8: Etena ca lakkhaṇena evarūpāneva gahitānīti dasseti,
tika-abh03t:78_10: “Atha phassasattakaṃ cittaṃ saha yuttapadehi sattā”ti purāṇapāṭho,
tika-abh03t:78_12: tike tayo satta mahantare cā”ti pāṭho kato.
tika-abh03t:79_1: Pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṃ vippayuttānaṃ vasenāti idaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehi vippayuttā
tika-abh03t:79_2: tena saddhiṃ vippayuttā hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:79_4: vitakkavicāraṇāti manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā dve vitakkavicārāti savitakkapadaṃ savicārapadañca dasseti.
tika-abh03t:82_1: Vippayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādīhi vippayuttenasampayuttameva yathāniddhāritaṃ natthīti “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t:82_2: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā”ti avatvā “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t:82_5: Tena rūpakkhandhena vippayuttānaṃ kenaci khandhādinā sampayogābhāvato yathāniddhāritaṃ vippayuttenasampayuttameva natthi,
tika-abh03t:82_6: kuto tassa puna khandhādīhi sampayuttatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:85_6: taṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu yena vedanākkhandhādinā sampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:85_7: puna tasseva vedanākkhandhādino khandhādīhi sampayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t:85_8: Tañhi attanā sampayuttena sampayuttattā “sampayuttena sampayutta”nti niddhāritanti.
tika-abh03t:85_9: Rūpena vāti etena nirodhasaccaappaccayaasaṅkhatehipi ayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t:85_10: tathā rūpamissakehi vāti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi.
tika-abh03t:85_12: Sabbārūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehīti vattamānānameva sampayogo labbhatīti vattamānesu ekampi dhammaṃ anapanetvā
tika-abh03t:88_3: dukkhasaccacatumahābhavaabyākatādidhammā tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvatoti ayaṃ viseso veditabboti.
tika-abh03t:91_1: Ekādasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṃ “te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi ekena manāyatanena sattahi viññāṇadhātūhī”ti etesaṃ
tika-abh03t:91_3: “Kehicī”ti etassa panatthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇha”nti
tika-abh03t:91_4: etena “te cā”ti vutte samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitadhamme visesetvā tesaṃ eva visesitānaṃ
tika-abh03t:91_5: attavajjehi sesehi saṅkhārakkhandhe taṇhāya dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca taṇhāya vedanāsaññākkhandhehi
tika-abh03t:91_6: sampayogārahehi sampayuttataṃ sandhāyāha “sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāmā”ti.
tika-abh03t:94_0: 417. Dvādasamanaye ca navamanaye viya sampayogārahāva labbhantīti āha “teyeva uddhaṭā”ti.
tika-abh03t:97_1: Terasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṃ yehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t:97_2: te pāḷiyaṃ “rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādiuddānagāthāya dassitā bāvīsa dhammā “rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t:97_3: Yehi pana tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāni arūpabhavena viya oḷārikāyatanāneva honti,
tika-abh03t:97_4: te vuttāvasesā sabbe idha uddhaṭā “arūpabhavena sadisā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t:97_5: Sesāti sesā pañcamanaye āgatā vedanākkhandhādayo satipi asaṅgāhakatte idha vissajjanaṃ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh03t:97_6: Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā,
tika-abh03t:97_10: Tattha tesañca sampayogo nāma natthīti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ asampayogehi vomissatāya sampayogo natthīti attho.
tika-abh03t:98_0: Yadi pana te kadāci asabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttā arūpadhammā rūpadhammā ca siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:98_1: na tesaṃ vippayogo natthīti “vippayogo ca natthī”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:98_2: na vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṃ vippayogassa atthitāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:98_3: Ubhayābhāvato hi vedanākkhandhādayo idha na ruhantīti.
tika-abh03t:98_4: Evaṃ panettha siyā “vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena anārammaṇamissakā sattaviññāṇadhātudhammā asaṅgahitā honti,
tika-abh03t:98_7: tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitānaṃ sampayogavippayogābhāvo aruhaṇe kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t:101_2: Jātiādittayassa cettha dhammasabhāvamattattā na kathañci sampayogo vippayogo ca ruhati ajjhattabahiddhadhammānaṃ sabbadhammasamodhānattā,
tika-abh03t:101_4: Dukkhasaccādidhammāva idha tehi vippayuttānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahasabbhāvā gahitāti.
tika-abh03t:102_0: Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṃ samucchede na labbhantīti pariyosāne naye na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t:102_1: Moghapucchakena cāti alabbhamānā ca te moghapucchakena hetunā na labbhanti tesaṃ pucchāya moghattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:102_3: tena ca saha osānanaye ete dhammā vippayogassapi abhāvā sabbathāpi na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t:107_1: Dhammasaṅgahe tikadukavasena saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ vibhaṅge khandhādivibhāgaṃ dassetvā tathāsaṅgahitavibhattānaṃ
tika-abh03t:107_2: dhātukathāya saṅgahāsaṅgahādippabhedaṃ vatvā yāya paññattiyā tesaṃ sabhāvato upādāya ca paññāpanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:107_3: taṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ “cha paññattiyo”tiādinā puggalapaññatti āraddhā.
tika-abh03t:107_4: Tattha ye dhamme pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamāne asabhāvasamūhavasena upādāya “puggalo, itthī, puriso, devo,
tika-abh03t:107_6: tesaṃ aññesañca bāhirarūpanibbānānaṃ sasabhāvasamūhasasabhāvabhedavasena paññāpanā sabhāvapaññattīti khandhapaññattiādikā pañcavidhā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:107_7: Tāya dhammasaṅgahādīsu vibhattā sabhāvapaññatti sabbāpi saṅgahitā hoti.
tika-abh03t:107_9: Tāya ca samayavimuttādippabhedāya sattasantānagate pariññeyyādisabhāvadhamme upādāya pavattito padhānāya
tika-abh03t:107_10: “vihāro mañco”tiādikā ca sabbā asabhāvapaññatti saṅgahitā hoti.
tika-abh03t:108_0: Ettāvatā ca paññatti nāma vijjamānapaññatti avijjamānapaññatti ca.
tika-abh03t:108_1: Tā eva hi vomissā itarā catassoti.
tika-abh03t:108_2: Tasmā tāsaṃ dassanena imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sabbā paññattiyo dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:108_3: Khandhādipaññattīsu pana chasu aññattha adassitappabhedaṃ idheva ca dassitappabhedaṃ puggalapaññattiṃ
tika-abh03t:108_4: upādāya imassa pakaraṇassa puggalapaññattīti nāmaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:108_5: Ye dhamme idha paññapetukāmoti paññattiyā vatthubhāvena dassetukāmoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:108_6: Na hi etasmiṃ pakaraṇe paññāpanaṃ karoti,
tika-abh03t:109_0: Khandhāti paññāpanāti idaṃ khandhāti rūpaṃ pathavītiādikā sabbāpi sāmaññappabhedapaññāpanā nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t:109_2: Paññāpanāti etassa pana dassanā ṭhapanāti ete dve atthā,
tika-abh03t:109_5: aññātāvindriyaṃ samayavimutto”tiādinā idamevaṃnāmakaṃ idamevaṃnāmakanti taṃtaṃkoṭṭhāsikakaraṇaṃ bodhanameva nikkhipanā,
tika-abh03t:109_7: Yo panāyaṃ “nāmapaññatti hi dasseti ca ṭhapeti cā”ti kattuniddeso kato,
tika-abh03t:109_8: so bhāvabhūtāya karaṇabhūtāya vā nāmapaññattiyā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ diṭṭhatāya ṭhapitatāya ca taṃnimittataṃ sandhāya katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:110_11: te apanetvā tehi vinivattassa itthiādisabhāvassa abhāvato asambhūtassāti attho.
tika-abh03t:110_12: Yaṃ panetassa “tenākārena avijjamānassa aññenākārena vijjamānassā”ti atthaṃ keci vadanti,
tika-abh03t:110_15: Avijjamānepi sabhāve lokaniruttiṃ anugantvā anabhinivesena cittena “itthī,
tika-abh03t:110_17: Sābhinivesena pana cittena gayhamānaṃ pañcamasaccādikaṃ na sabhāvato,
tika-abh03t:110_20: labbhantīti imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sarūpato tissannaṃ āgatataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:111_0: Yathāvuttassa pana aṭṭhakathānayassa avirodhena ācariyavādā yojetabbā,
tika-abh03t:111_1: tasmā paññapetabbaṭṭhena cesā paññattīti etassa sabhāvato avijjamānattā paññapetabbamattaṭṭhena paññattīti attho.
tika-abh03t:111_2: Paññapetabbampi hi sasabhāvaṃ tajjaparamatthanāmalābhato na parato labhitabbaṃ paññattināmaṃ labhati,
tika-abh03t:111_3: nisabhāvaṃ pana sabhāvābhāvato na attano sabhāvena nāmaṃ labhatīti.
tika-abh03t:111_4: Sattotiādikena nāmena paññapitabbamattaṭṭhena paññattīti nāmaṃ labhati,
tika-abh03t:111_6: Na hi sasabhāvassa rūpādīhi ekattena aññattena vā anupalabbhasabhāvatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:112_2: Etasmiñca ācariyavāde anūnena lakkhaṇena bhavitabbanti sabbasamorodho kātabbo.
tika-abh03t:112_3: Dutiyaṃ tatiyanti evaṃpakārā hi upanidhāpaññatti upanikkhittakapaññatti ca saṅkhātabbappadhānattā chapi paññattiyo bhajatīti yuttaṃ vattuṃ,
tika-abh03t:112_4: itarā ca yathāyogaṃ taṃ taṃ paññattinti.
tika-abh03t:112_5: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ dve tīṇītiādi pana saṅkhā nāma kāci natthīti tāsaṃ upādāsantatipaññattīnaṃ avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ,
tika-abh03t:112_6: itarāsañca upanidhāpaññattīnaṃ yathānidassitānaṃ avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ maññamāno āha “sesā
tika-abh03t:112_8: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ dve tīṇītiādīnaṃ upanidhāupanikkhittakapaññattīnaṃ avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvameva maññati.
tika-abh03t:112_9: Yañhi paṭhamādikaṃ apekkhitvā yassa cekādikassa upanikkhipitvā paññāpīyati,
tika-abh03t:112_12: Na hi asīti āsītiko ca vijjamānoti.
tika-abh03t:113_2: Kāmoti pana okāse gahite avijjamānenavijjamānapaññatti esā bhavituṃ arahati,
tika-abh03t:113_4: Yathā pana vacanasaṅkhātāya vacanasamuṭṭhāpakacetanāsaṅkhātāya vā kiriyāya bhāṇakoti puggalassa paññatti
tika-abh03t:113_6: evaṃ kiso thūloti rūpāyatanasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānena puggalādīnaṃ paññāpanā vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh03t:113_8: Rūpaṃ phassotiādikā pana vijjamānapaññatti ruppanādikiccavasena kiccapaññattiyaṃ,
tika-abh03t:113_10: Vijjamānāvijjamānapaññattīsu ca vuttāsu tāsaṃ vomissatāvasena pavattā itarāpi vuttāyeva hontīti ayampi ācariyavādo sabbasaṅgāhakoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:114_5: evaṃ pāḷiyojanaṃ katvā saṅkhepappabhedavasena ayaṃ attho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:114_7: “khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti hi imassa attho “yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato pañcakkhandhāti vā”ti etena dassito,
tika-abh03t:114_11: Tena avuttopi sabbo saṅgahito hotīti “tatrāpi rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:114_13: “yāvatā”ti idaṃ sabbehi padehi yojetvā yattakā pañcakkhandhā,
tika-abh03t:114_15: Yattako pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ tappabhedānañca rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ pabhedo,
tika-abh03t:114_16: tattako khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattiyā pabhedoti pakaraṇantare vuttena vatthubhedena khandhapaññattiyā pabhedaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:119_2: Yena hi saddhintiādinā paṭhamaṃ samaṅgibhāvatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh03t:119_3: Phassenapi phuṭṭhāyeva nāmāti etena “apicesā”tiādinā vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ samphassena phusanatthaṃ,
tika-abh03t:119_7: Ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammāti ettha vedanāsomanassindriyāni saṅgahitānīti āha “cattāro khandhā hontī”ti.
tika-abh03t:119_8: Evaṃ sati vedanāsomanassindriyehi sukhassa phusitabbattā tiṇṇañca tesaṃ anaññattā teneva tassa phusanā āpajjatīti?
tika-abh03t:119_11: Atha vā ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgānīti aṅgānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t:119_12: Tesu pana paccekampi yojanā kātabbā “vitakkaṃ ṭhapetvā”tiādinā.
tika-abh03t:119_13: Tattha “sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti imissā yojanāya sesā tayo khandhā honti,
tika-abh03t:119_15: Sabbayojanāsu ca tayo anto katvā “cattāro khandhā hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:120_1: Yo asamayavimokkhena ekaccehi āsavehi vimutto asamayavimokkhūpanissayalābhena ca sātisayena samayavimokkhena,
tika-abh03t:120_3: So hi tena vimutto jhānalābhī sekkho rūpārūpabhavato apunarāvaṭṭako kāmarāgādīhi tathāvimuttova hotīti samayavimuttapaññattiṃ laddhuṃ arahati.
tika-abh03t:120_4: Puthujjano pana jhānalābhī punarāvaṭṭakadhammo puna kāmarāgādisamudācārabhāvato vimutto nāma na hotīti samayavimuttapaññattiṃ nārahati,
tika-abh03t:120_9: Tasmā tassa na aṭṭha vimokkhā samayavimuttapaññattibhāvassa asamayavimuttapaññattibhāvassa vā kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t:121_1: Arūpakkhandhanibbānamattavācako arūpasaddo na hotīti dassanatthaṃ “rūpato añña”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:121_3: Abhiññādīnañhi dhammānaṃ pādakabhāvena samādhi mañjūsāsadiso hoti.
tika-abh03t:121_6: “Sammajjitabba”nti cintetvā tattha ādarassa akatattā vattabhedoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:121_7: Evaṃ vattabhedamattena naṭṭhā pana samāpatti kāmacchandādīhi naṭṭhā viya na kiñcena paccāharitabbā hoti mandapāripanthakattā,
tika-abh03t:122_1: Attano anurūpena pamādena vītināmentānampi samāpatti na kuppatīti parihīno nāma na hoti,
tika-abh03t:122_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ byāsaṅge paṭisaṃhaṭamatte samāpajjituṃ samatthatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:122_9: appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā adhigatā,
tika-abh03t:122_10: tesāhamassa lābhasakkārasilokaṃ antarāyāya vadāmī”ti sutte pana samayena samayaṃ āpajjanena pariharitabbānaṃ
tika-abh03t:122_11: samāpattisukhavihārānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ byāsaṅgakāle anipphattito lābhasakkārasiloko antarāyoti vuttoti
tika-abh03t:123_3: Idha hi tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyyāti dhammehi puggalassa parihānampi aparihānampi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:123_4: Tattha ca puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyunti dhammānaṃ kuppanaṃ akuppanañca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:123_5: puggalassa pana parihānadhammānameva vināsoti vacananānattamattena vacanatthanānattamattena vā pariyāyantaratā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:126_1: Arahattamaggaṭṭho ca vaṭṭabhayato paññubbegena ubbijjanto uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanehi uparatoti bhayūparato nāmāti āha “satta sekkhā bhayūparatā”ti.
tika-abh03t:127_1: Bhavaṅgapaññāvirahitā “vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā”ti iminā gahitāti tihetukapaṭisandhikā keci “duppaññā”ti
tika-abh03t:127_3: Paññāya hi vinā na tadupanissayo atthīti.
tika-abh03t:128_2: tattheva niyatadhammā hontīti uttarakurūsu tadabhāvā niyato nāma natthīti dassento “yā pana uttarakurukāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:129_5: Pariyādakassa maggassa phalassa ca ārammaṇaṃ saṅkhārasīsaṃ saṅkhāravivekabhūto nirodhoti pariyādiyitabbānaṃ
tika-abh03t:129_6: pariyādakaphalārammaṇānaṃ saha viya saṃsiddhidassanena samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ terasa
tika-abh03t:129_8: Idha pana “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā”ti vacanato tesu kilesapavattasīsānameva
tika-abh03t:129_10: Tattha pavattasīsampi vaṭṭato vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi pariyādiyati,
tika-abh03t:129_12: tāva pavattisabbhāvato “pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyatī”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:129_13: Kilesapariyādānena pana attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-abh03t:129_14: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vacanato hi paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ samāpitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh03t:129_15: Taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti,
tika-abh03t:129_16: teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca hotīti imāya vāracutisamatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ apubbācarimatā hotīti āha “vārasamatāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t:129_17: Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatīti ettha parinibbānacittameva bhavaṅgotaraṇabhāvena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:132_3: sā ca āgamanavasena siddhā sātisayā tevijjatāti āha “āgamanīyameva dhura”nti.
tika-abh03t:133_3: Tattheva hi sabbaññutaṃ patto nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t:134_0: 23. Ananussutesu dhammesūti ca ananussutesu saccesūti attho.
tika-abh03t:135_1: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā “yato kho, ānanda,
tika-abh03t:135_2: bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
tika-abh03t:135_3: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-abh03t:135_6: taṃ pana ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭhavasena vuttanti idha kīṭāgirisuttavasena sabbaubhatobhāgavimuttasaṅgahatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:135_10: ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
tika-abh03t:135_12: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-abh03t:135_15: puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti arūpasamāpattivasena cattāro ubhatobhāgavimuttā vuttā,
tika-abh03t:136_0: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti na āsavā paññāya passanti,
tika-abh03t:136_1: dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā disvā parikkhīṇāti vuttā.
tika-abh03t:136_2: Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ purimakiriyā hotīti.
tika-abh03t:136_3: Nāmanissitako esoti eso ubhatobhāgavimutto rūpato muccitvā nāmaṃ nissāya ṭhito puna tato muccanato “nāmanissitako”ti
tika-abh03t:136_4: vatvā tassa ca sādhakaṃ suttaṃ vatvā “kāyadvayato suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti āhāti attho.
tika-abh03t:136_5: Sutte hi ākiñcaññāyatanalābhino upasīvabrāhmaṇassa bhagavatā nāmakāyā vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimuttoti muni akkhātoti.
tika-abh03t:137_2: tatiyattheravāde dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh03t:137_4: kilesavikkhambhanasamucchedanehi vā kāyadvayato vimuttoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:137_5: Arūpāvacaraṃ pana nāmakāyato ca vimuttanti nīvaraṇasaṅkhātanāmakāyato vimuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:137_6: Tañhi nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena nāmakāyato rūpataṇhāvikkhambhanena rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ekadesena ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ
tika-abh03t:137_7: nāma hotīti arahattamaggassa pādakabhūtaṃ ubhatobhāgavimuttanāmalābhassa kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:138_1: Etesu hi ekopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī na hotīti ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ rūpakāyato vimuttaṃ ekampi vimokkhaṃ anadhigatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:138_2: Arūpāvacaresu hi ekampi adhigato ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvakāraṇapaṭilābhato aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena tena
tika-abh03t:139_6: Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto,
tika-abh03t:139_7: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-abh03t:139_9: Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti,
tika-abh03t:139_10: tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati,
tika-abh03t:139_11: na tu vimuttoti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-abh03t:140_1: Diṭṭhattā pattoti etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:140_3: dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:140_4: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti.
tika-abh03t:141_1: Imaṃ pana nayaṃ “no”ti paṭikkhipitvāti ettha diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttabhāvappattānaṃ paññānānattaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:141_2: na pana yena visesena so viseso patto,
tika-abh03t:141_3: so vuttoti imaṃ dosaṃ disvā paṭikkhepo katoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:141_4: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsūti ca vacanena āgamanīyanānattasanniṭṭhānameva thiraṃ karotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:141_5: Saddahanto vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:142_1: Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññaṃ sātisayaṃ pavattetīti attho.
tika-abh03t:142_2: Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti attho.
tika-abh03t:143_3: nanu ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato maggakkhaṇe eva hotīti tadā eva sotāpanno nāmāti āpannanti? Nāpannaṃ.
tika-abh03t:143_4: Maggena hi attanā sadisassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā sattaṅgikassa vā phalassa sototi nāmaṃ dinnanti tenapi samannāgatassa sotāpannabhāvato,
tika-abh03t:143_5: sotena vā maggena pavattetuṃ aparihīnena phalaṭṭhopi samannāgato eva nāma,
tika-abh03t:143_6: na ca tena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe viya soto samāpajjiyamāno,
tika-abh03t:143_7: tasmā samāpannasotattā paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya “sotāpanno”ti vattuṃ yutto.
tika-abh03t:143_14: Tattha dutiyaphalaṭṭhādīnaṃ visuṃ nāmaṃ atthīti paṭhamaphalaṭṭho eva itarehi visesiyamāno “sotāpanno”ti vattuṃ yuttoti so eva idhādhippeto.
tika-abh03t:143_15: Paṭiladdhamaggena bujjhatīti etena paṭiladdhamaggassa catusaccapaccavekkhaṇādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:143_16: Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo etassāti hi sambodhiparāyaṇoti.
tika-abh03t:143_17: Dutiyenatthena sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ gati etassāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-abh03t:144_0: 32. Kevalena kulasaddena mahākulameva vuccatīti āha “mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho”ti.
tika-abh03t:145_2: Ihaṭṭhakanijjhānikavaseneva imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathitāti sajjhānako ajjhattasaṃyojanasamucchede akatepi anāgāmisabhāgo
tika-abh03t:145_4: heṭṭhā upari ca saṃsaraṇako kāmabhavagato hīnajjhānako idha gaṇanūpagoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:146_0: 34. Yaṃ vattabbanti “dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo veditabbo”tiādi yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:147_1: Upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannaṃ vā etena puggalena hoti,
tika-abh03t:147_3: Appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ tassa puggalassa vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:147_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “appatvā pabbataṃ nadī”ti viya āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ vā hutvāti parasaddayoge
tika-abh03t:147_6: parato bhūto hutvā saddo vacanasesabhūto payuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:149_5: Avihesu uddhaṃsoto yadipi tattha parinibbāyī na hoti,
tika-abh03t:149_6: yattha vā tattha vā gantvā parinibbāyatu,
tika-abh03t:149_7: parinibbāyino pana tassa asaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā ca atthīti tattha dasa anāgāmino vuttā,
tika-abh03t:149_11: na uppajjitvāva nibbāyanakādīhi adhimattatā viya samuddaṃ patvā nibbāyanakato anadhimattatā viya ca antarā
tika-abh03t:150_0: No cassa no ca me siyāti avijjāsaṅkhārādikaṃ hetupañcakaṃ no ca assa,
tika-abh03t:150_1: viññāṇādikaṃ idaṃ phalapañcakaṃ vattamānaṃ no ca me siyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:150_2: Tena atītabhavasaṃsiddhito dukkhasamudayato imassa dukkhassa pavattidassanato paccayasamudayaṭṭhena khandhānaṃ udayadassanapaṭipatti vuttā hoti.
tika-abh03t:150_4: na me bhavissatīti yadi etarahi hetupañcakaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-abh03t:150_5: anāgate phalapañcakaṃ na me bhavissatīti attho.
tika-abh03t:150_7: etarahi anāgate ca attattaniyanivāraṇavasena suññatāpaṭipatti vā catūhipi vuttā.
tika-abh03t:150_9: Bhūtanti sasabhāvaṃ nibbattaṃ vā yathādiṭṭhaudayabbayaṃ yathādiṭṭhasuññataṃ vā khandhapañcakaṃ parikappitaitthipurisasattādibhāvarahitaṃ
tika-abh03t:150_11: Vivaṭṭānupassanāya vivaṭṭamānaso taṃ bhūtaṃ pajahāmīti upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh03t:151_1: sambhave na rajjatīti avisiṭṭhe visiṭṭhe ca bhave na rajjatīti keci vadanti.
tika-abh03t:151_3: anāgato jātiyā gahaṇena gahito sambhavoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:151_6: tasmiṃ dvaye na rajjatīti sekkhapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:151_7: Bhūte hi sasambhave ca virāgo sekkhapaṭipatti.
tika-abh03t:151_10: bhūtamidanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
tika-abh03t:151_16: disvā nirodhadhammassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-abh03t:151_18: Athuttarīti atha evaṃ arajjamāno uttari santaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ anukkamena maggapaññāya sammā passati,
tika-abh03t:151_19: tañca khvassa padaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ catutthamaggeneva sacchikātabbassa tassa tena asacchikatattā.
tika-abh03t:154_1: Kassaci kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kassaci kathañci avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayoti ajjhattaṃ nāma.
tika-abh03t:155_2: Anāgatampi payojanaṃ apekkhamāno purimaggahitaṃ taṃ kataṃ upādāya kataññū eva nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t:155_4: Tamojotiparāyaṇo puññaphalaṃ anupajīvanto eva puññāni karotīti “pubbakārī”ti vutto.
tika-abh03t:155_5: “Iṇaṃ demī”ti saññaṃ karotīti evaṃsaññaṃ akarontopi karonto viya hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:156_1: Acchamaṃsaṃ labhitvā sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyatīti acchamaṃsanti jānantopi sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyati,
tika-abh03t:160_4: Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ pāpako ājīvo”ti vuttehi samannāgamena.
tika-abh03t:160_6: evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hotīti evaṃ sāsaṅko samācāro hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:162_1: Samādhi vā ādīti lokuttaradhammā hi paramatthato sāsananti tadattho pādakasamādhi tassa ādi vutto,
tika-abh03t:163_1: Ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabboti ucchaṅgasadisapaññatāya eva paññā viya puggalopi ucchaṅgo viya hoti,
tika-abh03t:165_1: Ciraṭṭhānato thiraṭṭhānato ca pāsāṇalekhasadisā parāparādhanibbattā kodhalekhā yassa so pāsāṇalekhūpamasamannāgato pāsāṇalekhūpamoti vutto,
tika-abh03t:166_0: 118. Sutādivatthurahito tucchamāno naḷo viyāti “naḷo”ti vuccati, so uggato naḷo etassāti unnaḷo.
tika-abh03t:167_1: “Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ sīlakathābhavanaṃ paṭhamārambhopi dussīlena saha na hotīti dassento āha neva sīlakathā hotī”ti.
tika-abh03t:168_1: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ anuggahetabbe paññāya sodhetabbe ca vaḍḍhetabbe ca adhikasīlaṃ nissāya uppannapaññāya anuggaṇhāti nāmāti attho.
tika-abh03t:169_0: 124. Gūthakūpo viya dussīlyanti etena dussīlyassa gūthasadisattameva dasseti.
tika-abh03t:170_1: No ca sammā paññapetuṃ sakkontīti yebhuyyena na sakkontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:170_2: uppanne tathāgate tasmiṃ anādariyaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ uppādetuṃ vāyamantassa asamatthabhāvaṃ vā.
tika-abh03t:173_1: Parena kataṃ dussīlyaṃ āṇattiyā attanā ca payogena katanti āṇattiyā pāpassa dāyādo “tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo”ti vutto.
tika-abh03t:175_2: Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhaṭavelāya saddhiṃ tasmiṃ kāle anatikkante evāti attho.
tika-abh03t:176_2: “Katamo loko”ti vutte “pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti mahantaṃ atthaṃ saṅgahitvā ṭhitavacanaṃ atthayuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:179_1: Puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatāti puggale abhikkamanādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatāti attho,
tika-abh03t:179_2: ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādinā puggalassa sadisatāti vā sadisābhikkamanāditāti attho.
tika-abh03t:180_2: Pāṇātipātena dussīlaṃ adinnādānena dussīloti avatvā pāṇātipātenevāti vadanto tacchaṃ bhāsati nāma.
tika-abh03t:180_6: so kīdisoti dassanatthaṃ “kālaññū hotī”tiādi vuttanti dassento “yamidaṃ kālenāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:181_6: Kulasampattiyādīhi jotamāno ca joti viyāti joti.
tika-abh03t:182_1: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇāpi yehi kilesehi vimutto avimutto ca,
tika-abh03t:182_2: tesaṃ dassanavasena vimuttidassanameva hotīti āha “vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇa”nti.
tika-abh03t:183_1: Yāni kānici tantāvutānanti tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ yāni kānici vatthānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:184_1: Tattha sikkhanabhāvenāti sikkhāya sājīve ca sikkhanabhāvena.
tika-abh03t:184_3: Sājīvañca avītikkamantoti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ avītikkamanto hutvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:184_6: Tato hi yāva maggā saṃvarapāripūrī hotīti.
tika-abh03t:184_8: Haliddirāgo viya na thirakatho hotīti ettha kathāya aṭṭhitabhāvena haliddirāgasadisatā veditabbā,
tika-abh03t:185_3: Aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattananti dasagghanakaṃ vatthayugaṃ dassetvā tassa ajānantassa pañcagghanakassa dānaṃ.
tika-abh03t:187_1: Khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattā vipassanā maggaphalalābhena paṭiladdhā nāma hoti tadalābhena anavaṭṭhānatoti
tika-abh03t:187_3: maggaphalañāṇameva ca adhikapaññābhāvato catusaccadhamme sabbadhammassa vare nibbāne eva vā visiṭṭhadassanabhāvato
tika-abh03t:188_0: 189. Sutena anupapannoti yathāsutena vā atthena vā na samannāgatoti attho.
tika-abh03t:191_1: Paṭhamapañcake uddeseneva puggalavibhāgo viññāyatīti yathā tesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:191_4: Phaluppattiyā maggakiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti “maggakiccavasena phalameva vutta”nti āha.
tika-abh03t:192_2: dassanasavanapaṭivacanadānavasena mukhena viya pavattaṃ gahaṇaṃ mukhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:192_4: gahaṇatthaṃ pakatimukhameva vā ādheyyaṃ yassa so ādheyyamukho,
tika-abh03t:192_5: avicāretvā ādikathāya eva ṭhapitagahaṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:194_1: Gavā khīraṃ aggamakkhāyatīti na evaṃ sambandho,
tika-abh03t:194_2: uppattito pana pañca gorase dassetvā tesu sappimaṇḍassa aggabhāvadassanatthaṃ “gavā khīra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:197_1: Chakke ekantato pākaṭā sammāsambuddhādayo te yathāvuttaguṇā puggalāti dassento “sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:197_2: Tattha tenāti sāmaṃ saccābhisamayo tattha ca sabbaññutappattibalesu ca vasibhāvappattīti etena sabbena samuditena.
tika-abh03t:197_3: “Sabbaññutaññāṇenā”ti pana vutte sabbamidaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti sāmaṃ saccābhisamayena balesu ca vasibhāvappattiyā ca vinā sabbaññutaññāṇassa abhāvā,
tika-abh03t:197_5: Tattha anācariyakena attanā uppāditenāti vacanena sabbaññutaññāṇassa sācariyakattaṃ parato uppattiñca paṭisedheti,
tika-abh03t:197_7: Na hi taṃ tādisaṃ nivāretabbaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh03t:200_1: Saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjatīti etena kusalesu dhammesu antogadhā,
tika-abh03t:200_2: bodhipakkhiyadhammesu vā adhimokkhabhūtā saddhā sādhūti ummujjamānaṃ kusalaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t:200_4: Kusalesu dhammesūti ettha bhummaniddeso tadantogadhatāya tadupakāratāya vā veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:200_5: Ettha ca ummujjati sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesūtiādinā saddhādīnaṃ ummujjanapaññāya saddhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:200_6: Teneva “tassa sā saddhā neva tiṭṭhatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:200_7: “Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesū”ti vā ummujjanassa upakārakaṃ ānisaṃsadassanaṃ vatvā “ummujjatī”ti etena
tika-abh03t:200_10: Ekakammanibbattā paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisantati eko cittavāroti cutito anantaro yathāgahito dutiyo hotīti āha “dutiyacittavārenā”ti.
tika-abh03t:200_11: Ummujjitvā ṭhitādayo cattāro tāya tāya jātiyā arahattaṃ asacchikarontā aneke puggalā veditabbā,
tika-abh03t:200_12: sacchikaronto pana ekopi pubbabhāge tatiyapuggalādibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā ante sattamapuggalo hotīti.
tika-abh03t:203_2: pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhāti ettha ye sotāpannādayo rūpārūpabhave upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tika-abh03t:203_3: te idha vihāya niṭṭhāpakkhaṃ bhajamānāpi ajjhattasaṃyojanānaṃ asamucchinnattā puthujjanasādhāraṇe ca ṭhāne upapattiyā na gahitā.
tika-abh03t:203_4: Asādhāraṇaṭṭhānuppattivasena pana antarāparinibbāyīādayo eva “idha vihāya niṭṭhā”ti vuttāti veditabbāti.
tika-abh03t:208_0: Kathānaṃ vatthubhāvatoti kathāsamudāyassa pakaraṇassa attano ekadesānaṃ okāsabhāvaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t:210_0: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti parinibbānameva parinibbānassa parinibbānantarato visesanatthaṃ karaṇabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:210_1: Yāya vā nibbānadhātuyā adhigatāya pacchimacittaṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-abh03t:210_9: laddhiyā suttantehi liṅgākappehi ca visadisabhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
tika-abh03t:211_1: Aññatra saṅgahitātiādīsu dīghādīsu aññatra saṅgahitato suttantarāsito taṃ taṃ suttaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā aññatra akariṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:211_2: Saṅgahitato vā aññatra asaṅgahitaṃ suttaṃ aññatra katthaci akariṃsu,
tika-abh03t:211_5: Vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasūti vinaye ca avasesapañcanikāyesu ca.
tika-abh03t:212_2: Upekkhāvedanā hi santasmiṃ paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatāti ayañhettha pariyāyo.
tika-abh03t:212_5: vedanā sukhā dukkhā upekkhā vedanā”tiādi nippariyāyadesitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:212_11: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse”tiādikaṃ aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
tika-abh03t:212_12: “Natthi devesu brahmacariyavāso”tiādikaṃ suttañca aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ atthañca aññaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:212_13: “Atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādi byañjanacchāyāya saṇhasukhumaṃ suññatādiatthaṃ bahuṃ vināsayuṃ.
tika-abh03t:213_0: Vinayagambhīranti vinaye gambhīrañca ekadesaṃ chaḍḍetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:213_1: Kilesavinayena vā gambhīraṃ ekadesaṃ suttaṃ chaḍḍetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:213_5: ekacce sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti āha “atthuddhāraṃ abhidhammaṃ chappakaraṇa”nti.
tika-abh03t:213_6: Kathāvatthussa savivādattepi avivādāni chappakaraṇāni paṭhitabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:213_8: Tatiyasaṅgītito vā pubbe pavattamānānaṃ vasena “chappakaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:213_10: Nāmanti yaṃ buddhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ na hoti mañjusirītiādikaṃ,
tika-abh03t:214_0: Saṅkantikassapikena nikāyena vādena vā bhinnā saṅkantikāti attho.
tika-abh03t:214_1: Saṅkantikānaṃ bhedā suttavādī anupubbena bhijjatha bhijjiṃsūti attho.
tika-abh03t:214_3: tena abhinnena theravādena saha aṭṭhārasa hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:214_4: Bhinnavādenāti vā bhinnāya laddhiyā aṭṭhārasa honti,
tika-abh03t:214_8: Therānaṃ ayanti thero. Ko so? Vādo.
tika-abh03t:221_2: Abhūtena maṇiudakādiākārena gayhamānā māyāmarīciādayo abhūtaññeyyākārattā asaccikaṭṭhā.
tika-abh03t:221_6: Anussavādivasena gayhamāno tathāpi hoti aññathāpīti tādiso ñeyyo na paramattho,
tika-abh03t:222_0: Chalavādassāti atthīti vacanasāmaññena atthīti vuttehi rūpādīhi sāmaññavacanassāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:222_2: laddhiṃ gahetvā āmantāti paṭijānātī”ti vacanato pana “chalavādassā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:222_7: tathā anupalabbhanīyato na tava vādo tiṭṭhatīti nivattentoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:222_8: Taṃ sandhāyāti “yo saccikaṭṭho”ti ettha vutto yo saccikaṭṭho,
tika-abh03t:222_9: so sappaccayādibhāvena dīpito “rūpañca upalabbhatī”tiādīsu āgato dhammappabhedoti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:223_1: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthākārena upalabbhamānaṃ saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhamānaṃ nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t:223_2: Aññathā tatoti tassa tenākārenāti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:223_4: Purimapucchāya sattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo yathā bhūtena sabhāvatthena upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t:223_6: Idha pana bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbhamāno so dhammappabhedo yena ruppanādisappaccayādiākārena upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t:223_7: kiṃ tenākārena puggalopi upalabbhatīti esa viseso.
tika-abh03t:223_8: Yathā pana rūpaṃ viya bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbhamānā vedanā na ruppanākārena upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t:223_9: evaṃ dhammappabhedo viya bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbhamāno puggalo na ruppanādisappaccayādiākārena upalabbhatīti
tika-abh03t:223_10: sakkā paravādinā vattunti acodanīyaṃ etaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:223_11: Avajānanañca tassa yuttanti niggaho ca na kātabbo.
tika-abh03t:223_12: Dhammappabhedato pana aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā dhammappabhedākāreneva codeti.
tika-abh03t:223_14: Anujānanāvajānanapakkhā sāmaññavisesehi paṭiññāpaṭikkhepapakkhā anulomapaṭilomapakkhā paṭhamadutiyanayāti ayametesaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:224_0: “Tena vata re vattabbe”ti vadanto vattabbassa avacane dosaṃ pāpetīti iminā adhippāyena “niggahassa pāpitattā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:224_1: “Evametaṃ niggahassa ca anulomapaṭilomato catunnaṃ pāpanāropanañca vuttattā upalabbhatītiādikaṃ anulomapañcakaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:224_2: anulomapaṭilomato pana dvīhi ṭhapanāhi saha sattakena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:224_4: Yaṃ pana vakkhati “ṭhapanā nāma paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato ‘ayaṃ tava doso’ti dassetuṃ ṭhapanamattameva hoti,
tika-abh03t:224_5: na niggahassa vā paṭikammassa vā pākaṭabhāvakaraṇa”nti.
tika-abh03t:224_7: Yathā pana tattha paṭikammapañcakabhāvaṃ avatvā paṭikammacatukkabhāvaṃ vakkhati,
tika-abh03t:224_9: Suddhikaniggahassa pana niggahappadhānattā uddesabhāvena vutto niggahova visuṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:224_10: Ye pana “ayathābhūtaniggahattā tattha paṭikammaṃ visuṃ na vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh03t:224_11: tesaṃ dutiye vādamukhe niggahacatukkabhāvo paṭikammapañcakabhāvo ca āpajjati.
tika-abh03t:225_1: Attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhamevāti sammutisaccaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:225_2: Vakkhati hi “suddhasammutisaccaṃ vā paramatthamissakaṃ vā sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya ‘yo saccikaṭṭho’ti puna anuyogo paravādissā”ti.
tika-abh03t:225_3: Tattha yadi paravādinā attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭho sammutisaccaṃ,
tika-abh03t:225_4: sammutisaccākārena puggalo upalabbhatīti vadantena samānaladdhiko nappaṭisedhitabbo,
tika-abh03t:225_6: Atha sakavādinā attanā ca adhippetasaccikaṭṭhaṃyeva sandhāya paravādī “yo saccikaṭṭho”tiādimāhāti ayamattho.
tika-abh03t:225_9: puna “sammutisaccaparamatthasaccāni vā ekato katvāpi evamāhā”ti na vattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh03t:225_11: saccikaṭṭhekadesena upaladdhiṃ icchantena “puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”tiādi anuyogo na kātabbo,
tika-abh03t:225_13: Na hi vedayitākārena upalabbhamānā vedanā ruppanākārena upalabbhatīti anuyuñjitabbā,
tika-abh03t:225_14: na ca paravādī ruppanādisabhāvaṃ puggalaṃ icchati,
tika-abh03t:225_16: Paramatthasaccato aññasmiṃ saccikaṭṭhe vijjamāne nāssa paramatthasaccatā anuyuñjitabbā.
tika-abh03t:225_17: Asaccikaṭṭhe saccikaṭṭhavohāraṃ āropetvā taṃ sandhāya pucchatīti vadantānaṃ voharitasaccikaṭṭhassa attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭhatā na yuttā.
tika-abh03t:225_19: Sammutisaccākārena upalabbhamānañca bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbheyya vā na vā.
tika-abh03t:225_23: taṃvinimutto sammutisaccassa saccikaṭṭhaparamatthākāro na vattabbo asiddhattā.
tika-abh03t:226_0: Dvinnaṃ saccānanti ettha saccadvayākārena anupalabbhanīyato anuññeyyametaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t:226_2: Yathā hi ekadesena paramatthākārena anupalabbhanīyatā anujānanassa na kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh03t:226_3: evaṃ ekadesena sammutiyākārena upalabbhanīyatā paṭikkhepassa cāti maggitabbo etthāpi adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:226_4: Nupalabbhatīti vacanasāmaññamattanti nupalabbhatīti idameva vacanaṃ anuññātaṃ paṭikkhittañcāti etaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:226_5: Yathā upalabbhatīti etasseva anujānanapaṭikkhepehi ahaṃ niggahetabbo,
tika-abh03t:226_6: evaṃ nupalabbhatīti etasseva anujānanapaṭikkhepehi tvanti evaṃ sambhavantassa sāmaññena asambhavantassa kappanaṃ panettha chalavādo bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh03t:226_7: Tena nupalabbhatīti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ chalavādassa kāraṇattā “chalavādo”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:226_9: Ṭhapanā niggahappaṭikammānaṃ pākaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ na hotīti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:226_10: Na hi pakkhaṭṭhapanena vinā purimaṃ anujānitvā pacchimassa avajānanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:226_11: pacchimaṃ vā avajānantassa purimānujānanaṃ micchāti sakkā āropetunti.
tika-abh03t:227_1: paṭijānantanti ca paccatte sāmiupayogavacanānīti adhippāyena “tvaṃyeva paṭijānanto”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:228_1: Catūhi pāpanāropanāhi niggahassa upanītattāti “dunniggahitā ca homa,
tika-abh03t:228_3: mayā tava kato niggaho viya micchāti evaṃ tena anulomapañcake catūhi pāpanāropanāhi katassa niggahassa
tika-abh03t:228_4: tena niyāmena dukkaṭabhāvassa attanā kataniggahena saha upanītattā aniggahabhāvassa vā upagamitattāti
tika-abh03t:228_6: Evameva tena hi yaṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci…pe…
tika-abh03t:228_7: idaṃ te micchāti etassa aniggahabhāvanigamanasseva niggamanacatukkatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:231_1: “Attano laddhiṃ nissāya paṭiññā paravādissā”ti vatvā puna “paramatthavasena puggalassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:231_2: Tatrāyaṃ paṭikkhepo attano laddhiyā yadi kato,
tika-abh03t:231_3: paramatthato aññena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena puggalo upalabbhatīti ayamassa laddhīti āpajjati.
tika-abh03t:231_4: Tathā ca sati nāyaṃ sammutisaccavasena upaladdhiṃ icchantena niggahetabbo.
tika-abh03t:231_5: Atha attano laddhiṃ niggūhitvā parassa laddhivasena paṭikkhipati,
tika-abh03t:231_7: Na hi attano ca parassa ca laddhiṃ vadantassa doso āpajjatīti.
tika-abh03t:231_8: Attano pana laddhiyā paṭijānitvā paraladdhiyā paṭikkhipantena attano laddhiṃ chaḍḍetvā paraladdhi gahitā
tika-abh03t:236_1: Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīreti ayamatthoti dassento āha “sarīraṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t:236_3: Yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāya “sabbattha na upalabbhatī”ti vutte sarīrato bahi upalabbhatīti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:236_4: tasmā paccanīke paṭikkhepo sakavādissāti etena na kenaci sabhāvena puggalo upalabbhatīti ayamattho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t:236_5: Na hi kenaci sabhāvena upalabbhamānassa sarīratadaññāvimutto upaladdhiokāso atthīti.
tika-abh03t:239_1: Purimapacchimajātikālañcāti majjhimajātikāle upalabbhamānassa tasseva purimapacchimajātikālesu upaladdhiṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:239_2: Sesaṃ paṭhamanaye vuttasadisamevāti imesu tīsu paṭhame “sabbatthā”ti etasmiṃ naye vuttasadisameva, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-abh03t:239_4: Idhāpi hi yasmā “sabbadā na upalabbhatī”ti vutte ekadā upalabbhatīti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:242_1: Tatiyanaye ca yasmā “sabbesu na upalabbhatī”ti vutte ekasmiṃ upalabbhatīti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:245_3: Tattha anulomapañcakassa “sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādikassa attho “sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādipāḷiṃ
tika-abh03t:245_4: saṃkhipitvā āgate sarūpena avutte “yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāyā”tiādinā vuttanayena veditabbo,
tika-abh03t:245_5: paccanīkassa ca “sabbattha puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādikassa paṭikammakaraṇavasena vuttassa attho paṭikammādipāḷiṃ
tika-abh03t:245_6: saṃkhipitvā ādimattadassanena āgate “puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādimhi anulome “sabbatthāti sarīraṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:245_7: anuyogo sakavādissā”tiādinā vuttanayena veditabboti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:245_9: tasminti evaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā tattha tesu tīsu mukhesūti attho gahetabbo.
tika-abh03t:245_10: Anulomapañcakamūlakā cettha sabbānulomapaccanīkapañcakapāḷi anulomapañcakassa pāḷīti vuttā,
tika-abh03t:245_12: Taṃ saṃkhipitvā paṭikammavasena āgate sarūpena avutte “puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādike paccanīke “upalabbhatī”tiādike
tika-abh03t:245_13: anulome ca attho heṭṭhā suddhikasaccikaṭṭhe vuttanayeneva veditabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:248_1: Rūpādīhi saddhiṃ saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandananti saccikaṭṭhassa puggalassa rūpādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:248_2: saccikaṭṭhe vā rūpādīhi saddhiṃ puggalassa saṃsandananti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:248_4: kārassa samuccayatthattā yathā rūpanti evaṃ nidassanavasena vutto attho vicāretabbo.
tika-abh03t:248_5: Rūpādīhi añño anañño ca puggalo na vattabboti laddhi samayo.
tika-abh03t:248_6: “Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:248_7: Anuññāyamāne tadubhayavirodho āpajjatīti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “samayasuttavirodhaṃ disvā”ti.
tika-abh03t:249_4: ājānāhi paṭikammanti ettha ājānāhi niggahanti pāṭho diṭṭho bhavissati.
tika-abh03t:249_5: Aññattaṃ paṭijānāpanatthanti yathā mayā aññattaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:249_6: tathā ca tayāpi taṃ vattabbanti aññattapaṭiññāya codanatthanti attho.
tika-abh03t:249_9: parenapi ṭhapanīyattā laddhimeva nissāya paṭikkhepo katoti sopi na niggahetabbo siyā.
tika-abh03t:249_10: Paro pana puggaloti kañci sabhāvaṃ gahetvā tassa ṭhapanīyattaṃ icchati,
tika-abh03t:249_11: sati ca sabhāve ṭhapanīyatā na yuttāti niggahetabbo.
tika-abh03t:249_13: Tenevassa ekattanānattapañhassa ṭhapanīyataṃ vadanto na niggahetabboti sakavādinā paṭikkhepo katoti ayamettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t:252_1: Upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā cāti idañca dvinnaṃ samānatā no aññattassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:252_2: atha kho visuṃ attano sabhāvena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhanīyatāti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:253_1: “Atthi puggalo”ti suttaṃ anujānāpentena upaladdhi anujānitā hotīti maññamāno āha “upaladdhisāmaññaṃ āropetvā”ti.
tika-abh03t:253_2: Vīsādhikāni nava paṭikammapañcakasatāni dassitānīti etena suddhikasaṃsandanepi “ājānāhi paṭikamma”micceva pāṭhoti viññāyati.
tika-abh03t:256_2: Samudāyato hi ayaṃ aññattaṃ anicchanto ekadesato anaññattaṃ paṭikkhipanto na niggahāraho siyāti etaṃ vacanokāsaṃ nivattetuṃ “ayañca anuyogo”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:256_3: Sakalanti sattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo puggaloti vā paramatthasaccaṃ puggaloti vā evaṃ sakalaṃ sandhāyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:256_4: Evaṃ sakalaṃ paramatthaṃ cintetvā tantivasena anuyogalakkhaṇassa ṭhapitattā sakalaparamatthato ca aññassa
tika-abh03t:256_5: saccikaṭṭhassa abhāvā saccikaṭṭhena puggalena tato aññena na bhavitabbanti “rūpaṃ puggalo”ti imaṃ pañhaṃ
tika-abh03t:257_2: “Rūpasmiṃ puggalo”ti ettha nissayavināse vināsāpattibhayena paṭikkhipatīti adhippāyenāha “ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena cevā”ti.
tika-abh03t:257_8: Aññatra rūpāti ettha ca rūpavā puggaloti ayamattho saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:261_1: Paccanīkānulometi idaṃ yaṃ vakkhati “chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ ‘ājānāhi paṭikamma’ntiādī”ti,
tika-abh03t:264_1: Puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayassa atthato ekatteti ettha tadeva ekattaṃ parena sampaṭicchitaṃ asampaṭicchitanti vicāretabbametaṃ.
tika-abh03t:264_3: upalabbhatīti etassa vibhajitabbataṃ vadanto vibhajitabbāvibhajitabbatthānaṃ upalabbhatipuggala-
tika-abh03t:264_6: saddānaṃ taṃ vibhāgaṃ vadato rūpaṃ kiñci upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t:264_7: kiñci na upalabbhatīti ayaṃ pasaṅgo nāpajjati,
tika-abh03t:264_8: evaṃ etassapi yathāvuttavibhāgaṃ vadato yathāāpāditena pasaṅgena na bhavitabbanti maggitabbo ettha adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:265_1: “Suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti etena atthato puggalo natthīti vuttaṃ hotīti āha “natthītipi vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t:268_2: “Rūpino vā arūpino vā”ti sutte āgatapaññattiṃ sandhāya “tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t:268_3: Vītarāgasabbhāvatoti kāmībhāvassa anekantikattā kāmadhātuyā āyattattābhāvato ca “kāmī”ti na vattabboti paṭikkhipatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:269_3: Āhacca bhāsitanti “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti abyākatametaṃ mayā”ti āhacca bhāsitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:273_1: Yena rūpasaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchatīti ettha “rūpena saddhiṃ gacchatī”ti vadantena “rūpaṃ puggalo”ti
tika-abh03t:273_2: ananuññātattā yenākārena taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti idaṃ āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:273_4: Asaññūpapattiṃ sandhāyāti nirayūpagassa puggalassa asaññūpagassa arūpūpagassa ca antarābhavaṃ na icchatīti
tika-abh03t:273_5: cutito anantaraṃ upapattiṃ sandhāyāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:273_6: Ye pana cutikāle upapattikāle ca asaññūpapattikāle ca asaññasattesu saññā atthīti gahetvā asaññūpagassa ca antarābhavaṃ iccheyyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:273_7: tesaṃ antarābhavabhāvato “asaññūpapatti avedanā”ti na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh03t:274_2: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanepi hi na vattabbaṃ saññā atthīti icchanti.
tika-abh03t:275_1: Yasmā rūpādidhamme vinā puggalo natthīti indhanupādāno aggi viya indhanena rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādinā vinā natthīti laddhivasena vadati.
tika-abh03t:278_1: Nīlaṃ rūpaṃ upādāya nīlotiādīsūti “nīlaṃ rūpaṃ upādāya nīlakassa puggalassa paññattī”ti ettha yo puṭṭho nīlaṃ upādāya nīloti,
tika-abh03t:279_3: “Kusalaṃ vedanaṃ upādāyā”ti maññamāno paṭijānātīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:280_0: 112. Idāni …pe… dassetuṃ “yathā rukkha”ntiādimāhāti pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā uttaramāhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:281_0: 115. “Yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavā”ti uttarapakkhe vuttaṃ vacanaṃ uddharitvā “yasmā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:282_1: Cittānupassanāvasenāti cittānupassanāvasena paridīpitassa sarāgādicittayogassa vasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:283_1: Yenāti cakkhunti “yenā”ti vuttaṃ karaṇaṃ cakkhunti attho.
tika-abh03t:283_2: Cakkhumeva rūpaṃ passatīti viññāṇanissayabhāvūpagamanameva cakkhussa dassanaṃ nāma hotīti sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh03t:287_2: jātassa ca vijjaṭṭhānādīsu sammā micchā vā pavatti natthīti sandhāya “purimakammameva tassā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:288_3: tassa kārakenapi aññanti evaṃ kammavaṭṭassa anupacchedaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh03t:288_4: Puggalassa kārako kammassa kārako āpajjatīti vicāretabbametaṃ.
tika-abh03t:288_5: Mātāpitūhi janitatādinā tassa kārakaṃ icchantassa kammakārakānaṃ kārakaparamparā āpajjatīti idañca vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:289_1: Suttavirodhabhayenāti “so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatīti kho, brāhmaṇa,
tika-abh03t:290_1: “Idha nandati pecca nandatī”ti vacanato kammakaraṇakāle vipākapaṭisaṃvedanakāle ca soyevāti paṭijānātīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:290_2: Sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti ca puṭṭho “kiṃ nu kho,
tika-abh03t:291_1: Laddhimattamevetanti soyeveko neva so hoti na aññoti idaṃ pana nattheva,
tika-abh03t:291_4: na parassa icchāvaseneva “so karotī”tiādi anuyogo vutto,
tika-abh03t:291_5: atha kho “so karotī”tiādīsu ekaṃ anicchantassa itaraṃ,
tika-abh03t:291_6: tañca anicchantassa aññaṃ āpannanti evaṃ kārakavedakicchāya ṭhatvā “so karotī”tiādīsu taṃ taṃ anicchāya āpannavasenāpīti.
tika-abh03t:291_7: Atha vā na kevalaṃ “so karotī”tiādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ āpannattā,
tika-abh03t:291_8: atha kho ekekasseva ca āpannattā ayaṃ anuyogo katoti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:291_9: Purimanayenevāti etena “idha nandatī”tiādi sabbaṃ paṭijānanādikāraṇaṃ ekato yojetabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:295_1: Abhiññānuyogādivasena arahattasādhanāti ettha “nanu atthi koci iddhiṃ vikubbatī”ti abhiññāanuyogo ca
tika-abh03t:295_2: “hañci atthi koci iddhiṃ vikubbatī”ti ṭhapanā ca “tena vata re”tiādi pāpanā ca ādisaddasaṅgahito atthova
tika-abh03t:295_4: Āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ panettha abhiññā vuttāti tadabhiññāvato arahato sādhanaṃ “arahattasādhanā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:295_5: Arahato hi sādhanā tabbhāvassa ca sādhanā hotiyevāti.
tika-abh03t:298_2: Evaṃ pana paṭikkhipanto asaccikaṭṭhaṃ tatiyakoṭibhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vadeyyāti tādisaṃ puggalaṃ icchanto hi suttena niggahetabbo siyā. Kasmā?
tika-abh03t:298_4: tathārūpassa kassaci sabhāvassa abhāvato paṭikkhepārahattā attano laddhiṃ nigūhitvā paṭikkhepo paravādissāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:301_2: dukkhitosmī”ti jānanaṃ pajānanaṃ nāma na hotīti dasseti yogāvacarassa sukhumānampi vedanānaṃ paricchedanasamatthatañca.
tika-abh03t:303_1: Imā khoti oḷāriko attapaṭilābho manomayo attapaṭilābho arūpo attapaṭilābhoti imā lokassa samaññā,
tika-abh03t:303_4: tasmiṃ anupalabbhamānepi attani tadanupalabbhatoyeva parāmāsaṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ anuppādento loke attapaṭilābhoti
tika-abh03t:303_6: Ettha ca paccattasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena puggalassa atthitaṃ paṭikkhipitvā lokavohārena atthitaṃ vadantena puggaloti koci sabhāvo natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:303_7: Sati hi tasmiṃ attano sabhāveneva atthitā vattabbā siyā,
tika-abh03t:303_11: evaṃ ito purimā ca atthavaṇṇanā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t:309_2: dhammā sekkhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ arahato parihāniladdhiyā na nissayo,
tika-abh03t:309_4: tasmā arahatopi parihāniṃ icchantīti ettha pi-
tika-abh03t:310_1: Tesañhi sabbesampi parihāni na hotīti tassa laddhī”ti purimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t:310_2: mudindriyesveva pana adhippetesu parikkhepo na kātabbo siyā, kato ca,
tika-abh03t:310_4: Tesañhi sabbesampi parihāni na hotīti tassa laddhī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:311_0: Ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvāti sotāpannoyeva niyatoti vuttoti soyeva na parihāyati,
tika-abh03t:311_2: “Uparimaggatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā niyatoti sotāpattiphalā na parihāyatīti etamatthaṃ gaṇhīti pana vadanti.
tika-abh03t:314_1: Yaṃ panetthātiādimhi dassanamaggaphale ṭhitassa anantaraṃ arahattappattiṃ,
tika-abh03t:314_2: tato parihāyitvā tattha ca ṭhānaṃ icchanto puna vāyāmena tadanantaraṃ arahattappattiṃ na icchatīti vicāretabbametaṃ.
tika-abh03t:315_2: Puthujjano pana vasippatto avasippatto ca samayavimuttaasamayavimuttatantiyā aggahito,
tika-abh03t:315_3: bhajāpiyamāno pana samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena samayavimuttabhāvaṃ bhajeyyāti vuttoti.
tika-abh03t:318_3: “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”nti ettha viya mutasaddo pattabbaṃ vadatīti āha “phusanāraha”nti.
tika-abh03t:319_0: 267. Appattaparihānāya ceva saṃvattanti yathākatasanniṭṭhānassa samayavimuttassāti adhippāyo.
