tika-abh03t:324_3: ṭhānehī”ti pana suttassa vacanena heṭṭhāpi maggabhāvanampi na icchantīti viññāyati.
tika-abh03t:325_1: “Gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṃ maggapaṭilābhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo tassevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:325_2: “yattha natthī”ti pana okāsavasena puṭṭho puggalavasena tassa paṭikkhepo na yutto.
tika-abh03t:329_1: Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma jātoti idaṃ “idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho
tika-abh03t:329_2: nāma hotī”tiādikena laddhikittanena kathaṃ sametīti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:329_3: Pubbe pana anāgāmī eva anāgāmīti vutto,
tika-abh03t:329_5: Idha arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvā idheva phalaṃ sacchikarontaṃ “idhaparinibbāyī”ti vadati,
tika-abh03t:329_6: idha pana maggaṃ bhāvetvā tattha phalaṃ sacchikarontaṃ “tatthaparinibbāyī arahā”ti.
tika-abh03t:333_0: 274. Odhiso odhisoti etassa atthaṃ dassento “ekadesena ekadesenā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:337_2: Taṃ pana kiccaṃ yadi teneva maggena sijjhatīti laddhi,
tika-abh03t:337_3: puthujjanakāle eva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīnāti laddhīti etaṃ na sameti,
tika-abh03t:337_4: tasmā puthujjanakāle pahīnānampi dassanamagge uppanne puna kadāci anuppattito tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccaṃ sambhavatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:342_1: Sabbasmiṃ sarīre sabbanti sirasi pādā pacchato cakkhūnīti evaṃ sabbaṃ sabbattha atthīti attho.
tika-abh03t:342_11: Kathaṃ pana ekasabhāvassa yogarahitatāti taṃ dassento “nānāsabhāvānañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:342_12: Dvinnañhi nānāsabhāvānaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ meṇḍakānaṃ vā aññamaññayogo hoti,
tika-abh03t:342_16: Idaṃ pucchatīti paravādīdiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhibhāvaṃ gahetvā uppannāya attano diṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhibhāvo atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:345_1: Atītānāgataṃ pahāya paccuppannarūpameva appiyaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ karitvāti paccuppannasaddena rūpasaddena
tika-abh03t:345_2: cāti ubhohipi paccuppannarūpameva vattabbaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:345_3: Paññattiyā avigatattāti etena idaṃ viññāyati “na rūpapaññatti viya vatthapaññatti sabhāvaparicchinne pavattā vijjamānapaññatti,
tika-abh03t:345_4: atha kho pubbāpariyavasena pavattamānaṃ rūpasamūhaṃ upādāya pavattā avijjamānapaññatti,
tika-abh03t:348_1: Anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā hutvā hotīti vuttanti ettha anāgataṃ anāgataṃ hutvā puna paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ hutvā hotīti,
tika-abh03t:348_2: tathā paccuppannaṃ paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ pubbe anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotīti hutvā hotīti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:348_3: Kiṃ te tampi hutvā hotīti tabbhāvāvigamato hutvāhotibhāvānuparamaṃ anupacchedaṃ pucchatīti adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t:348_4: Hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā abhāvatoti anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannabhūtassa puna anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:349_0: Yasmā tanti taṃ hutvā bhūtaṃ paccuppannaṃ yasmā anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ,
tika-abh03t:349_1: tasmā dutiyampi “hutvā hotī”ti vacanaṃ arahatīti paṭijānātīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:349_2: Evaṃ pana dhamme hutvāhotibhāvānuparamaṃ vadantassa adhamme sasavisāṇe nahutvāna hotibhāvānuparamo āpajjatīti adhippāyena “atha na”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:350_2: Atthānānattaṃ icchantopi pana anāgatassa paccuppanne vuttaṃ hotibhāvaṃ,
tika-abh03t:350_3: paccuppannassa ca anāgate vuttaṃ hutvābhāvaṃ kathaṃ paṭijānātīti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:350_7: Purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvāti anuññātapañhassa hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti doso vuttoti avuttadosaṃ
tika-abh03t:350_8: atikkamma paṭikkhittapañhaṃ puna gahetvā tena codetīti attho.
tika-abh03t:350_9: Ettha ca atthānānattena hutvāhotīti anujānantassa doso kālanānattāyeva anāgataṃ paccuppannanti paṭikkhepena kathaṃ hotīti?
tika-abh03t:351_0: Ekekanti anāgatampi na hutvā na hoti paccuppannampīti tadubhayaṃ gahetvā “ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:351_1: na ekekameva na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti.
tika-abh03t:351_2: Esa nayo purimasmiṃ “ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti vacanepi.
tika-abh03t:351_3: Anāgatassa hi “hutvā hotī”ti nāmaṃ paccuppannassa cāti dvepi nāmāni saṅgahetvā “hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti coditaṃ,
tika-abh03t:351_4: tathā “na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī”ti cāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:351_5: Sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viyāti etena apariyonaddhena paṭijānitabbaṃ siyāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:351_6: Ettha ca purimanaye hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāhotibhāvo codito,
tika-abh03t:351_7: dutiyanaye anāgatādīsu ekekassa hutvāhotināmatāti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-abh03t:354_2: atthitāya paṭijānātīti ettha paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ tenāti etena anuvattamānāpekkhanavacanena kathaṃ vuccatīti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:357_1: Yuttivirodho arahato sarāgādibhāve puthujjanena anānattaṃ brahmacariyavāsassa aphalatāti evamādiko daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:360_1: Tena kāraṇenāti atītaatthisaddānaṃ ekatthattā atthisaddatthassa ca nvātītabhāvato “atītaṃ nvātītaṃ,
tika-abh03t:360_3: Ettha pana atītādīnaṃ atthitaṃ vadantassa paravādissevāyaṃ doso yathā āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:365_2: Vohāravasena avipakkavipākānaṃ atthitaṃ vadanto kathaṃ codetabboti vicāreti “kammupacayaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ saṅkhāraṃ icchantī”ti.
tika-abh03t:368_2: lokuttarāyayeva vā paramatthasatipaṭṭhānattā tassā vasena lokuttarabhāvaṃ pucchanatthāyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:371_0: 304. Ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattāti avattabbuttarena upekkhitabbena patiṭṭhāpitattāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:376_3: bāhirakānampi ca kāmesu vītarāgānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiyā abhāvo vuttoti.
tika-abh03t:377_2: “kiṃ kāraṇā”ti pana kāraṇassa pucchitattā brahmacariyakathāyaṃ viya kāraṇattheti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:380_1: Vacībhedakathāyaṃ lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannoti paṭhamamaggaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-abh03t:381_1: Yena taṃ saddaṃ suṇātīti idaṃ vacīsamuṭṭhāpanakkhaṇe eva etaṃ saddaṃ suṇātīti icchite āropite vā yujjati.
tika-abh03t:382_0: 332. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe vacībhedaṃ icchato parassa abhibhūsuttāharaṇe adhippāyo vattabbo.
tika-abh03t:385_7: Muhuttaṃ muhuttanti pañho sakavādinā pucchito viya vutto,
tika-abh03t:388_2: catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ekamaggabhāvato na ekamaggassa bahubhāvāpatti,
tika-abh03t:388_3: anupubbena ca sotāpattimaggaṃ bhāvetīti upapannanti paṭijānātīti.
tika-abh03t:390_1: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti ettha paṭisambhidāñāṇehi saha aṭṭhasu gahitesu niruttipaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāhi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyā kathaṃ hotīti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:393_1: Vohārakathāyaṃ udāhu sotādīnipīti ekantalokiyesu visayavisayīsu visayasseva lokuttarabhāvo,
tika-abh03t:393_6: evaṃ sotādīnaṃ āpannāti kinti tānipi lokuttarānīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:394_2: Na hi lokuttare paṭihaññatīti parikappitepi saddassa lokuttarabhāvo atthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:394_6: Anekantatāti lokiyena ñāṇena jānitabbato lokiyoti etassa hetussa lokiye lokuttare ca sambhavato anekantabhāvo siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:397_1: Dve dukkhasaccāni na icchatīti yesaṃ dvinnaṃ dvīhi nirodhehi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:397_2: tāni dve dukkhasaccāni na icchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:397_3: Ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhātiādinā paṭisaṅkhāya vinā niruddhā asamudācaraṇasaṅkhārā appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhāti dasseti,
tika-abh03t:397_5: Tena appaṭisaṅkhānirodho ca asamudācaraṇanirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:402_1: Indriyaparopariyattaṃ asādhāraṇanti yathā niddesato vitthārato sabbaṃ sabbākāraṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānādiṃ ajānantāpi “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso,
tika-abh03t:402_2: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyyā”tiādinā ṭhānāṭṭhānāni uddesato saṅkhepato sāvakā jānanti,
tika-abh03t:402_3: na evaṃ “āsayaṃ jānāti anusayaṃ jānātī”tiādinā uddesamattenapi indriyaparopariyattaṃ jānantīti “asādhāraṇa”nti āha.
tika-abh03t:402_4: Therena pana saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvajānanamattaṃ sandhāya “sattānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāmī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:402_5: na yathāvuttaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ tathāgatabalanti ayamettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:402_7: evaṃ pana paṭijānantena “tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇa”nti idampi evameva paṭiññātaṃ siyāti kathamayaṃ codetabbo siyā.
tika-abh03t:403_1: Sesesu paṭikkhepo sakavādissa ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīnaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇattā tattha sādhāraṇapakkhaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:406_1: Saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānantassa dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ samodhānaṃ kathaṃ āpajjati yathāvuttanayenāti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:406_3: So pana ekasmimpi āropetvā na ṭhapetabboti ekasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbena tena rahitatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t:409_1: Jhānena vikkhambhanavimuttiyā vimuttaṃ cittaṃ maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotīti etissā laddhiyā ko dosoti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:409_5: vayakkhaṇe vimuccamānanti vimuttavimuccamānavacanassa na codetabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t:409_8: ekadese vā vimuccamānassa ca vimuttakiriyāya ekadeso visesanaṃ hotīti “bhāvanapuṃsaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:412_1: Anulomagotrabhukkhaṇepi asamudācarantā maggakkhaṇepi pahīnā eva nāma bhaveyyunti laddhi uppannāti adhippāyena anulomagotrabhuggahaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh03t:415_1: Indriyāni paṭilabhati appaṭiladdhindriyattā anindriyabhūtāni saddhādīni niyyānikāni bhāvento indriyāni paṭilabhati,
tika-abh03t:418_3: Taṃmattamevāti purimaṃ maṃsacakkhumattameva dhammupatthaddhaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:418_5: Ettha ca visayassa dīpakaṃ ānubhāvagocarānameva asadisataṃ vadanto yādiso maṃsacakkhussa visayoti visayaggahaṇaṃ na visayavisesadassanatthaṃ,
tika-abh03t:418_6: atha kho yādise visaye ānubhāvagocaravisesā honti,
tika-abh03t:419_0: Na ca maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchatīti dhammupatthaddhakāle purimaṃ maṃsacakkhumevāti na icchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:419_3: Rūpāvacarikānanti rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannāni mahābhūtāni rūpāvacarikānīti so icchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:419_5: Arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipatīti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ hutvā arūpāvacaraṃ na jātanti paṭikkhipatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:420_1: Kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṃ na icchati,
tika-abh03t:420_2: yena tīṇi cakkhūni dhammupatthambhena cakkhuntarabhāvaṃ vadato bhaveyyunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:423_1: Dibbena cakkhunā yathākammūpage satte pajānātīti yathākammūpagatañāṇassa upanissaye dibbacakkhumhi karaṇaniddeso kato,
tika-abh03t:423_3: Taṃkiccakeyeva pana paro karaṇaniddesaṃ maññatīti āha “ayoniso gahetvā”ti.
tika-abh03t:423_4: Yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhīti iminā vacanena dibbacakkhumeva yathākammūpagatañāṇanti evaṃ bhavitabbaṃ. Eva-
tika-abh03t:423_5: saddo ca aṭṭhāne ṭhito dibbacakkhusaddassa parato yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t:423_6: Yathākammūpagatañāṇassa hi so dibbacakkhuto atthantarabhāvaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh03t:426_1: Cātumahārājikānaṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarasabbhāvo āṭānāṭiyasuttena pakāsitoti “tāvatiṃse deve upādāyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:426_2: Evaṃ sati sugatikathāyaṃ “tāvatiṃse saṅgahitānaṃ pubbadevānaṃ surāpānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:426_4: taṃ tesaṃ surāpānaṃ asaṃvaro na hotī”ti vattabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:434_0: 388. Ayonisoti opapātiko hoti, tattha tassāyevūpapattiyā parinibbāyīti atthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:437_1: Samannāgatakathāyaṃ pattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānanto catūhi khandhehi viya samannāgamaṃ na vadatīti tassa
tika-abh03t:440_1: Imināva nayenāti “tattha dve samannāgamā”tiādi sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:440_2: Tattha pattidhammo nāma rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmiṃ paṭhamajjhānādivasena pāpuṇantassa paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ paṭilābho.
tika-abh03t:440_4: yena supanto sajjhāyādipasuto ca tehi samannāgatoti vuccatīti vadanti.
tika-abh03t:443_2: Taṃ aggahetvā pattidhammavasena natthitāya bodhiyā samannāgato buddhoti yesaṃ laddhi,
tika-abh03t:443_3: te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo ca sakavādissāti yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:446_1: Bodhisattameva sandhāya vuttanti lakkhaṇasamannāgatesu abodhisatte chaḍḍetvā bodhisattameva gahetvā idaṃ suttaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:449_1: Ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇanti pāramīpūraṇeneva te “bodhiyā niyatā narā”ti vuccantīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:449_2: Kevalañhi nantiādinā ca na niyāmakassa nāma kassaci uppannattā byākarontīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:452_1: Nippariyāyenevāti avasiṭṭhassa pahātabbassa abhāvā “sabbasaṃyojanappahāna”nti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh03t:452_2: arahattamaggena pajahanato evāti gaṇhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:452_3: Appahīnassa abhāvāti avasiṭṭhassa pahātabbassa abhāvā paṭijānātīti vadanti,
tika-abh03t:452_5: Evaṃ sati tena attano laddhiṃ chaḍḍetvā sakavādissa laddhiyā paṭiññātanti āpajjati.
tika-abh03t:457_1: Phalañāṇaṃ na hotīti “vimuttānī”ti vā tadaṅgavimuttiyādibhāvato maggena pahīnānaṃ puna anuppattito ca “avimuttānī”ti vā na vattabbānīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:460_1: Na panetaṃ asekhanti etena asekhavisayattā asekhameva ñāṇanti parassa laddhi,
tika-abh03t:463_3: Anicce niccantiādivipariyeso pana viparītañāṇaṃ nāmāti aññāṇepi ñāṇavohāraṃ āropetvā vadatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:466_2: yaṃ saccānulomaṃ maggañāṇānugatikaṃ passanto bhagavā “bhabbo”ti jānātīti laddhi.
tika-abh03t:466_3: Paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṃ katvāti ettha “niyatassa aniyāmagamanāyā”ti viparītānuyogato pabhuti gaṇetvā “catuttha”nti āha.
tika-abh03t:469_2: sabbaṃ lokuttaramevāti gaṇhantenapi sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidāti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:469_4: Tassa vā ñāṇataṃ na icchatīti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:469_5: Pathavīkasiṇasammutiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇaṃ sandhāyāti anariyassa etaṃ ñāṇaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo siyā.
tika-abh03t:472_1: Saccanti vacanasāmaññena ubhayassapi saccasāmaññattaṃ gahetvā vadatīti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:475_1: Phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ manasikarototi etena purimā vattabbapaṭiññā anupadadhammamanasikārato aññaṃ samudāyamanasikāraṃ sandhāya katāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:478_1: Sabbasmimpīti “pāṭaliputtassa kho”tiādinā anāgate ñāṇanti vuttanti anāgatabhāvasāmaññena anantarānāgatepi ñāṇaṃ icchantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:481_3: Santatiṃ sandhāyāti bhaṅgānupassanānaṃ bhaṅgato anupassanāsantatiṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:484_1: Buddhānaṃ viyāti yathā buddhā sabbappakāraphalaparopariyattajānanavasena attano eva ca balena phalaṃ jānanti,
tika-abh03t:490_1: Aniyato nāma na hotīti yathā micchattaniyatassa bhavantare aniyataṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t:490_2: evaṃ etassa kadācipi aniyatatā na hotīti yo niyāmo,
tika-abh03t:493_2: Etena ca dhammānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo dhammaṭṭhitatāti etamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:499_1: Kariyamānā karīyatīti arūpakkhandhānaṃ pavattamānānaṃ samathavipassanānukkamena appavatti sādhīyatīti attho.
tika-abh03t:499_2: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ pana abhāvenāti vadanto sabhāvadhammataṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh03t:499_4: Asaṅkhatabhāve kāraṇaṃ na hoti sabhāvadhammattāsādhakattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:507_1: Nānattavavatthānaṃ natthīti vadanto “tilamhi telaṃ anupaviṭṭha”nti vacanameva na yujjatīti “na heva”nti paṭikkhittanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:510_1: Phassādīnaṃ ekuppādatādivirahitā sahajātatā natthīti āha “sampayuttasahajātataṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t:513_1: Deyyadhammavasena codetunti yadi cetasikova dhammo dānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:513_2: “diyyatīti dāna”nti imināpi atthena cetasikasseva dānabhāvo āpajjatīti codetunti attho.
tika-abh03t:514_1: Aniṭṭhaphalantiādi acetasikassa dhammassa dānabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttanti phaladānabhāvadīpanatthaṃ na vuttanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:514_2: Aniṭṭhaphalantiādinā acetasikassa dhammassa phaladānaṃ vuttaṃ viya hoti,
tika-abh03t:514_5: Evañca katvā anantaramevāha “na hi acetasiko annādidhammo āyatiṃ vipākaṃ detī”ti.
tika-abh03t:514_6: Iṭṭhaphalabhāvaniyamanatthanti deyyadhammo viya kenaci pariyāyena aniṭṭhaphalatā dānassa natthi,
tika-abh03t:515_1: Na pana ekenatthenāti “deyyadhammova dāna”nti imaṃ sakavādīvādaṃ nivattetuṃ “saddhā hiriya”ntiādikaṃ suttasādhanaṃ paravādīvāde yujjati,
tika-abh03t:515_3: “cetasikova dhammo dāna”nti imaṃ nivattetuṃ “cetasiko dhammo dāna”nti imaṃ pana sādhetuṃ “saddhā hiriya”ntiādikaṃ sakavādīvāde yujjati,
tika-abh03t:515_4: “idhekacco annaṃ detī”tiādikaṃ vā “deyyadhammo dāna”nti sādhetunti evaṃ nivattanasādhanatthanānattaṃ
tika-abh03t:515_6: Tattha yathā paravādīvāde ca suttasādhanatthaṃ “na vattabbaṃ cetasiko dhammo dāna”nti pucchāyaṃ cetasikovāti attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t:515_7: tathā “na vattabbaṃ deyyadhammo dāna”nti pucchāya ca deyyadhammovāti.
tika-abh03t:515_8: Deyyadhammo iṭṭhaphaloti iṭṭhaphalābhāvamattameva paṭikkhittanti ettha “iṭṭhaphalabhāvamattameva paṭikkhitta”nti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti.
tika-abh03t:515_10: Saṅkarabhāvamocanatthanti cetasikassa dātabbaṭṭhena deyyadhammassa ca iṭṭhaphalaṭṭhena dānabhāvamocanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:518_1: Paribhogamayaṃ nāma cittavippayuttaṃ puññaṃ atthīti laddhi.
tika-abh03t:518_2: Tañhi te sandhāya paribhogamayaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti vadantīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:519_2: Pañcaviññāṇānaṃ viya etesampi samodhānaṃ siyāti paṭijānātīti vadanti.
tika-abh03t:519_3: Pañcaviññāṇaphassādīnameva pana samodhānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānātīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:520_1: Aparibhuttepīti iminā “paṭiggāhako paṭiggahetvā na paribhuñjati chaḍḍetī”tiādikaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:520_2: Aparibhutte deyyadhamme puññabhāvato paribhogamayaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti ayaṃ vādo hīyati.
tika-abh03t:520_4: Cāgacetanāya eva hi puññabhāvo evaṃ siddho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:520_5: Aparibhuttepi deyyadhamme puññabhāve cāgacetanāya eva puññabhāvoti āha “sakavādīvādova balavā”ti.
tika-abh03t:523_4: Iminā kāraṇenāti yadi yaṃ ito cīvarādi dinnaṃ,
tika-abh03t:523_7: somanassaṃ paṭilabheyyunti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentassapīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:526_1: Phasso sukhavedanīyādibhedo hotīti phassena sabbampi kammavipākaṃ dassetvā puna attavajjehi sampayogadassanatthaṃ “so ca saññādayo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:526_2: Atthi ca nesanti sāvajjane cakkhuviññāṇādisahajātadhamme sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:526_4: tassa patthanāti iṭṭhavipāke eva patthanaṃ katvā kammaṃ karontīti kammūpanissayabhūtameva patthanaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t:526_5: paccuppannavedanāpaccayaṃ vā taṇhaṃ upādānādinibbattanavasena dukkhassa pabhāvitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:527_0: 493. Sakasamayavasena ca codanāya payujjamānataṃ dassetuṃ “tesañca laddhiyā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:528_1: Paṭilābhavasenāti kamme sati pathaviyādīnaṃ paṭilābho hotīti kammaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:532_1: Pariyāyo natthīti sakavādinā attanā vattabbatāya pariyāyo natthīti abyākatānaṃ jarāmaraṇassa vipākanivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:533_2: taṃ akusalakammaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānassātiādinā rūpasseva dubbaṇṇatādassanena samamevāti.
tika-abh03t:539_1: Tappaccayāpīti yassa vipākassa vipāko aññamaññapaccayo hoti tappaccayāpi aññamaññapaccayabhūtatopīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:539_2: So hītiādinā purimapaṭiññāya imassa codanassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:539_4: saddena sahajātādipaccaye saṅgaṇhitvā tesu tena tena paccayabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:547_1: Atidūrassa antaritassa pattabbassa desassa dassanato dibbacakkhuko viya.
tika-abh03t:547_2: Ākāsena pathavantaraṭṭhānāni bhinditvā gamanato iddhimā viya.
tika-abh03t:547_3: Na sahadhammenāti yadi so bhavānaṃ antarā na siyā,
tika-abh03t:547_4: na nāma antarābhavoti paṭikkhepe karaṇaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:548_1: Tattha jātijarāmaraṇāni ceva cutipaṭisandhiparamparañca anicchantoti etena cutianantaraṃ antarābhavaṃ khandhāti,
tika-abh03t:548_3: mātukucchimeva paviṭṭhā antaradhāyamānā maraṇanti na icchati.
tika-abh03t:549_1: Yathā kāmabhavādīsu tattha tattheva punappunaṃ cavitvā upapattivasena cutipaṭisandhiparamparā hoti,
tika-abh03t:549_2: evaṃ taṃ tattha na icchatīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:552_1: Kāmabhavassa kamanaṭṭhena kāmabhavabhāvo sabbepi kāmāvacarā khandhādayo kāmabhavoti iminā adhippāyena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:552_5: kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāyāti pañceva kāmakoṭṭhāsā “kāmo”ti vuttāti kāmadhātūtivacanaṃ na aññassa
tika-abh03t:552_6: nāmanti iminā adhippāyenevaṃ vacanamattaṃ nissāyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:555_1: Rūpadhātukathāyaṃ rūpadhātūti vacanato rūpīdhammeheva rūpadhātuyā bhavitabbanti laddhi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:558_1: Imināvupāyenāti yathā hi purimakathāyaṃ rūpino dhammā avisesena “rūpadhātū”ti vuttā,
tika-abh03t:558_2: evamidhāpi arūpino dhammā avisesena “arūpadhātū”ti vuttāti tattha vuttanayo idhāpi samānoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:561_2: Nimittanti ghānādīnaṃ okāsabhāvena upalakkhitaṃ tathāvidhasaṇṭhānaṃ rūpasamudāyamāha.
tika-abh03t:564_0: 524-526. Sukhumarūpaṃ atthi, yato nissaraṇaṃ taṃ āruppanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:567_4: sabbaṃ taṃ akusala”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t:570_1: Arūpajīvitindriyantipañhe “atthi arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyū”tiādikaṃ pañhaṃ antaṃ gahetvā vadati.
tika-abh03t:570_2: Arūpadhammānaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ jīvitindriyasantānaṃ nāma atthīti icchatīti ettha rūpārūpadhammānaṃ taṃ
tika-abh03t:570_3: icchanto arūpadhammānaṃ icchatīti vattuṃ yuttoti “arūpadhammāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:571_0: 541. Sattasantāne rūpino vā dhammā hontūtiādināpi tameva jīvitindriyasantānaṃ vadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:572_0: 542. Pubbāparabhāgaṃ sandhāyāti samāpattiyā āsannabhāvato tadāpi samāpannoyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:576_1: Sesanti pāṇātipātādikammassa hetūti ito purimaṃ sotāpannādianuyogaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t:576_2: Handa hīti paravādissevetaṃ sampaṭicchanavacananti sampaṭicchāpetunti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh03t:576_3: “katamassa kammassa hetū”ti pana sakavādī taṃ sampaṭicchāpetuṃ vadatīti yujjeyya,
tika-abh03t:576_4: sampaṭicchāpetunti pana pakkhaṃ paṭijānāpetunti atthaṃ aggahetvā paravādī attano laddhiṃ sakavādiṃ gāhāpetunti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:581_2: Nānācittavasena paṭijānantassa adhippāyamaddanaṃ kathaṃ yuttanti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:581_3: Ārammaṇavasena hi dassanadvayaṃ saha vadantassa tadabhāvadassanatthaṃ idaṃ āraddhanti yuttanti.
tika-abh03t:581_4: Anussavavasenātiādinā na kevalaṃ aniccādiārammaṇameva ñāṇaṃ vipassanā,
tika-abh03t:581_5: atha kho “anuppādo khema”ntiādikaṃ nibbāne ānisaṃsadassanañcāti dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:584_3: nibbānassetaṃ adhivacana”nti asaṃyojaniyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya khemādibhāvo vuttoti evamādinā suttabhayenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:587_1: Ārammaṇatthassa vibhāgadassanatthanti paccayaṭṭho olubbhaṭṭhoti evaṃ vibhāge vijjamāne paccayolubbhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:587_2: visesābhāvaṃ kappetvā akappetvā vā sappaccayattā olubbhārammaṇenapi sārammaṇamevāti na gahetabbanti dassanatthanti
tika-abh03t:590_0: 554-556. Appahīnattāva atthīti vuccati, na pana vijjamānattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:599_1: Sabbasoti savitakkacittesu sabbattha sabbadā vāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “antamaso manodhātupavattikālepī”ti.
tika-abh03t:602_0: 565. Anāpattīti visaṃvādanādhippāyassa abhāvā musāvādo na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:605_5: Lābhīti vuccati ayaṃ paṭilābhapaññatti nāmāti vā adhippāyo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t:610_1: Bhavaṅgacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena sahevātiādiṃ vadantena kiriyakhandhānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇena saha upapattesiyā khandhā uppajjantīti ca vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:613_1: Taṃ lakkhaṇanti “cha viññāṇā”ti avatvā “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā”tiādinā vuttaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t:613_2: “Cha viññāṇā”ti avacanaṃ panettha “no ca vata re vattabbe”tiādivacanassa kāraṇanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh03t:614_2: Yaṃ tattha animittanti cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgikkhaṇe yaṃ animittaṃ gaṇhanto na nimittaggāhīti vutto,
tika-abh03t:617_1: Kusalākusalavasena namīti kusalākusalabhāvena namitvā pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:617_2: Sā pana ārammaṇappakāraggahaṇaṃ yena alobhādīhi lobhādīhi ca sampayogo hotīti daṭṭhabbo “sukhamiti cetaso abhāgo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh03t:620_4: Vītikkamaṃ viyāti yathā vītikkame kate dussīlo,
tika-abh03t:620_5: evaṃ niruddhepīti evaṃ vītikkamena ninnānaṃ sallakkhentoti attho.
tika-abh03t:623_1: Yena so sīlavāyeva nāma hotīti yena cittavippayuttena ṭhitena upacayena akusalābyākatacittasamaṅgī sīlavāyeva nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:623_2: Sesamettha “dānaṃ acetasika”nti kathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:629_1: Āṇattiyā ca pāṇātipātādīsu aṅgapāripūrinti ekasmiṃ divase āṇattassa aparasmiṃ divase pāṇātipātaṃ karontassa
tika-abh03t:629_2: tadā sā āṇatti viññattiṃ vināyeva aṅgaṃ hotīti aviññatti dussīlyanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:635_1: Ñāṇakathāyaṃ seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānanti pubbe ñāṇaṃanārammaṇantikathāyaṃ vuttehi andhakehi aññe idha mahāsaṅghikā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh03t:635_2: Yadi aññāṇe vigatetiādinā rāgavigamo viya vītarāgapaññattiyā aññāṇavigamo ñāṇīpaññattiyā kāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:635_3: Na hi ñāṇaṃ assa atthīti ñāṇī,
tika-abh03t:635_5: Yasmā ñāṇapaṭilābhenāti ettha ca ñāṇapaṭilābhena aññāṇassa vigatattā so ñāṇīti vattabbataṃ āpajjatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:638_0: 618-620. Itaro pana sakasamayeti paravādī attano samayeti attho.
tika-abh03t:641_1: Kammassa vipākavasena vāti nirayaṃva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:641_2: Tattha hi abbudādiparicchedo tādisassa kammavipākassa vasena vutto.
tika-abh03t:641_3: Vassagaṇanāya vāti manusse cātumahārājikādideve ca sandhāya.
tika-abh03t:641_4: Tesañhi asaṅkhyeyampi kālaṃ vipākadānasamatthaṃ kammaṃ vassagaṇanāya paricchijjatīti.
tika-abh03t:644_1: Samādhānaṭṭhenāti samaṃ ṭhapanaṭṭhena samādhi nāma cetasikantaraṃ atthīti aggahetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:644_2: Chalenāti ekacittakkhaṇikatte cakkhuviññāṇassa ca jhānacittassa ca na koci visesoti etena sāmaññamattenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:647_1: Anantarapaccayatañcevāti avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ anantarapaccayo avijjāya yā ṭhitatā tato hoti,
tika-abh03t:647_2: tāya ṭhitatāya anantarapaccayabhāvasaṅkhātā ṭhitatā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:647_3: Anantarapaccayaggahaṇañcettha aññamaññapaccayabhāvarahitassa ekassa paccayassa dassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:647_4: Tena hi sabbo tādiso paccayo dassito hotīti.
tika-abh03t:647_7: Tattha avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvasaṅkhātāya ṭhitatāya saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāya paccayabhāvasaṅkhātā ṭhitatā hoti,
tika-abh03t:650_1: Rūpādayo viya parinipphannāti rūpādīhi saha uppajjitvā nirujjhanato parinipphannāti attho.
tika-abh03t:650_2: Aniccatāvibhāgānuyuñjanavasenāti tīsu daṇḍesu daṇḍavohāro viya tīsu lakkhaṇesu aniccatāvohāro hotīti tassā vibhāgānuyuñjanavasenāti vadanti.
tika-abh03t:658_1: Abyākataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepoti sakasamayalakkhaṇena paṭikkhepo katoti vadanti.
tika-abh03t:658_2: Avipākacetanāya sarūpena dassitāya savipākāpi dassitāyeva nāma hotīti maññamāno āha “savipākāvipākacetanaṃ sarūpena dassetu”nti.
tika-abh03t:661_1: Kammasamuṭṭhānā arūpadhammāvātiādinā kammasamuṭṭhānesu cakkhādīsupi vipākavohāro natthi,
tika-abh03t:661_2: ko pana vādo akammasamuṭṭhāne saddeti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:664_0: 638-640. Tasmā vipākoti avisesena saḷāyatanaṃ vipākoti yesaṃ laddhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:667_3: Tvaṃ panassa niyāmaṃ icchasīti avinipātadhammatāphalappattīhi aññasmiṃ sattakkhattuparamabhāve ca niyāmaṃ icchasīti attho.
tika-abh03t:668_0: Ānantariyābhāvanti yena so dhammābhisamayena bhabbo nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t:668_8: tathāpi bhavaniyāmassa kassaci abhāvā bhabboti vuccati.
tika-abh03t:668_9: Yathā kusalā abhiññācetanā kadāci vipākaṃ adadamānāpi sati kāraṇe dātuṃ bhabbatāya vipākadhammadhammā nāma,
tika-abh03t:668_12: na ca indriyamudutā abhabbatākaro dhammoti na so abhabbo nāma.
tika-abh03t:668_14: na pana antarā abhisametuṃ bhabbatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t:668_17: Visesaṃ pana akatvā bhabbasabhāvatāya bhabboti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:668_18: Na bhavaniyāmakaṃ kiñcīti ettha passitvāti vacanaseso,
tika-abh03t:676_1: Anantarāpayuttakathāyaṃ ānantariyaṃ payuttaṃ etenāti anantarāpayuttoti ānantariye anantarāsaddaṃ āropetvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ attho vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:679_1: Sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāmāti ettha appattaniyāmānaṃ dhamme sandhāya “tebhūmakadhammā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:679_2: Eteva hi sandhāya “tehi samannāgatopi aniyatoyevā”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t:679_3: Iti imaṃ vohāramattaṃ gahetvā “niyato bodhisatto pacchimabhaviko bhabbo dhammaṃ abhisametuṃ okkamitu”nti
tika-abh03t:679_6: dhammaṃ abhisametuṃ bhabbatā ca “niyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti vacanassa kāraṇabhāvena vuttā hoti,
tika-abh03t:679_11: na ca taṃ atthīti dassanatthanti attho.
tika-abh03t:682_1: Asātarāgakathāyaṃ “aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā”ti rajjanāti iminā evaṃ pavattamānoyeva lobho idha “rāgo”ti adhippeto,
tika-abh03t:686_2: tasmā abyākatāti kusalesu dhammesu lokuttaresu vā sabbesu taṇhā “dhammataṇhā”ti gahetvā yasmā sā taṇhā,
tika-abh03t:686_5: tasmā akusalā na hotīti abyākatāti laddhīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:686_6: Tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi taṇhā saṃkhipitvā dassitā,
tika-abh03t:686_7: tasmā dhammataṇhāpi kāmataṇhādibhāvato na abyākatāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:691_1: Tanti kusalaṃ akusalañcāti visuṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:694_1: Keci vādino “aṅkure sākhāviṭapādisampannānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ bījamattaṃ āvibhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti vadantīti tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:697_1: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti ettha “laddhivasena paṭijānātī”ti anantaruppattiṃ
tika-abh03t:697_2: sallakkhentopi na so cakkhumhi rūpārammaṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ icchati,
tika-abh03t:697_3: atha kho sotamhiyeva saddārammaṇanti anantarūpaladdhivasena āpannattā “paṭijānātī”ti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:700_0: 698-699. Sammāvācādi rūpaṃ maggo cāti icchanto “ariyarūpa”ntipi vadati.
tika-abh03t:703_1: “Sarāgotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye rāgassa appahīnattā sarāgoti vattabbata”nti purimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t:703_2: “sānusayotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye anusayassa appahīnattā sānusayoti vattabbata”nti pacchimapāṭho, so yutto.
tika-abh03t:709_5: rūpadhātudhammesu aññatarabhāvena rūpadhātupariyāpannoti ca pucchitabhāvaṃ asallakkhentoti attho.
tika-abh03t:712_5: tasmā sabbathāpi diṭṭhigataṃ “abyākata”nti na vattabbanti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:715_1: Tasmāti yasmā diṭṭhirāgānaṃ samāne vikkhambhanabhāvepi “vītarāgo”ti vuccati,
tika-abh03t:715_3: tasmā diṭṭhi lokiyapariyāpannā na hotīti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh03t:715_4: Rūpadiṭṭhiyā abhāvā pana kāmadhātupariyāpannāya diṭṭhiyā bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:715_6: tathā ca sati kāmarāgo viya jhānalābhino diṭṭhipi vigaccheyyāti “vigatadiṭṭhiko”ti vattabbo siyā,
tika-abh03t:715_9: Na hi sā tassa avigatā diṭṭhi kāmarāgo viya kāmadiṭṭhi yena kāmadhātuyā pariyāpannā siyāti vadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:720_1: Tasmā paccayatā vavatthitāti hetupaccayabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvādinā viya adhipatipaccayatādinā
tika-abh03t:720_2: ca na bhavitabbanti hetupaccayabhāvoyevetassa vavatthito hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:723_1: Apuññābhisaṅkhārova gahito “nanu avijjā saṅkhārena sahajātā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:723_2: Sahajātaaññamaññaatthiavigatasampayuttavasenāti ettha nissayo kamabhedena atthiggahaṇena gahito hotīti na vutto,
tika-abh03t:723_4: Vakkhati hi “tīṇi upādānāni avijjāya saṅkhārā viya taṇhāya paccayā hontī”ti,
tika-abh03t:723_5: tasmā upādānehi samānā evettha saṅkhārānaṃ paccayatā dassitāti.
tika-abh03t:726_1: Tatiyasaññāvedayitakathāyaṃ sesasatte sandhāyāti nirodhasamāpannato aññe yesaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:726_3: asaññasattānampi ca saññuppādā cutiṃ icchantīti sesasabbasatte sandhāyāti vā.
tika-abh03t:727_0: 733-734. Suttavirodho siyāti idaṃ paravādiṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:730_1: Saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanā asaññasamāpattipīti laddhikittane saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanaṃ
tika-abh03t:730_4: Yasmā asaññasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa alobhādayo atthīti ettha sakasamayasiddhā catutthajjhānasamāpatti “asaññasamāpattī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t:731_2: na saññāya abhāvatoti catutthajjhānasamāpattimeva sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh03t:735_1: Tasmāti tiṇṇampi ekakkhaṇe sabbhāvato tiṇṇaṃ phassānañca samodhānā ca ekattaṃ pucchatīti adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:741_3: evarūpaṃ nāma anuppadinnaṃ bhavituṃ na arahati aññassa asakkuṇeyyattāti laddhimattena paṭijānāti,
tika-abh03t:744_1: Taṃcittatāyāti tadeva ārammaṇabhūtaṃ cittaṃ etassāti taṃcitto,
tika-abh03t:744_4: Taṃ vā ālambakaṃ ālambitabbañca cittaṃ taṃcittaṃ,
tika-abh03t:747_3: Yañcettha “atthi rūpaṃ arūpāvacara”nti arūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:752_1: Cittaṃ anādiyitvāti “kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato”ti vuttaṃ kiriyacittaṃ abyākataṃ anādiyitvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:755_1: Ayoniso gahetvāti aladdhavipākavārānampi kammānaṃ byantībhāvaṃ na vadāmīti atthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:755_2: Keci pana “kammānaṃ vipākaṃ appaṭisaṃviditvā puggalassa byantībhāvaṃ na vadāmīti evaṃ ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh03t:756_1: Tāva na kamatīti laddhiyā paṭikkhipatīti tāva na kamati,
tika-abh03t:756_2: tato paraṃ kamatīti laddhiyā paṭikkhipatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:756_3: Ettha kira “sati jīvite jīvitāvasese jīvitā voropetī”ti vacanato attano dhammatāya marantaṃ koṭṭentassa
tika-abh03t:756_4: vā sīsaṃ vā chindantassa natthi pāṇātipātoti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-abh03t:756_5: Pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacittaupakkamamaraṇesu vijjamānesupi na tena upakkamena matoti natthi pāṇātipātoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:756_6: Evaṃ pana marantena tena ekacittavārampi dhammatāmaraṇato orato na matoti dubbiññeyyametaṃ.
tika-abh03t:759_1: Bījato aṅkurassevāti yathā aṅkurassa abījato nibbatti natthi,
tika-abh03t:759_2: tathā paccuppannapavattassapi akammato kammavipākato nibbatti natthi,
tika-abh03t:759_4: Deyyadhammavasena dānaphalaṃ pucchatīti deyyadhammavasena yāya cetanāya taṃ deti,
tika-abh03t:762_1: Vināpi aniccattenāti “yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu viya dukkhārammaṇattenapi dukkhaṃ vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:765_1: Navattabbaṃsaṅghodakkhiṇaṃvisodhetītikathāyaṃ na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkontīti yathā puggalo
tika-abh03t:765_2: sīlaparisodhanādīni katvā nirodhampi samāpajjitvā visodhetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh03t:768_1: Dakkhiṇāvisuddhikathāyaṃ visujjheyyāti etassa atthaṃ dassento “mahapphalā bhaveyyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:768_2: Dāyakasseva cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotīti paṭiggāhakanirapekkhā paṭiggāhakena paccayabhūtena vinā dāyakeneva mahāvipākacetanattaṃ āpādikā,
tika-abh03t:768_4: Añño aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā nāma paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t:768_7: paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyyā”ti vuttanti?
tika-abh03t:768_9: paṭiggāhakena vipākanibbattanampi pana dānacetanānibbattanena yadi bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t:768_10: evaṃ sati añño aññassa kārakoti yuttarūpaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:776_0: 804-806. Tassa ca desanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sayameva ca āyasmatā ānandattherena desitoti vadati.
tika-abh03t:779_1: Jhānasaṅkantikathāyaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāti paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vitakkavicārā ādīnavato manasikātabbā,
tika-abh03t:779_2: tato dutiyajjhānena bhavitabbanti evaṃ yo upacārānaṃ jhānānañca anukkamo,
tika-abh03t:782_1: Jhānantarikā nāma esāti paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññatarabhāvābhāvato na jhānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:782_2: atha kho dakkhiṇapubbādidisantarikā viya jhānantarikā nāma esāti. Katarā?
tika-abh03t:785_1: Paṭijānanaṃ sandhāyāti “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ manoviññāṇapaṭijānanaṃ kira sandhāyāti adhippāyo,
tika-abh03t:785_2: tasmā “evaṃ sante rūpaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ āpajjatīti manoviññāṇapaṭijānanaṃ pana rūpadassanaṃ kathaṃ hotī”ti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:790_5: na ca uppannāti atīte kilese pajahatītiādi na vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:793_1: Anattalakkhaṇaṃ tāva ekaccanti arūpakkhandhānaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t:793_3: Rūpakkhandhādīnañhi mā jīratu mā maratūti alabbhaneyyo avasavattanākāro anattatā,
tika-abh03t:793_5: tañca “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti vuttattā arūpakkhandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannanti ayametesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:799_1: Rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātāti ettha rūpādīnaṃ sabhāvatāti rūpādisabhāvatāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:805_1: “Sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāyāti tāya jātiyā lokuttarasaddhādīnaṃ anuppattiṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:805_2: kataṃ avadhāraṇaṃ saṃsārakhāṇukabhāvaṃ sandhāya katanti maññamāno puthujjanassāyaṃ accantaniyāmatā,
tika-abh03t:805_4: Vicikicchuppatti niyāmantaruppatti ca accantaniyāmanivattakā vicāretvā gahetabbā.
tika-abh03t:808_1: Lokiyānampīti lokuttarānaṃ viya lokiyānampi saddhādīnaṃyeva saddhindriyādibhāvadassanena lokiyasaddhindriyādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:808_2: sādhetuṃ saddhādīnaṃyeva saddhindriyādibhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:813_1: Ñāṇakathāyaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānātīti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpetīti “dukkhaṃ parijānātī”ti vadanto idaṃ tava vacanaṃ lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti,
tika-abh03t:813_4: tasmā na idaṃ sādhakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:819_1: Tassa atthitāya paṭiññāti tassa hatthināgassa ca dibbayānassa ca atthitāyāti visuṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:822_1: Ñāṇakathāyaṃ sace taṃ dvādasavatthukanti ettha ca “lokuttara”nti vacanaseso,
tika-abh03t:822_2: taṃ vā lokuttarañāṇaṃ sace dvādasavatthukanti attho.
tika-abh03t:822_5: saccañāṇaṃ pana maggakkhaṇepi parijānanādikiccasādhanavasena hotīti āha “saddhiṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehī”ti.
tika-abh03t:828_1: Tīsupi pucchāsu codanatthaṃ vuttanti tīsupi pucchāsu “sāsana”ntiādivacanaṃ vuttanti samudāyā ekadesānaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:831_1: Iddhikathāyaṃ atthi adhippāyaiddhīti adhippāyavasena ijjhanato adhippāyoti evaṃnāmikā iddhi atthīti attho.
tika-abh03t:834_1: Dhammakathāyaṃ rūpaṭṭhato aññassa rūpassa abhāvāti yo rūpassa niyāmo vucceyya,
tika-abh03t:834_2: so rūpaṭṭho nāma koci rūpato añño natthīti rūpaṭṭhato aññaṃ rūpañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t:834_4: na vedanādisabhāvanti adhippāyena “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:834_6: Tattha rūpato aññassa rūpaṭṭhassa abhāve dassite rūpaṭṭhato aññassa rūpassa abhāvo dassitoyeva nāma hotīti
tika-abh03t:834_7: tameva rūpato aññassa rūpaṭṭhassa abhāvaṃ dassento “rūpasabhāvo hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:834_9: rūpassa attho rūpaṭṭhoti evaṃ aññattaṃ gahetvā viya pavatto rūpasabhāvavohāro rūpaṭṭhavohāro vā vedanādīhi
tika-abh03t:834_10: nānattameva so sabhāvoti nānattasaññāpanatthaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:834_13: na vedanādisabhāva”nti avatvā “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti vadato tañca vacanaṃ vuttappakārena sadosaṃ,
tika-abh03t:834_14: atha kasmā “rūpañhi rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti rūpaṃ rūpameva,
tika-abh03t:834_15: na vedanādisabhāvanti adhippāyena vattabba”nti vadanto “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti paṭijānātīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:834_17: na parenāti paṭijānātīti na vattabbanti? Na,
tika-abh03t:834_19: Vattabbanti vā sakavādinā vattabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:834_20: Yadi ca tena vattabbaṃ paṭijānāti ca so etamatthanti,
tika-abh03t:834_21: atha kasmā paṭijānāti sakavādīti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh03t:834_22: Atthantaravasenāti tattha vuttameva kāraṇaṃ nigūhitvā parena coditanti tameva kāraṇaṃ dassetvā codanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-abh03t:834_23: Ito aññathāti rūpādisabhāvamattaṃ muñcitvā tena parikappitaṃ niyataṃ natthīti tassa parikappitassa nivattanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:845_1: Sattavassikaṃ gabbhaṃ disvā “gabbheyeva arahattappattihetubhūto indriyaparipāko atthī”ti “arahattappattipi atthī”ti maññati,
tika-abh03t:845_2: ākāsasupinaṃ disvā “ākāsagamanādiabhiññā viya dhammābhisamayo arahattappatti ca atthī”ti maññatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:848_1: Na koci āsevanapaccayaṃ āsevati nāmāti yathā bījaṃ catumadhurabhāvaṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-abh03t:848_2: evaṃ bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ āsevanapaccayaṃ gaṇhanto āsevanto nāma koci natthīti attho.
tika-abh03t:851_1: Pathaviyādirūpesu kesañci uppādo kesañci nirodhoti evaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ rūpasantatiyā hoti.
tika-abh03t:851_3: yehi arūpasantatiyā viya rūpasantatiyā pavatti siyāti citte “citte mahāpathavī saṇṭhātī”tiādi coditaṃ.
tika-abh03t:856_1: Karuṇādhippāyena ekādhippāyoti rāgādhippāyato aññādhippāyovāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:856_2: Eko adhippāyoti ettha ekatobhāve ekasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:856_3: Samānatthe hi sati rāgādhippāyepi ekādhippāyenāti ekādhippāyatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:859_3: Issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā karīyatīti ettha dukkarakārikā nāma issariyakāmakārikāhetu
tika-abh03t:859_5: issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma vinā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyamānā natthīti vā.
tika-abh03t:862_1: Mettādayo sandhāya “mettādayo viya na rāgo rāgapatirūpako koci atthīti rāgameva gaṇhāti,
tika-abh03t:865_1: Na aniccādibhāvanti ettha aniccādiko bhāvo etassāti aniccādibhāvanti rūpaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:865_2: “Na kevalañhi paṭhamasaccameva dukkha”nti vadantena “dukkhaññeva parinipphanna”nti dukkhasaccaṃ sandhāya pucchā katāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:865_3: Evaṃ sati tena “cakkhāyatanaṃ aparinipphanna”ntiādi na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:865_4: Na hi cakkhāyatanādīni anupādinnāni lokuttarāni vā.
tika-abh03t:865_6: na pana rūpa”nti etaṃ rūpassa ca dukkhattā no vata re vattabbeti attho.
tika-abh03t:872_0: Kathāvatthupakaraṇena saṅkhepeneva desitena dhammesu viparītaggahaṇaṃ nivāretvā tesveva dhammesu dhammasaṅgahādīsu
tika-abh03t:872_1: pakāsitesu dhammapuggalokāsādinissayānaṃ sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayānaṃ vasena nānappakārakaosallatthaṃ yamakapakaraṇaṃ āraddhaṃ,
tika-abh03t:872_2: taṃ samayadesadesakavaseneva dassetvā saṃvaṇṇanākkamañcassa anuppattaṃ “āgato bhāro avassaṃ vahitabbo”ti
tika-abh03t:873_0: Tattha yamassa visayātītoti jātiyā sati maraṇaṃ hotīti jāti,
tika-abh03t:873_5: “Chaccābhiṭhānāni abhabba kātu”nti vuttānaṃ channaṃ abhabbaṭṭhānānaṃ desakoti chaṭṭhānadesako.
tika-abh03t:873_6: Ayamā ekekā hutvā āvattā nīlā amalā ca tanuruhā assāti ayamāvattanīlāmalatanuruho.
tika-abh03t:877_1: Yamakānaṃ vasena desitattāti iminā dasasu ekekassa yamakasamūhassa taṃsamūhassa ca sakalassa pakaraṇassa yamakānaṃ vasena laddhavohārataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:878_0: Kusalākusalamūlasaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena atthayamakanti etena “ye keci kusalā dhammā,
tika-abh03t:878_1: sabbe te kusalamūlā”ti etasseva yamakabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t:878_2: Nāpajjati ñātuṃ icchitānaṃ dutiyapaṭhamapucchāsu vuttānaṃ kusalakusalamūlavisesānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:878_3: kusalamūlakusalavisesehi vā ñātuṃ icchitānaṃ paṭhamadutiyapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitānaṃ kusalakusalamūlānaṃ
tika-abh03t:878_6: taṃvisesavataṃ vā dhammānañca visesāpekkhānaṃ ettha padhānabhāvoti ekekāya pucchāya ekeko eva attho saṅgahito hotīti.
tika-abh03t:878_7: Atthasaddo cettha na dhammavācako hetuphalādivācako vā,
tika-abh03t:879_0: Tīṇipi padāni ekato katvāti idaṃ nāmapadassa kusalādīnaṃ saṅgāhakattamattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:879_2: Sabbakusalādisaṅgaṇhanatthameva ca nāmapadassa vuttattā “kusalattikamātikāya catūsu padesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:882_1: Aññamaññayamake ye keci kusalāti apucchitvāti ettha yathā dutiyayamake “ye keci kusalamūlā”ti apucchitvā “ye keci kusalā”ti pucchā katā,
tika-abh03t:882_2: evamidhāpi “ye keci kusalā”ti pucchā kātabbā siyā purimayamakavisiṭṭhaṃ apubbaṃ gahetvā pacchimayamakassa appavattattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:882_4: Purimapucchāya pana atthavasena katāya tadanurūpāya pacchimapucchāya bhavitabbaṃ anulome vigatasaṃsayassa paṭilome saṃsayuppattito.
tika-abh03t:882_5: Tena na ca pacchimapucchānurūpāya purimapucchāya bhavitabbanti purimovettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t:882_6: Imināpi byañjanena tassevatthassa sambhavatoti idamevaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:882_7: Na hi kusalabyañjanattho eva kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanattho,
tika-abh03t:882_9: Kusalabyañjanena hi pucchāya katāya “avasesā”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne “avasesā kusalā dhammā”ti vattabbaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:882_11: na ca tāni vacanāni samānatthāni kusalakusalābyākatadīpanatoti.
tika-abh03t:882_13: “ye keci kusalā”ti imināpi byañjanena “ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti vuttabyañjanatthasseva sambhavato
tika-abh03t:882_14: dutiyayamake viya apucchitvā “ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti pucchā katā.
tika-abh03t:882_15: Na hi kusalamūlehi viya kusalamūlena ekamūlehi aññe kusalā santi,
tika-abh03t:883_0: Paṭilomapucchāvaṇṇanāyaṃ “kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti hi pucchāya katāya “mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī”ti
tika-abh03t:883_1: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:883_4: sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti ca pucchite “āmantā” icceva vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:883_5: Na hi kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlesu kiñci ekamūlaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t:883_6: yena anulomapucchāya viya vibhāgo kātabbo bhaveyya.
tika-abh03t:883_8: tattha tāni aññamaññamūlāni ekamūlāni ca dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ ekekena aññamaññekamūlattā.
tika-abh03t:883_11: na ekamūlānīti etassa gahaṇassa nivāraṇatthaṃ “mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī”tiādinā vissajjanaṃ kātabbanti ce? Na,
tika-abh03t:883_12: “āmantā”ti imināva vissajjanena taṃgahaṇanivāraṇato anulomapucchāvissajjanena ca ekato uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t:883_17: Tesu hi ekekaṃ itarena mūlena taṃmūlehi aññehi samānamūlanti.
tika-abh03t:884_0: Aññamaññamūlatte pana nicchite ekamūlattasaṃsayābhāvato “sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti pucchā na katāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:884_2: samānatthena ekaṃ mūlaṃ etesanti ekamūlā”ti ubhayampi vacanaṃ mūlayuttatameva vadati,
tika-abh03t:884_4: Tattha mūlayogasāmaññe ekamūlatte nicchite tabbiseso aññamaññamūlabhāvo na nicchito hotīti anulomapucchā pavattā,
tika-abh03t:884_5: mūlayogavisese pana aññamaññamūlatte nicchite na vinā ekamūlattena aññamaññamūlattaṃ atthīti mūlayogasāmaññaṃ ekamūlattaṃ nicchitameva hoti,
tika-abh03t:884_6: tasmā “ekamūlā”ti pucchaṃ akatvā yathā kusalamūlavacanaṃ ekamūlavacanañca kusalabhāvadīpakaṃ na hotīti
tika-abh03t:884_7: kusalabhāve saṃsayasabbhāvā paṭhamadutiyayamakesu “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti paṭilomapucchā katā,
tika-abh03t:884_8: evaṃ aññamaññamūlavacanaṃ kusalabhāvadīpakaṃ na hotīti kusalabhāve saṃsayasabbhāvā kusalādhikārassa ca
tika-abh03t:884_9: anuvattamānattā “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti paṭilomapucchā katāti.
tika-abh03t:885_1: Mūlanaye vutte eva atthe kusalamūlabhāvena mūlassa visesanena samānena mūlena aññamaññassa ca mūlena
tika-abh03t:885_2: mūlayogadīpanena cāti iminā pariyāyantarena pakāsetuṃ mūlamūlanayo vutto.
tika-abh03t:885_4: kārena tīsupi yamakesu mūlayogameva dīpetuṃ mūlakanayo vutto.
tika-abh03t:886_1: Abbohārikaṃ katvāti na ekamūlabhāvaṃ labhamānehi ekato labbhamānattā sahetukavohārarahitaṃ katvā.
tika-abh03t:886_2: Na vā sahetukaduke viya ettha hetupaccayayogāyogavasena abbohārikaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:886_5: Ekato labbhamānakavasenāti ahetukacittuppādanibbānehi hetupaccayarahitehi saha labbhamānakarūpavasenāti attho.
tika-abh03t:887_3: tattha “ye keci nāmā dhammā”ti nāmānaṃ niddhāritattā “ahetukaṃ sahetuka”nti ca vutte “nāma”nti ca idaṃ viññāyamānamevāti na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:893_1: Khandhayamake chasu kālabhedesu puggalaokāsapuggalokāsavasena khandhānaṃ uppādanirodhā tesaṃ pariññā ca vattabbā.
tika-abh03t:893_2: Te pana khandhā “rūpakkhandho”tiādīhi pañcahi padehi vuccanti,
tika-abh03t:893_7: so eva avayavapadassāti etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne rūpādiavayavapadehi vutto ekadeso sakalo vā samudāyapadānaṃ attho,
tika-abh03t:893_8: samudāyapadehi pana vutto ekantena rūpādiavayavapadānaṃ atthoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho,
tika-abh03t:894_0: Puna “rūpakkhandho”tiādīnaṃ samāsapadānaṃ uttarapadatthappadhānattā padhānabhūtassa khandhapadassa vedanādiupapadatthassa
tika-abh03t:894_1: ca sambhavato yathā “rūpakkhandho”ti etasmiṃ pade rūpāvayavapadena vuttassa rūpakkhandhabhāvo hoti rūpasaddassa
tika-abh03t:894_3: evaṃ tattha padhānabhūtena khandhāvayavapadena vuttassa vedanākkhandhādibhāvo hoti khandhapadena vedanādipadānaṃ
tika-abh03t:894_4: samānādhikaraṇattāti etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne khandhāvayavapadena vutto dhammo koci kenaci samudāyapadena vuccati,
tika-abh03t:894_5: na sabbo sabbenāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho,
tika-abh03t:895_3: sabbeva khandhā kiṃ khandhavisesanabhūtena rūpena visesitabbāti,
tika-abh03t:895_6: Niddese “khandhā rūpakkhandho”ti padaṃ uddharitvā vissajjanaṃ katanti.
tika-abh03t:895_7: Evaṃ etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne na khandhato aññaṃ rūpaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:895_8: teneva cetena rūpasaddena vuccamānaṃ suddhena khandhasaddena vuccate,
tika-abh03t:895_9: na ca sabbe khandhā khandhavisesanabhūtena rūpena visesitabbā,
tika-abh03t:895_11: esa nayo vedanākkhandhādīsupīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ khandho,
tika-abh03t:896_0: Tato “rūpaṃ khandho”ti etasmiṃ anuññāyamāne “na kevalaṃ ayaṃ khandhasaddo rūpavisesanova,
tika-abh03t:896_1: atha kho vedanādivisesano cā”ti rūpassa khandhabhāvanicchayānantaraṃ khandhānaṃ rūpavisesanayoge ca saṃsayo hoti.
tika-abh03t:896_3: atha kho keci kenaci visesanena yuñjantīti dassetuṃ suddhakhandhamūlacakkavāro vuttoti.
tika-abh03t:896_5: tesaṃ khandhānaṃ paṇṇattisodhanavasena tannicchayatthaṃ paṇṇattivāro vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:897_0: Cattāri cattāri cakkāni bandhitvāti ettha cakkāvayavabhāvato cakkānīti yamakāni vuttāni ekekakhandhamūlāni cattāri cattāri yamakāni bandhitvāti.
tika-abh03t:897_2: Cattāri cattāri yamakāni yathā ekekakhandhamūlakāni honti,
tika-abh03t:897_4: Tattha “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho”ti evamādikaṃ mūlapadaṃ nābhiṃ katvā “khandhā”ti idaṃ nemiṃ,
tika-abh03t:897_7: Vedanākkhandhamūlakādīsupi hi heṭṭhimaṃ sodhetvāva pāṭho gato,
tika-abh03t:897_9: Teneva ca kāraṇenāti suddhakhandhalābhamattameva gahetvā khandhavisesane rūpādimhi suddharūpādimattatāya
tika-abh03t:897_10: aṭṭhatvā khandhavisesanabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ rūpādiatthaṃ dassetuṃ khandhasaddena saha yojetvā “khandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā
tika-abh03t:897_11: nayena padaṃ uddharitvā atthassa vibhattattāti attho.
tika-abh03t:900_10: rūpavicāro”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ taṇhāvatthubhūtaṃ tebhūmakaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:900_12: taṃ ekadesena rūpakkhandho hotīti āha “piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho”ti.
tika-abh03t:900_14: na ruppanasabhāvenāti “piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:900_19: “saññāvirattassa na santi ganthā”ti ca evamādīsu hi diṭṭhi ca “saññā”ti vuttāti.
tika-abh03t:901_2: Āmantā”ti evaṃ khandhasaddappavattiyā abhāve vedanākkhandhasaddappavattiyā ca abhāvoti paṇṇattisodhanamattameva karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:902_1: Rūpato aññe vedanādayoti ettha lokuttarā vedanādayo daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:902_2: Te hi piyarūpā ca sātarūpā ca na honti taṇhāya anārammaṇattāti rūpato aññe hontīti.
tika-abh03t:902_3: Rūpañca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā avasesāti idampi etehi saddhiṃ na-
tika-abh03t:902_5: Evañca katvā “cakkhuñca āyatane ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā”tiādiṃ vakkhati.
tika-abh03t:902_6: Na hi tattha avasesaggahaṇena gayhamānaṃ kañci atthi.
tika-abh03t:902_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avijjamānepi vijjamānaṃ upādāya itthipurisādiggahaṇasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya avasesāti ettha paññattiyā gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:905_1: Pavattivāre vedanākkhandhādimūlakāni pacchimeneva saha yojetvā tīṇi dve ekañca yamakāni vuttāni,
tika-abh03t:905_4: Purimassa hi pacchimena yojitayamakameva pacchimassa purimena yojanāya pucchānaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā vucceyya,
tika-abh03t:905_11: anāgatenātītoti ete pana tayo yathādassitā missakakālabhedā eva tayo,
tika-abh03t:905_13: Tattha tattha hi paṭilomapucchāhi atītena paccuppannādayo kālabhedā dassitā,
tika-abh03t:905_16: Teneva hi missakakālabhedesu ca na pacchimapacchimassa khandhassa purimapurimena yojanaṃ katvā yamakāni vuttāni,
tika-abh03t:905_17: amissakakālabhedesu gahitaniyāmena sukhaggahaṇatthampi pacchimapacchimeneva yojetvā vuttānīti.
tika-abh03t:906_0: Imināyeva ca lakkhaṇenātiādinā yena kāraṇena “purepañho”ti ca “pacchāpañho”ti ca nāmaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:906_6: Sadisatthatā ca sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayapadavisesaṃ avicāretvā ekena padena saṅgahitassa khandhassa uppādanirodhalābhasāmaññamattena purepañhe daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:906_7: Sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitassa vā khandhassa anuññātavasena purepañho vuttoti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:907_2: Pāḷipadameva hutvāti pucchāpāḷiyā “nuppajjatī”ti yaṃ padaṃ vuttaṃ, na-
tika-abh03t:907_4: Tattha uppattinirodhapaṭisedhassa paṭisedhanatthaṃ pāḷigatiyā vissajjanaṃ uppattinirodhānameva paṭisedhanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:908_0: Catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ pañcannañca vissajjanānaṃ sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu pakkhepo tadekadesapakkhepavasena vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:908_1: Paripuṇṇapañho eva hi sarūpadassanena ca vissajjanaṃ sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu pakkhipitabbanti.
tika-abh03t:909_0: Kiṃ nu sakkā ito paranti ito pāḷivavatthānadassanādito añño kiṃ nu sakkā kātunti aññassa sakkuṇeyyassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:910_0: “Suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjitthā”ti etena suddhāvāsabhūmīsu
tika-abh03t:910_1: ekabhūmiyampi dutiyā upapatti natthīti ñāpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:910_3: tāva pavattakammajasantānaṃ ekattena gahetvā tassa uppādanirodhavasena ayaṃ desanā pavattā.
tika-abh03t:910_5: vocchinne ca appavattīti teneva ca uppādanirodhā dassitā,
tika-abh03t:910_6: tasmā tassa ekasattassa paṭisandhiuppādato yāva cutinirodho,
tika-abh03t:910_8: na ca tato pubbe tattha paṭisandhivasena kammajasantānaṃ uppannapubbanti khandhadvayampi “nuppajjitthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:910_9: Kasmā pana etāya pāḷiyā sakalepi suddhāvāse dutiyā paṭisandhi natthīti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t:911_0: “Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjissatī”ti ettha “yassa yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjissatī”ti
tika-abh03t:911_1: etena sanniṭṭhānena visesitā asaññasattāpi santīti te eva gahetvā “asaññasattāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:911_4: na tesaṃ puna asaññe upapattippasaṅgo atthīti te sandhāyāha –
tika-abh03t:911_5: “pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjissati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī”ti.
tika-abh03t:911_6: Ettha kiṃ pañcavokārādibhāvo viya pacchimabhavopi koci atthi,
tika-abh03t:911_8: Natthi pañcavokārādibhavesveva yattha vā tattha vā ṭhitānaṃ pacchimabhavikānaṃ “yassa yattha rūpakkhandho
tika-abh03t:911_10: Tesaṃ tattha itarānuppattibhāvañca anujānanto “vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī”ti āhāti.
tika-abh03t:912_0: “Suddhāvāse parinibbantāna”nti idaṃ sappaṭisandhikānaṃ appaṭisandhikānañca suddhāvāsānaṃ taṃtaṃbhūmiyaṃ khandhaparinibbānavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:912_2: Yathā pana “nirujjhissatī”ti vacanaṃ paccuppannepi uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgimhi pavattati,
tika-abh03t:912_4: atha kho uppajjitvā vigate atīte eva,
tika-abh03t:912_6: Anantā lokadhātuyoti okāsassa aparicchinnattā okāsavasena vuccamānānaṃ uppādanirodhānampi paricchedābhāvato
tika-abh03t:915_2: nanu okāsavārassa alābhe tassapi alābhena bhavitabbanti? Na,
tika-abh03t:915_4: Puggalokāsavārepi hi okāse puggalasseva pariññā vuccati,
tika-abh03t:915_7: “yattha rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti okāse puggalasseva parijānanavasena vucceyya,
tika-abh03t:916_0: Tenevāti pavatte cittakkhaṇavasena tiṇṇaṃ addhānaṃ lābhato eva,
tika-abh03t:916_1: aññathā cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpakkhandhaparijānanassa abhāvā “yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānāti,
tika-abh03t:916_2: so vedanākkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti ettha “natthī”ti vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t:916_4: Sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayapadasaṅgahitānaṃ pariññānaṃ pavatte cittakkhaṇe eva lābhaṃ dassento “lokuttaramaggakkhaṇasmiñhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:916_5: Na parijānātīti pañhe puthujjanaṃ sandhāya āmantāti vuttanti idaṃ puthujjanassa sabbathā pariññākiccassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:916_6: “Arahā rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānāti no ca vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānittha,
tika-abh03t:916_7: aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā rūpakkhandhañca na parijānanti vedanākkhandhañca
tika-abh03t:916_8: na parijānitthā”ti pana vacanena “aggamaggasamaṅgiṃ ṭhapetvā añño koci parijānātī”ti vattabbo natthīti
tika-abh03t:922_1: Āyatanayamakādīsu ca paṇṇattivāre padasodhanavārādīnaṃ vacane kāraṇaṃ khandhayamake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:922_2: “Ekādasa ekādasa katvā tettiṃsasataṃ yamakānī”tiādinā kesuci potthakesu gaṇanā likhitā,
tika-abh03t:925_3: “Kāyo dhammo”ti ca vuccamānaṃ sabbaṃ sasabhāvaṃ āyatanamevāti “kāyo āyatana”nti,
tika-abh03t:925_5: Kāyavacanena pana dhammavacanena ca avuccamānaṃ kañci sasabhāvaṃ natthīti “na kāyo nāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:929_1: Pavattivāre cakkhāyatanamūlakāni ekādasāti paṭisandhicutivasena upādinnapavattassa uppādanirodhavacane
tika-abh03t:929_2: etasmiṃ alabbhamānavissajjanampi saddāyatanena saddhiṃ yamakaṃ pucchāmattalābhena saṅgaṇhitvā vadatīti
tika-abh03t:929_4: Chasaṭṭhi yamakānīti ettha cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyarūpāyatanamūlakesu ekekaṃ saddāyatanamūlakāni pañcāti
tika-abh03t:929_6: Vakkhati hi “saddāyatanassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe anuppattito tena saddhiṃ yamakassa vissajjanameva natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t:930_0: Dutiyaṃ kiñcāpi paṭhamena sadisavissajjanantiādi puggalavārameva sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:930_2: na taṃ sabbattha sadisavissajjananti ñāpetuṃ puggalavārepi vissajjitanti.
tika-abh03t:930_3: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanehi saddhiṃ tīṇi yamakāni sadisavissajjanānīti rūpāvacarasatte sandhāya “sacakkhukānaṃ
tika-abh03t:930_5: Tesañhi virattakāmakammanibbattassa paṭisandhibījassa evaṃsabhāvattā ghānādīni gandhādayo ca na santīti.
tika-abh03t:930_6: Ghānāyatanayamakena sadisavissajjanattāti cakkhāyatanamūlakesu ghānāyatanayamakena saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanattāti attho.
tika-abh03t:930_7: Nanu tattha “sacakkhukānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā vissajjanaṃ pavattaṃ,
tika-abh03t:930_10: Āmantā”ti vissajjanena bhavitabbanti natthi sadisavissajjanatāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh03t:930_11: yathā pana tattha ghānāyatanayamakena jivhākāyāyatanayamakāni sadisavissajjanāni,
tika-abh03t:930_13: tasmā tattha tattheva sadisavissajjanatā pāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhatāya kāraṇanti.
tika-abh03t:930_14: Nidassanabhāvena pana gahitaṃ cakkhāyatanamūlakānaṃ sadisavissajjanakānaṃ sadisavissajjanaṃ nidassanabhāveneva
tika-abh03t:930_17: Tesu hi jivhākāyāyatanayamakesu tiṇṇaṃ pucchānaṃ “āmantā”ti vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:931_0: Atha vā yathā vedanākkhandhādimūlakānaṃ saññākkhandhādiyamakānaṃ amissakakālabhedesu tīsu “āmantā”ti
tika-abh03t:931_1: paṭivacanavissajjanena yathāvuttavacanassa vissajjanabhāvānujānanaṃ kattabbanti apubbassa vattabbassa
tika-abh03t:931_3: evamidhāpi ghānāyatanamūlakaṃ jivhāyatanayamakaṃ apubbassa vattabbassa abhāvā pāḷiṃ anāruḷhanti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-abh03t:931_4: Kāyāyatanayamakaṃ pana dutiyapucchāya vasena vissajjitabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t:931_7: tassā ghānāyatanayamakena sadisavissajjanattā taṃsesāni pāḷiṃ anāruḷhānīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:931_10: Ghānajivhākāyāyatanānaṃ pana agabbhaseyyakesu pavattamānānaṃ gabbhaseyyakesu ca āyatanapāripūrikāle sahacāritāya
tika-abh03t:931_11: avisesattā ca appavisesattā ca ekasmiṃ ghānāyatanayamake vissajjite itarāni dve,
tika-abh03t:931_12: ghānāyatanamūlakesu ca vissajjitesu itaradvayamūlakāni na vissajjīyantīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh03t:931_14: tassa manāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”ti etissā pucchāya vuttehi rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi saddhinti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:931_15: Rūpāyatanamūlakesu hi manāyatanayamake ādipucchāya gandharasaphoṭṭhabbayamakesu ādipucchānaṃ sadisavissajjanatā
tika-abh03t:931_17: Dutiyapucchānañhi paṭivacanavissajjanena bhavitabbanti pubbe vuttanayena vissajjanaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:932_0: Heṭṭhimehi sadisavissajjanattāti ettha gandhāyatanamūlakānaṃ rasaphoṭṭhabbayamakānaṃ rasāyatanamūlakassa
tika-abh03t:932_1: ca phoṭṭhabbayamakassa paṭivacanavissajjaneneva bhavitabbanti pubbe vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ na kātabbanti
tika-abh03t:932_5: Cakkhāyatanādimūlakāni saddāyatanayamakāni saddāyatanamūlakāni sabbāni avissajjaneneva alabbhamānavissajjanatādassanena
tika-abh03t:932_6: vissajjitāni nāma hontīti āha “chasaṭṭhi yamakāni vissajjitāni nāma hontī”ti.
tika-abh03t:933_0: Jaccandhampi jaccabadhirampīti ettha ca jaccabadhiraggahaṇena jaccandhabadhiro gahitoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:933_1: Saghānakānaṃ sacakkhukānanti paripuṇṇāyatanameva opapātikaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ettha eva-
tika-abh03t:933_3: etassa parato yojetvā yathā “saghānakānaṃ acakkhukāna”nti idaṃ aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:933_5: Etaṃ pana paripuṇṇāyatanaṃ sandhāya vuttamevāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:933_6: Tena jaccabadhirampi sandhāya vuttatā na vāritā hotīti.
tika-abh03t:934_1: Yattha cakkhāyatananti rūpībrahmalokaṃ pucchatīti niyamato tattha cakkhusotānaṃ sahuppattimattaṃ passanto vadati,
tika-abh03t:934_2: okāsavāre pana tasmiṃ puggalassa anāmaṭṭhattā yattha kāmadhātuyaṃ rūpadhātuyañca cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:935_7: tassa tadavatthassa puggalassa rūpāyatanuppādato uddhaṃ cakkhāyatanasantānuppādassa pavattiyampi bhavissantassa paṭiññātabbattā.
tika-abh03t:935_8: Atha kasmā “yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh03t:935_11: nanu gabbhaseyyakassa pacchimabhavikassa upapajjantassa ekādasamasattāhā orato ṭhitassa rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati no ca cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti?
tika-abh03t:935_12: Tasmiṃ bhave bhavissantassa uppādassa anāgatabhāvena avacanato.
tika-abh03t:935_13: Bhavantare hi tassa tassa āyatanasantānassa yo ādiuppādo paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca bhavissati,
tika-abh03t:935_15: Na pana yo tasmiṃyeva bhave pavatte bhavissati,
tika-abh03t:935_21: yā ca itthiyo rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tika-abh03t:935_22: yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti,
tika-abh03t:935_24: no ca tāsaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:935_25: Na hi tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ tasmiṃ bhave pavatte purisindriyaṃ na uppajjissati liṅgaparivattanasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t:935_26: bhavantare pana ādiuppādassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya “no ca tāsaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:935_28: Evañca katvā “katici bhave dassetvā”ti bhavaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
tika-abh03t:936_0: “Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho jātī”ti vacanato taṃtaṃāyatananibbattakakammena gahitapaṭisandhikassa avassaṃbhāvīāyatanassa yāva āyatanapāripūri,
tika-abh03t:936_1: tāva uppajjatīti pana atthe gayhamāne pucchādvayavissajjanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:936_2: Evañca sati “yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh03t:936_7: no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatī”ti evamādīsu gabbhaseyyakāpi pacchimabhavikādayo upapajjantā gahitā honti.
tika-abh03t:936_8: Evañca katvā indriyayamake “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:936_11: Somanassindriyuppādakassa kammassa ekantena cakkhundriyuppādanato gabbhepi yāva cakkhundriyuppatti,
tika-abh03t:937_0: Yaṃ pana “yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t:937_5: no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”ti ettha “aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:937_6: taṃ ye ekādasamasattāhā orato kālaṃ karissanti,
tika-abh03t:937_7: tesaṃ ghānāyatanānibbattakakammena gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:937_12: rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t:937_13: no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti hi ettha “aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantāna”nti vacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:937_14: anuppanneyeva ghānāyatane gabbhaseyyakānaṃ cuti atthīti dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:937_15: Na hi kāmāvacare gabbhaseyyakato añño aghānako atthi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:937_17: Atha kasmā opapātike eva sandhāya idha,
tika-abh03t:937_18: indriyayamake ca yathādassitāsu pucchāsu “āmantā”ti vuttanti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t:937_19: Yamake sanniṭṭhānena gahitatthassa ekadese saṃsayatthasambhavena paṭivacanassa akaraṇato.
tika-abh03t:937_23: Atha kasmā “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:937_25: Āmantā”ti iminā “gabbhaseyyakānaṃ somanassapaṭisandhi natthī”ti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t:937_27: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasindriyāni pātubhavanti kāyindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:937_28: manindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā jīvitindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā saddhindriya”ntiādivacanato.
tika-abh03t:938_0: Nirodhavāre anāgatakālabhede yathā tasseva cittassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa uppattikkhaṇe vutto,
tika-abh03t:938_1: evaṃ tasseva kammajasantānassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa uppāde vattabboti sabbattha upapajjantānaṃ eva so tathā vutto,
tika-abh03t:938_3: Uppannānaṃ pana aññassa anāgatassa santānassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena vattabbo,
tika-abh03t:938_5: Tassa hi uppādānantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t:938_6: Tasmā arahataṃ pavatte sotassa cakkhussa ca bhede satipi anāgatakālāmasanavaseneva “yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati,
tika-abh03t:938_11: Yasmā ca upapattianantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t:938_13: tasmā pavatte niruddhepi santānekadese aniruddhaṃ upādāya aniṭṭhitanirodhoti cutiyāva tassa nirodhoti vuccati.
tika-abh03t:938_14: Vakkhati hi “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t:938_17: tenetthāpi cutinirodhe eva ca adhippete yañca pavatte nirujjhissati,
tika-abh03t:938_18: tañca niṭṭhānavasena cutiyā eva nirujjhissatīti vuttanti “āmantā”ti yuttaṃ paṭivacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t:939_3: acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t:939_4: no ca tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti ettha āruppe pacchimabhavike ṭhapetvā sabbe upapajjantā,
tika-abh03t:939_6: Te hi dutiyakoṭṭhāsena saṅgayhantīti tadapekkhattā sāvasesamidaṃ sabbavacanaṃ acakkhukavacanañcāti.
tika-abh03t:939_7: “Āruppe pacchimabhavikāna”nti ettha ca arūpato pañcavokāraṃ agacchantā anaññūpapattikāpi “arūpe pacchimabhavikā”icceva saṅgayhantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:943_1: Labbhamānānanti idaṃ pavattivāre saddadhātusambandhānaṃ yamakānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātādisambandhānañca
tika-abh03t:948_2: Āmantā”ti ettha kiñcāpi dukkhadukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhanti tīsupi dukkhasaddo pavattati,
tika-abh03t:948_4: so pana dukkhadukkhato aññattha pavattamāno aññanirapekkho nappavattati.
tika-abh03t:948_5: Suddhañcettha dukkhapadaṃ aññanirapekkhaṃ gahetvā paṇṇattisodhanaṃ karoti,
tika-abh03t:948_6: tena nippariyāyato dukkhasabhāvattā eva yaṃ dukkhadukkhaṃ,
tika-abh03t:948_9: Suddhasaccavāre saccavibhaṅge vuttesu samudayesu koci phaladhammesu natthi,
tika-abh03t:948_10: na ca phaladhammesu koci nirodhoti vuccamāno atthi,
tika-abh03t:949_0: Atha vā padasodhanena padesu sodhitesu saccavisesanabhūtā eva dukkhādisaddā idha gahitāti viññāyanti.
tika-abh03t:949_2: saccānañca tabbisesanayogavisesaṃ dīpetuṃ suddhasaccavāro vuttoti saccavisesanānaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ ekantasaccattā “dukkhaṃ saccaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t:949_6: evaṃ khandhayamakādīsupi suddhakhandhādivāresu khandhādivisesanabhūtānameva rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:949_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yasmā piyarūpasātarūpasaṅkhātaṃ vā rūpaṃ hotu bhūtupādārūpaṃ vā,
tika-abh03t:949_9: tasmā āmantāti paṭijānātī”ti vacanena rūpādicakkhādidukkhādiggahaṇehi suddhakhandhādivāresupi khandhādivisesanato
tika-abh03t:952_1: Antamaso suddhāvāsānampīti idaṃ tesaṃ ariyattā dukkhasaccena upapajjane āsaṅkā siyāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:952_3: Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti etena pana sanniṭṭhānena sabbe upapajjantā pavattiyaṃ catuvokāre maggaphalato
tika-abh03t:952_4: aññacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino pañcavokāre ca sabbacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino saṅgahitāti tesveva
tika-abh03t:952_5: sanniṭṭhānena nicchitesu keci “pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti etena dukkhasamudayesu
tika-abh03t:952_8: Na hi tesu maggaphaluppādasamaṅgīsu pasaṅgatā atthi taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ sanniṭṭhānena aggahitattāti.
tika-abh03t:952_9: Idaṃ idha na gahetabbanti idaṃ catuvokāre phalasamāpatticittaṃ idha saccānaṃ uppādavacane na gahetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:953_0: Ettha ca sabbesaṃ upapajjantānanti idaṃ kammajapavattassa paṭhamuppādadassanena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:953_2: Pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ pana samudayasaccuppādavomissassa dukkhasaccuppādassa taṃrahitassa dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:953_4: Tesaṃ pana asaññasattānaṃ pavattiyaṃ dukkhasaccassa uppādo sabbattha na gahito,
tika-abh03t:953_7: Tesaṃ tasmiṃ upapattikkhaṇe ca taṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇe cāti evamettha khaṇavasena okāso veditabboti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:953_9: tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatī”ti etassa vissajjane pacchimakoṭṭhāse “itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:953_10: pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca uppajjissatī”ti idaṃ na yujjeyya.
tika-abh03t:953_11: Na hi upapattikkhaṇe cittuppattikkhaṇe ca samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti.
tika-abh03t:953_12: Tasmā upapattikkhaṇataṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ puggalānaṃ yasmiṃ kāmāvacarādiokāse sā upapatti cittuppatti ca pavattamānā,
tika-abh03t:953_17: okāso pana yattha te, so evāti.
tika-abh03t:954_0: “Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āruppe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:954_1: samudayasaccañca nuppajjati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjatī”ti ettha pana “pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh03t:954_3: na kammajādirūpaṃ cittaṃ anapekkhitvāva uppajjanatoti keci vadanti.
tika-abh03t:954_4: “Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti etena pana sanniṭṭhānena gahito puggalo na cittaṃ apekkhitvāva gahito,
tika-abh03t:954_6: tasmā “tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti etena ca na cittāpekkhameva dukkhasaccaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:954_7: atha kho yaṃ kiñcīti cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yaṃ kiñci dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti ayamattho viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t:954_8: Na hi yamake vibhajitabbe avibhattā nāma pucchā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:955_0: “Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye cittevattamāne”ti idaṃ sabbantimena paricchedena yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t:955_3: Tasmiṃ pana dassite tena samānagatikattā dutiyākusalacittato purimasabbacittasamaṅgino teneva dassitā honti.
tika-abh03t:955_4: Tesampi hi tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjitthāti.
tika-abh03t:955_5: Evañca katvā “itaresaṃ catuvokārapañcavokārāna”nti ettha yathāvuttā suddhāvāsā aggahitā honti.
tika-abh03t:955_7: tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjitthā”ti etassa vissajjane “suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti
tika-abh03t:955_9: dassitā hontīti na te “itaresa”nti etena gayhanti,
tika-abh03t:955_13: Na hi te pubbe vuttā vajjetabbā santi pañcavokārā viya yathāvuttā suddhāvāsāti.
tika-abh03t:955_14: “Abhisametāvīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjittha maggasaccañca uppajjitthā”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t:955_15: puggalokāsā aññamaññaparicchinnā gahitāti yasmiṃ okāse abhisametāvino,
tika-abh03t:955_17: Tena ye kāmāvacare rūpāvacare arūpāvacare vā abhisametāvino rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ vā upapannā,
tika-abh03t:955_20: te pana purimakoṭṭhāse “suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne”ti evaṃ dassitehi suddhāvāse anuppannābhisamayehi samānagatikāti visuṃ na dassitā.
tika-abh03t:955_21: “Anabhisametāvīna”nti gahitā ye sabbattha tattha ca anabhisametāvino,
tika-abh03t:955_22: tesu suddhāvāsānaṃ gahaṇakālavisesanatthaṃ “suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t:956_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissantīti etena vodānacittasamaṅginā samānagatikā tato purimataracittasamaṅginopi
tika-abh03t:957_0: Pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti āgataṭṭhāne paṭisandhicittassapi bhaṅgakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:957_1: tathā “pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti āgataṭṭhāne ca cuticittassapi uppādakkhaṇassāti.
tika-abh03t:957_3: tassa samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti etassa vissajjane dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu “arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe”icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:957_5: Ekassapi maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgino ubhayakoṭṭhāsabhajanato.
tika-abh03t:957_6: Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhatīti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu hi arupe maggaphalabhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīsu
tika-abh03t:957_7: kesañci tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ dvinnañca maggānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ nirantaraṃ anuppādetvā antarantarā
tika-abh03t:957_8: vipassanānikantiṃ bhavanikantiṃ uppādetvā ye uparimagge uppādessanti,
tika-abh03t:957_9: tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti tesaṃyeva pana kesañci antarā taṇhaṃ anuppādetvā uparimaggauppādentānaṃ
tika-abh03t:957_11: Sāmaññavacanenapi ca purimakoṭṭhāse vuccamānena pacchimakoṭṭhāse vakkhamāne vajjetvāva gahaṇaṃ hotīti dassitoyaṃ nayoti.
tika-abh03t:960_2: tissopettha pariññā labbhantīti ettheva visesanaṃ khandhayamakādīsu sabbakhandhādīnaṃ viya sabbasaccānaṃ
tika-abh03t:960_4: Dukkhassa pariññatthaṃ samudayassa ca pahānatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti pariññāpahānaṃ saccesu dassetuṃ dukkhe tīraṇapariññā vuttā,
tika-abh03t:960_9: Maggañāṇañhi dukkhasamudayāni vibhāvetīti ñātapariññā ca hoti,
tika-abh03t:960_11: samudayassa appavattikaraṇatova pahānapariññā cāti tissopi pariññā maggakkhaṇe eva yojetabbāti.
tika-abh03t:965_1: Khandhādayo viya pubbe avibhattā kāyasaṅkhārādayoti tesaṃ aviññātattā “assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādinā tayo saṅkhāre vibhajati.
tika-abh03t:965_2: Kāyassa saṅkhāroti paṭhame atthe sāmiatthe eva sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:965_6: So pana karaṇavacanassa atthoti katvā “karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:966_1: Suddhikaekekapadavasena atthābhāvatoti padasodhanataṃmūlakacakkavārehi yopi attho dassito dvīhi padehi labbhamāno eko assāsapassāsādiko,
tika-abh03t:966_2: tassa suddhikehi kāyādipadehi suddhikena ca saṅkhārapadena avacanīyattā yathā rūpapadassa khandhekadeso
tika-abh03t:966_3: khandhapadassa khandhasamudāyo padasodhane dassito yathādhippeto attho atthi,
tika-abh03t:966_5: Kāyo kāyasaṅkhārotiādi pana vattabbaṃ siyāti yadi visuṃ adīpetvā samudito kāyasaṅkhārasaddo ekattha dīpeti,
tika-abh03t:966_6: kāyasaṅkhārasaddo kāyasaṅkhāratthe vattamāno khandhasaddo viya rūpasaddena kāyasaddena visesitabboti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-abh03t:966_7: Suddhasaṅkhāravāro hesāti etena imassa vārassa padasodhanena dassitānaṃ yathādhippetānameva gahaṇato
tika-abh03t:966_8: tesañca kāyādipadehi aggahitattā “kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādivacanassa ayuttiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:966_9: Idha pana saṅkhārayamake kāyādipadānaṃ saṅkhārapadassa ca asamānādhikaraṇattā “kāyo saṅkhāro,
tika-abh03t:966_10: saṅkhārā kāyo”tiādimhi vuccamāne adhippetatthapariccāgo anadhippetatthapariggaho ca kato siyāti suddhasaṅkhārataṃmūlacakkavārā na vuttā.
tika-abh03t:966_11: Padasodhanavārataṃmūlacakkavārehi pana asamānādhikaraṇehi kāyādipadehi saṅkhārasaddassa visesanīyatāya
tika-abh03t:966_12: dassitāya saṃsayo hoti “yo atthantarappavattinā kāyasaddena visesito kāyasaṅkhāro,
tika-abh03t:966_13: eso atthantarappavattīhi vacīcittehi visesito udāhu añño”ti.
tika-abh03t:966_15: Ettha tesaṃ aññattha dassanatthaṃ “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”tiādinā anulomapaṭilomavasena cha yamakāni vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:966_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana suddhasaṅkhāravāraṭṭhāne vuttattā ayaṃ nayo suddhasaṅkhāravāroti vutto.
tika-abh03t:969_1: Pavattivāre saṅkhārānaṃ puggalānañca okāsattā jhānaṃ bhūmi ca visuṃ okāsabhāvena gahitāti puggalavāre
tika-abh03t:969_2: ca okāsavasena puggalaggahaṇena tesaṃ dvinnaṃ okāsānaṃ vasena gahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:969_3: tasmā “vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe”ti dutiyatatiyajjhānokāsavasena gahitā puggalā visesetvā dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:969_4: Puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānanti jhānokāsavasena puggalaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t:969_7: Tena rūpārūpāvacaresu paṭhamajjhānasamāpannake kāmāvacare gabbhagatādike ca nivatteti.
tika-abh03t:969_8: Kāmāvacarānampi hi gabbhagatādīnaṃ vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppatti atthi.
tika-abh03t:969_10: Vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇeti etena pana dassitā puggalā paṭhamajjhānokāsā kāmāvacarādiokāsā
tika-abh03t:970_1: “Paṭhamajjhāne kāmāvacareti kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ uppanne paṭhamajjhāne”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:970_2: etasmiṃ pana atthe sati “catutthajjhāne rūpāvacare arūpāvacare tattha cittasaṅkhāro uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:970_3: no ca tattha kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjatī”ti etthāpi rūpārūpāvacarabhūmīsu uppanne catutthajjhāneti attho bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t:970_4: so ca aniṭṭho bhūmīnaṃ okāsabhāvasseva aggahitatāpattito,
tika-abh03t:970_6: tasmā jhānabhūmokāsānaṃ saṅkaraṃ akatvā visuṃ eva okāsabhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t:970_7: Paṭhamajjhānokāsepi hi kāyasaṅkhāro ca uppajjati vacīsaṅkhāro ca uppajjati kāmāvacarokāse ca.
tika-abh03t:970_8: Yadipi na sabbamhi paṭhamajjhāne sabbamhi ca kāmāvacare dvayaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:970_9: tattha pana taṃdvayuppatti atthīti katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:970_10: Visuṃ okāsattā ca “aṅgamattavasena cetthā”tiādivacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh03t:970_11: Imamhi ca yamake avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ vicāravasena paṭhamajjhāne saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:970_12: Muddhabhūtaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ gahetvā itaraṃ asaṅgahitanti vā.
tika-abh03t:970_14: Na hi te asaññasattā viya okāse hontīti.
tika-abh03t:971_1: Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāneti tesaṃ paṭhamato avitakkaavicārato dutiye savitakkasavicārepi bhavanikantiāvajjane
tika-abh03t:971_2: vattamāne ubhayaṃ nuppajjitthāti dassentena tato purimacittakkhaṇesupi nuppajjitthāti dassitameva hoti.
tika-abh03t:971_3: Yathā pana cittasaṅkhārassa ādidassanatthaṃ “suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:971_4: evaṃ vacīsaṅkhārassa ādidassanatthaṃ “dutiye citte vattamāne”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:976_2: khandhādīsu tīraṇabāhullato khandhādiyamakehi tīraṇapariññañca vibhāvetvā anusayapahānantā pahānapariññāti
tika-abh03t:976_3: pahātabbamuddhabhūtehi anusayehi pahānapariññaṃ vibhāvetuṃ anusayayamakaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh03t:976_5: Tīhākārehi anusayānaṃ gāhāpanaṃ tesu tathā aggahitesu anusayavārādipāḷiyā duravabodhattā.
tika-abh03t:977_0: Ayaṃ panettha purimesūti etesu sānusayavārādīsu purimesūti attho.
tika-abh03t:977_1: Atthavisesābhāvato “kāmadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassa kāmadhātuyā cutassa,
tika-abh03t:977_2: rūpadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassa kāmadhātuyā cutassā”ti evamādīhi avuccamāne kathamayaṃ yamakadesanā siyāti?
tika-abh03t:977_4: purimavārehi pana yamakavasena desitānaṃ anusayānaṃ cutiupapattivasena anusayaṭṭhānaparicchedadassanaṃ.
tika-abh03t:977_5: Yamakadesanābāhullato pana sabbavārasamudāyassa anusayayamakanti nāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:977_7: atthavisesābhāvato pana na vuttāti labbhamānatāvasena etissāpi desanāya yamakadesanatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:978_0: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti etena kāraṇalābhe uppattiarahataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:978_1: Appahīnā hi anusayā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
tika-abh03t:978_2: Yāva ca maggena tesaṃ anuppattiarahatā na katā hoti,
tika-abh03t:978_10: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ pana labhitvā ye uppajjiṃsu uppajjamānā ca,
tika-abh03t:978_11: tepi appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā ahesuṃ bhavanti ca.
tika-abh03t:978_12: Uppattiarahatāya eva ca te uppajjiṃsu uppajjanti ca,
tika-abh03t:978_13: na ca atītānāgatapaccuppannato aññe uppattiarahā nāma atthi,
tika-abh03t:978_17: maggassa pana tādisānaṃ anuppattiarahatāpādanena anusayappahānaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh03t:978_20: dhammo eva ca uppajjatīti iminā adhippāyenāha “appahīnākāro ca uppajjatīti vattuṃ na yujjatī”ti.
tika-abh03t:978_21: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena santāne anusentīti anusayā,
tika-abh03t:978_23: nanu sattānusayato aññesampi kilesānaṃ appahīnattā anusayabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t:978_27: tasmā appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagato kilesoyeva anusayo nāmāti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:978_28: Thāmagatanti ca aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:978_29: Tathā hi dhammasabhāvabodhinā tathāgatena imeyeva “anusayā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t:979_1: evaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ siyāti uppajjanavārena “uppajjatī”ti vacanassa avuttatā sakkā vattunti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-abh03t:979_3: “Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjatī”ti hi etasmiṃ atthe avisiṭṭhepi “anusetī”ti vacanaṃ santāne anusayitataṃ thāmagatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:979_5: kassaci visesassa abhāvā uppajjanavāro na vattabbo siyā,
tika-abh03t:979_8: anusayasaddassa sabbadā vijjamānānaṃ aparinipphannasayanatthatāya nivāraṇatthaṃ uppattiarahatāya thāmagatabhāvasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh03t:979_9: yathādhippetasayanatthassa dassanatthaṃ “anusentīti anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantī”ti yaṃ uppattiyoggavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:982_1: Kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsūti kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ sukhāya ca upekkhāya cāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāmadhātuggahaṇaṃ dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ visesanabhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:982_2: evaṃ sati kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgānusayassa anusayaṭṭhānatā na vuttā hoti.
tika-abh03t:982_3: Dvīsu pana rāgesu bhavarāgassa tīsu dhātūsu rūpārūpadhātūnaṃ anusayaṭṭhānatā vuttāti kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā vattabbā.
tika-abh03t:982_4: Dhātuvedanāsabbasakkāyapariyāpannavasena hi tippakāraṃ anusayānaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti.
tika-abh03t:982_5: Tasmā tīsu dhātūsu kāmadhātuyā tīsu vedanāsu dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo anusetīti visuṃ anusayaṭṭhānatā dhātuyā vedanānañca yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t:982_6: Dvīsu vedanāsūti idañca vedanāsu anusayamāno kāmarāgānusayo dvīsveva anuseti,
tika-abh03t:982_7: na tīsūti tiṇṇampi ṭhānatānivāraṇatthameva vuttanti na sabbāsu dvīsu anusayanappatto atthi,
tika-abh03t:982_8: tena vedanāvisesanatthaṃ na kāmadhātuggahaṇena koci attho.
tika-abh03t:982_9: Bhavarāgānusayanaṭṭhānañhi aṭṭhānañca anusayānaṃ apariyāpannaṃ sakkāye kāmarāgānusayassa anusayaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti pākaṭametaṃ.
tika-abh03t:982_10: Yathā ca “dvīsu vedanāsū”ti vutte paṭighānusayānusayaṭṭhānato aññā dve vedanā gayhanti,
tika-abh03t:982_11: evaṃ bhavarāgānusayānusayanaṭṭhānato ca aññā tā gayhantīti.
tika-abh03t:983_0: Ettha ca dvīhi vedanāhi sampayuttesu aññesu ca piyarūpasātarūpesu iṭṭharūpādīsu uppajjamāno kāmarāgānusayo
tika-abh03t:983_1: sātasantasukhagiddhiyā pavattatīti dvīsu vedanāsu tassa anusayanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:983_2: Aññattha uppajjamānopi hi so imāsu dvīsu vedanāsu anugato hutvā seti sukhamicceva abhilabhatīti.
