tika-abh03t:983_3: Evaṃ paṭighānusayo ca dukkhavedanāsampayuttesu aññesu ca appiyarūpāsātarūpesu aniṭṭharūpādīsu uppajjamāno
tika-abh03t:983_4: dukkhapaṭikūlato dukkhamicceva paṭihaññatīti dukkhavedanameva anugato hutvā seti,
tika-abh03t:983_6: Evaṃ kāmarāgapaṭighānaṃ tīsu vedanāsu anusayavacanena iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhesu ārammaṇapakatiyā viparītasaññāya
tika-abh03t:983_7: ca vasena iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesu kāmarāgapaṭighānaṃ uppatti dassitā hoti.
tika-abh03t:983_8: Tattha uppajjamānā hi te tīsu vedanāsu anusenti nāma.
tika-abh03t:983_9: Vedanāttayamukhena vā ettha iṭṭhādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:983_11: Tattha kāmarāgānusayo bhavassādavasena anusayamāno kāmadhātuyā anuseti,
tika-abh03t:983_13: Paṭigho dukkhapaṭighātavaseneva pavattatīti yattha tattha paṭihaññamānopi dukkhavedanāya eva anuseti.
tika-abh03t:983_14: Rūpārūpabhavesu pana rūpārūpāvacaradhammesu ca kāmassādassa pavatti natthīti tattha anusayamāno rāgo bhavarāgoicceva veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:983_15: Dhātuttayavedanāttayaggahaṇena ca sabbasakkāyapariyāpannānaṃ gahitattā “yattha kāmarāgānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t:983_16: tattha diṭṭhānusayo nānusetī”ti evamādīnaṃ vissajjanesu dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:983_17: Nanu ca anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato pihapaccayā uppannadomanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t:983_18: tathā nekkhammassitasomanassupekkhāsu kāmarāgena nānusayitabbanti tadanusayanaṭṭhānato aññāpi diṭṭhānusayānusayanaṭṭhānabhūtā
tika-abh03t:983_20: na pana dhātuttayavedanāttayato aññaṃ tadanusayanaṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:983_22: Yasmā pana “yattha kāmarāgānusayo ca paṭighānusayo ca mānānusayo ca nānusenti,
tika-abh03t:983_25: tasmā avisesena dukkhaṃ paṭighānusayassa anusayanaṭṭhānanti samudāyavasena gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:984_1: bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ domanassaṃ pajaheyya’nti,
tika-abh03t:984_2: so iti paṭisañcikkhitvā paṭighaṃ tena pajahati,
tika-abh03t:984_3: na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vikkhambhetvā vīriyaṃ katvā
tika-abh03t:984_7: Paṭighuppattirahaṭṭhānatāya pana idha sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ “paṭighānusayassa anusayanaṭṭhāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:984_10: Evañca katvā paṭhamajjhānavikkhambhitaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā anāgāmimaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāya “vivicceva…pe…
tika-abh03t:984_14: Evaṃ catutthajjhānavikkhambhitaṃ avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā arahattamaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāya “sukhassa ca pahānā…pe…
tika-abh03t:984_18: Na hi lokiyacatutthajjhānupekkhāya avijjānusayo sabbathā nānusetīti sakkā vattuṃ “sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu
tika-abh03t:984_21: nekkhammassitadomanassañca paṭighānusayassa vatthu na na hotīti tatthāpi tassa anusayanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:984_22: Avatthubhāvato hi idha anusayanaṃ na vuccati,
tika-abh03t:984_23: na suttantesu viya vuttanayena taṃpaṭipakkhabhāvato taṃsamugghātakamaggassa balavūpanissayabhāvato cāti.
tika-abh03t:985_0: Ettha ca ārammaṇe anusayaṭṭhāne sati bhavarāgavajjo sabbo lobho kāmarāgānusayoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:985_1: Dukkhāya hi vedanāya rūpārūpadhātūsu ca anusayamānena diṭṭhānusayena sampayuttopi lobho lobho eva,
tika-abh03t:985_4: diṭṭhānusayassa viya etassapi ṭhānaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh03t:985_5: Atha pana ajjhāsayavasena tanninnatāya anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:985_6: Yathā iṭṭhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ sukhāya ca vedanāya appaṭiladdhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato,
tika-abh03t:985_7: paṭiladdhapubbaṃ vā atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ pariṇataṃ samanupassato uppajjamāno paṭigho dukkhe paṭihaññanavaseneva
tika-abh03t:985_10: evaṃ dukkhādīsu abhinivesanavasena uppajjamānena diṭṭhānusayena sampayuttopi lobho sukhābhisaṅgavaseneva
tika-abh03t:985_11: pavattatīti sātasantasukhadvayamevassa anusayaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti bhavarāgavajjassa sabbalobhassa kāmarāgānusayatā
tika-abh03t:985_13: ekasmiṃyeva ca ārammaṇe rajjanti dussanti ca.
tika-abh03t:985_14: Tattha rāgo sukhajjhāsayo paṭigho dukkhajjhāsayoti tesaṃ nānānusayaṭṭhānatā hoti.
tika-abh03t:986_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dvīsu vedanāsu iṭṭhārammaṇe ca domanassuppattiṃ vatvā “domanassamattameva pana taṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:986_4: na paṭighānusayo”ti vuttattā yathā tattha paṭigho paṭighānusayo na hoti,
tika-abh03t:986_5: evaṃ dukkhādīsu uppajjamānena diṭṭhānusayena sahajāto lobho kāmarāgānusayo na hoticceva viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t:986_6: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “domanassamattameva pana taṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:986_8: ettha na paṭighānusayoti natthi paṭighānusayoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:987_0: Desanā saṃkiṇṇā viya bhaveyyāti bhavarāgassapi kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva uppatti vuttā viya bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t:987_1: tasmā ārammaṇavisesena visesadassanatthaṃ evaṃ desanā katā sahajātavedanāvisesābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:991_2: Maggeneva hi anusayānaṃ virāmo vicchedo hoti,
tika-abh03t:992_2: na ekaṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontīti ettha purimena ekasmiṃ cittuppāde uppatti nivāritā,
tika-abh03t:992_4: Puggalokāsavārassa paṭilome tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ tassa tassa anusayassa ananusayanaṭṭhānaṃ pakatiyā pahānena ca veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:992_5: “tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya tesaṃ tattha kāmarāgānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t:992_6: no ca tesaṃ tattha paṭighānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t:992_7: tesaññeva puggalānaṃ rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā apariyāpanne tesaṃ tattha kāmarāgānusayo ca nānuseti,
tika-abh03t:992_8: paṭighānusayo ca nānusetī”ti pakatiyā dukkhādīnaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ ananusayaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:992_11: Ettha purimanayena okāsaṃ avekkhitvā puggalassa vijjamānānaṃ anusayānaṃ ananusayanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:992_12: pacchimanayena puggalaṃ avekkhitvā okāsassa kāmadhātuādikassa anokāsatāti.
tika-abh03t:995_3: Puggalassa ca imasmiṃ bhave sānusayoti evaṃ bhavavisesena vā,
tika-abh03t:995_4: imasmiṃ kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo imasmiṃ itaresu kenacīti evaṃ bhavānusayavisesena vā sānusayatāniranusayatādikā natthi.
tika-abh03t:995_9: Anusayassa pana tassa tassa so so anusayanokāso puggalassa tena tena anusayena sānusayatāya,
tika-abh03t:995_12: tasmā okāsavāresu bhummaniddesaṃ akatvā “yato tato”ti nimittatthe nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:995_14: Tato tato hi okāsato apagamakaraṇaṃ vināsanaṃ pajahanaṃ parijānanañcāti.
tika-abh03t:996_2: Anusayānānusayasseva hi nimittāpādānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā tato mānānusayena sānusayoti (yama.2.anusayayamaka.77),
tika-abh03t:996_3: pajahatī”ti ca “dukkhāya vedanāya tato kāmarāgānusayena niranusayoti,
tika-abh03t:996_4: na pajahatī”ti ca evamādīsu rūpadhātuādayo eva bhummaniddeseneva niddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t:996_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana catutthapañhavissajjanena sarūpato anusayanaṭṭhānassa dassitattā tadatthe ādipañhepi
tika-abh03t:996_6: “yato”ti anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā puna “yato”ti etassa vacanatthaṃ dassetuṃ “uppannena
tika-abh03t:996_10: uppattirahaṭṭhānatañca sandhāyeva nissakkavacanaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:996_11: Na hi apariyāpannānaṃ anusayuppattirahaṭṭhānatāti taṃ tatheva dissati.
tika-abh03t:996_16: Uppattipaṭisedhe akate anuppattiyā anicchitattā sabbadhammesu uppajjanakabhāvaṃ āpannena anuppajjanabhāvaṃ apaneti nāma.
tika-abh03t:996_17: Sabbatthāti etassa pana sabbaṭṭhānatoti ayamattho na na sambhavati. Ttha-
tika-abh03t:999_2: so te pajahatīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vattabbo na hoti apajahanasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t:999_9: tasmā yathāvijjamānaṃ pahānaṃ sandhāya “yo kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahati,
tika-abh03t:999_12: Paṭilome pana “nappajahatī”ti pajahanābhāvo eva sanniṭṭhānapadena saṃsayapadena ca vinicchito pucchito ca,
tika-abh03t:999_13: tasmā yesaṃ pajahanaṃ natthi niravasesavasena pajahanakānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:999_14: te ṭhapetvā avasesā appajahanasabbhāveneva nappajahantīti vuttā,
tika-abh03t:999_15: na ca yathāvijjamānena pahāneneva vajjitāti daṭṭhabbāti.
tika-abh03t:999_16: “Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgiñca aṭṭhamakañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahanti vicikicchānusayañca
tika-abh03t:999_17: nappajahantī”ti ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puthujjano pahānapariññāya abhāvena nappajahati,
tika-abh03t:1000_0: Tattha kiñcāpi kesañci vicikicchānusayo kesañci ubhayanti sesānaṃ tesaṃ pahīnatā atthi,
tika-abh03t:1000_1: tathāpi sotāpannādīnaṃ vicikicchānusayassa pahīnatā ubhayāpajahanassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti tesaṃ pahīnattā “nappajahantī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh03t:1000_2: atha pana kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahantīti imaṃ sanniṭṭhānena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ saṅgahitatādassanatthaṃ vuttanti na tattha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1000_4: Evaṃ sati “sesā tassa anusayassa pahīnattā”ti vattabbanti?
tika-abh03t:1000_6: so diṭṭhānusayaṃ vicikicchānusayaṃ nappajahatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā pucchite sadisavissajjanake diṭṭhivicikicchānusaye sandhāya kāraṇassa vattabbattā,
tika-abh03t:1000_7: tasmā tesaṃ anusayānaṃ pahīnattāti tesaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānusayānaṃ pahīnattā te saṃsayatthasaṅgahite anusaye nappajahantīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1003_1: Pahīnavāre phalaṭṭhavaseneva desanā āraddhāti anulomaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1004_1: Okāsavāre so so anusayo attano attano okāse eva anuppattidhammataṃ āpādito pahīno,
tika-abh03t:1004_2: anāpādito ca appahīnoti pahīnāppahīnavacanāni tadokāsameva dīpenti,
tika-abh03t:1004_4: Sādhāraṇaṭṭhāne tena saddhiṃ pahīno nāma hotīti tena saddhiṃ samānokāse pahīno nāmāti attho,
tika-abh03t:1007_1: Dhātuvāre santānaṃ anugatā hutvā sayantīti yasmiṃ santāne appahīnā,
tika-abh03t:1007_2: taṃsantāne appahīnabhāvena anugantvā uppattiarahabhāvena sayantīti attho.
tika-abh03t:1007_3: Uppattirahatā eva hi anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti idhāpi yuttāti.
tika-abh03t:1007_4: Ettha ca na kāmadhātuādīni cha paṭinisedhavacanāni dhātuvisesaniddhāraṇāni na hontīti “na kāmadhātuyā
tika-abh03t:1007_5: cutassa na kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādimhi vuccamāne imaṃ nāma upapajjantassāti na viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t:1007_6: tasmā taṃmūlikāsu yojanāsu “na kāmadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”ti
tika-abh03t:1007_7: paṭhamaṃ yojetvā puna anukkamena “na kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādikā yojanā katā.
tika-abh03t:1007_10: Yathā anusayavāre “anusentīti padassa uppajjantīti attho gahito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1007_11: tatthāpi uppajjamānameva sandhāya uppajjantīti gahetuṃ na sakkā “yassa kāmarāgānusayo anuseti,
tika-abh03t:1007_14: Athāpi appahīnataṃ sandhāya uppajjantīti attho tattha gahito,
tika-abh03t:1007_18: Nanu na koci anusayo yattha uppajjantassa anuseti nānuseti cāti dvidhā kātabbā,
tika-abh03t:1012_1: Cittayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ āditova tayo suddhikamahāvārā hontīti ime tayo mahāvārā sarāgādikusalādīhi missakā suddhikā ca,
tika-abh03t:1012_3: Missakesu ca ekekasmiṃ sarāgādimissakacitte tayo tayo mahāvārā,
tika-abh03t:1012_4: te tattha tattha pana vutte sampiṇḍetvā “soḷasa puggalavārā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1012_7: tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”tiādinā uppādanirodhānaṃ paccuppannānāgatakālānañca saṃsaggavasena
tika-abh03t:1012_9: Evaṃ sesānampi vārānaṃ taṃtaṃnāmatā pāḷianusārena veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:1015_1: Tathārūpasseva khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ sandhāyāti idaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgipacchimacittasamaṅgimhi puggale
tika-abh03t:1015_2: adhippete tañca cittaṃ adhippetameva hotīti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1015_3: Arahato pacchimacittampīti nuppajjati nirujjhatīti evaṃpakāraṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1016_4: no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthā”ti etassa “sabbesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1016_5: cittaṃ khaṇapaccuppannameva hutvā uppādakkhaṇaṃ atītattā uppajjittha nāmā”ti attho vutto.
tika-abh03t:1016_6: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati cāti etassapi uppādaṃ pattattā uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t:1016_7: anatītattā uppajjati nāmāti dvayametaṃ evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:1016_11: taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “no”ti avatvā vibhajitabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:1016_13: taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthā”ti ettha ca “no”ti avatvā “āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:1016_17: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇeti ca uppajjamānacittasamaṅgī puggalo vutto,
tika-abh03t:1016_19: taṃ pana cittaṃ uppajjatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1016_20: Cittanti hi sāmaññavacanaṃ ekasmiṃ anekasmiñca yathāgahitavisese tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-abh03t:1016_23: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti ettha yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissatīti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitapuggalasseva
tika-abh03t:1016_24: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti evaṃ sabbattha sanniṭṭhānavasena niyamo veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:1016_25: Uppannuppajjamānavāro niruddhanirujjhamānavāro ca puggalavārādīsu tīsupi ninnānākaraṇā uddiṭṭhā niddiṭṭhā ca.
tika-abh03t:1016_26: Tattha puggalavāre avisesena yaṃ kañci tādisaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya “uppannaṃ uppajjamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1016_28: puggaladhammavāre puggalaṃ cittañcāti ayamettha viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1017_1: Atikkantakālavāre imassa puggalavārattā puggalo pucchitoti puggalasseva vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1017_2: Yathā yassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti etena na koci puggalo na gahito,
tika-abh03t:1017_3: evaṃ yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālanti etena sanniṭṭhānena na koci na gahito.
tika-abh03t:1017_6: te ca pana nirujjhamānakkhaṇātītacittā na na hontīti paṭhamo pañho “āmantā”ti vissajjitabbo siyā,
tika-abh03t:1017_8: Catuttho pana “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1017_9: no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1017_10: itaresaṃ cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkanta”nti vissajjitabbo bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t:1017_11: tathā avissajjetvā kasmā sabbattha cittameva vibhattanti?
tika-abh03t:1017_13: Khaṇassa hi vītikkantatāya atikkantakālatāvacanena vattamānassa ca cittassa vasena puggalo uppādakkhaṇātītacitto vutto atītassa ca,
tika-abh03t:1017_14: tattha purimassa cittaṃ na bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ pacchimassa vītikkantanti evamādiko puggalavibhāgo
tika-abh03t:1017_16: tassa cittassa taṃtaṃkhaṇavītikkamāvītikkamadassanavasena dassito hotīti sabbavissajjanesu cittameva vibhattaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1017_17: Atha vā nayidha dhammamattavisiṭṭho puggalo pucchito,
tika-abh03t:1017_23: tathā pana avatvā nirodhakkhaṇavītikkamena atikkantakālatā na uppādakkhaṇavītikkamena atikkantakālatā
tika-abh03t:1017_24: viya vattamānassa atthīti dassanatthaṃ “atītaṃ citta”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1017_25: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti ettha uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ yassa cittaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:1018_1: Missakavāresu yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t:1018_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t:1018_5: tassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”ti mātikāṭhapanāyaṃ vuttattā vissajjanepi tatheva sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayatthesu
tika-abh03t:1018_6: sarāgādimissakacittavaseneva pucchā uddharitvā “sarāgapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh03t:1018_8: itaresaṃ sarāgacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati nirujjhissati ceva
tika-abh03t:1018_9: uppajjissati cā”ti evamādinā nayena yebhuyyena suddhikavārasadisameva vissajjanaṃ kātabbanti katvā saṃkhittanti
tika-abh03t:1024_1: Dhammayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāti yathā mūlayamake kusalādidhammā desitā,
tika-abh03t:1024_2: yathā ca khandhayamakādīsu “pañcakkhandhā”tiādinā aññathā saṅgahetvā desitā,
tika-abh03t:1024_3: tathā adesetvā yā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ “kusalākusalā dhammā”tiādikā mātikā,
tika-abh03t:1024_4: taṃ idha ādimhi ṭhapetvā desitassāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1027_2: tassa abyākatā dhammā uppajjantī”ti etassa vissajjane “abyākatā cāti cittasamuṭṭhānarūpavasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1027_4: taṃ pana paṭilomavārassa vissajjane sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1027_6: āruppe akusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā ca dhammā na uppajjanti abyākatā ca dhammā na uppajjantīti
tika-abh03t:1027_7: ettha pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppajjamānampi kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpaṃ aggahetvā “abyākatā ca dhammā
tika-abh03t:1027_11: tathā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva sandhāya “yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t:1027_14: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānarūpādīnampi uppādassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1027_15: ca nirodhassa evamādīhi eva pāḷīhi paṭisedhasiddhito.
tika-abh03t:1028_0: Ye ca vadanti “yathā paṭisambhidāmagge nirodhakathāyaṃ ‘sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammā ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:1028_1: sabbepi virāgā ceva honti virāgārammaṇā virāgagocarā virāgasamudāgatā virāgapatiṭṭhā’tiādīsu ‘ṭhapetvā
tika-abh03t:1028_2: rūpa’nti avatvā cittapaṭibaddhattā cittajarūpānaṃ ‘ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1028_7: te sotāpattimaggasahajātā dhammā sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammāti tattha vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1028_8: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātāti hi vacanaṃ magge jātataṃ dīpeti,
tika-abh03t:1028_9: na ca kammajādīni amagge jāyamānāni maggakkhaṇe jātavohāraṃ arahanti tesaṃ tassa sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe sahajātapaccayattābhāvato,
tika-abh03t:1028_10: tasmā maggakkhaṇe taṃsahajātadhammesu ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetuṃ “ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1028_11: idha pana kusalādidhammā yassa yattha uppajjanti nirujjhanti ca,
tika-abh03t:1028_12: tassa puggalassa tasmiñca okāse abyākatadhammānaṃ uppādanirodhānaṃ kusalādipaṭibaddhatā appaṭibaddhatā ca āmaṭṭhā,
tika-abh03t:1028_13: na ca kammajādirūpaṃ abyākataṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t:1028_14: tasmā sanniṭṭhānena gahitassa puggalassa okāse vā uppādanirodhesu vijjamānesu abyākatānaṃ te veditabbā,
tika-abh03t:1028_16: na ca acittapaṭibaddhā abyākatāti ettha na gahitāti sakkā vattuṃ nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānañca uppādanirodhavacanatoti.
tika-abh03t:1029_0: Catutthapañhe pavatte akusalābyākatacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ “yassa vā pana abyākatā dhammā uppajjantī”ti
tika-abh03t:1029_1: etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu pañcavokāre akusalābyākatacittānaṃ catuvokāre ca abyākatacittasseva uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino
tika-abh03t:1030_2: nānāvajjanenapi pana tato purimatarajavanavīthīsu uppannassa “uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ akusalā dhammā nuppajjissanti,
tika-abh03t:1030_3: no ca tesaṃ kusalā dhammā nuppajjantī”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ labbhateva,
tika-abh03t:1030_4: tasmā etena lakkhaṇena samānalakkhaṇaṃ sabbaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
tika-abh03t:1030_5: tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇeti eteneva kusalānāgatabhāvapariyosānena tāya eva samānalakkhaṇatāya dīpitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1030_6: Esa nayo akusalātītabhāvassa abyākatātītabhāvassa ca ādimhi “dutiye akusale”ti,
tika-abh03t:1030_8: Yathā hi bhāvanāvāre bhāvanāpahānānaṃ pariyosānena aggamaggena tato purimatarānipi bhāvanāpahānāni dassitāni honti,
tika-abh03t:1030_9: evamidhāpi taṃ taṃ tena tena ādinā antena ca dassitanti.
tika-abh03t:1031_1: Pañcavokāre akusalānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ akusalā ca dhammā nirujjhanti abyākatā ca dhammā nirujjhantīti vacanena paṭisandhicittato soḷasamaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1037_1: Indriyayamake vibhaṅge viya jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyānantaraṃ aniddisitvā purisindriyānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ “tīṇimāni,
tika-abh03t:1037_6: Pavattivāre hi ekantaṃ pavattiyaṃ eva uppajjamānānaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ kammajānaṃ akammajānañca anupālakaṃ
tika-abh03t:1037_7: jīvitindriyaṃ cutipaṭisandhīsu ca pavattamānānaṃ kammajānanti taṃmūlakāni yamakāni cutipaṭisandhipavattivasena
tika-abh03t:1037_9: Cakkhundriyādīsu pana purisindriyāvasānesu yaṃ mūlakameva na hoti manindriyaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1037_10: taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlakāni cutiupapattivaseneva vattabbāni āyatanayamake viya,
tika-abh03t:1037_11: tasmā jīvitindriyaṃ tesaṃ majjhe anuddisitvā ante uddiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1040_1: Itthī itthindriyanti ettha yasmā itthīti koci sabhāvo natthi,
tika-abh03t:1040_2: na ca rūpādidhamme upādāya itthiggahaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t:1040_3: tasmā itthiggahaṇassa avijjamānampi vijjamānamiva gahetvā pavattito tathāgahitassa vasena “natthī”ti avatvā “no”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1040_5: dukkhassa ca “dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti vacaneneva somanassato aññā sukhā vedanā sukhaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1040_6: domanassato ca aññā dukkhā vedanā dukkhanti ayaṃ viseso gahitoyevāti “sukhaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhindriya”nti ettha “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1041_1: Suddhindriyavāre cakkhu indriyanti ettha dibbacakkhupaññācakkhūni paññindriyāni hontīti “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1044_6: kāyindriyaṃ manindriya”nti sutte vuttanayena idha uddiṭṭhaṃ manindriyaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattīsu pavattamānehi
tika-abh03t:1044_8: na ca jīvitindriyaṃ viya aññadhammanissayena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1044_10: tasmā kūṭaṃ viya gopānasīnaṃ sabbindriyānaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ante ṭhapetvā yojitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1044_11: Jīvitindriyādimūlakesu pavattiñca gahetvā gatesu “yassa jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1044_14: pavatte sukhindriyavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1044_16: sukhindriyasampayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ jīvitindriyañca uppajjati sukhindriyañca uppajjatī”tiādinā
tika-abh03t:1044_21: Tehi pana pavattiyaṃyeva uppajjamānehi yojanā taṃmūlakā ca cutipaṭisandhipavattīsu pavattamānehi somanassindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t:1044_22: yojanāya jīvitindriyamūlakehi ca nayehi pākaṭāyevāti katvā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1045_0: “Sacakkhukānaṃ vinā somanassenāti upekkhāsahagatānaṃ catunnaṃ mahāvipākapaṭisandhīnaṃ vasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1045_4: Tattha kāmāvacaresu somanassapaṭisandhisamānatāya mahāvipākehi catūhi nidassanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:1045_5: tena yathā sasomanassapaṭisandhikā acakkhukā na honti,
tika-abh03t:1045_7: Gabbhaseyyakānañca anuppannesu cakkhādīsu cavantānaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhikatā sahetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1045_9: Gabbhaseyyakepi hi sandhāya “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1045_13: Na hi sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitānaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vajjane kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:1045_14: “itthīnaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantīna”ntiādīsu ca te eva vuttāti.
tika-abh03t:1046_0: Upekkhāya acakkhukānanti ahetukapaṭisandhivasena vuttanti ettha ca kāmāvacare sopekkhaacakkhukapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh03t:1047_1: samādhivīriyāni pana indriyappattāni na hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1047_3: “indriyappattāni na hontī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ “samādhi samādhindriyanti?
tika-abh03t:1047_6: Ahetukapaṭisandhicitte ca yathā samādhileso ekaggatā atthi,
tika-abh03t:1047_8: tasmā evamettha vattabbaṃ siyā “tattha hi ekanteneva saddhāvīriyasatipaññāyo natthi,
tika-abh03t:1047_11: yathā aññesu kesuci ahetukacittesu samādhivīriyāni honti indriyappattāni ca,
tika-abh03t:1047_14: Tattha “samādhivīriyāni pana na hontī”ti vattabbe “indriyappattānī”ti samādhilesassa samādhindriyabhāvaṃ appattassa sabbhāvato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1047_17: Yesu pana potthakesu “tattha ekanteneva saddhāvīriyasatipaññāyo natthī”ti pāṭho,
tika-abh03t:1048_1: tāva gabbhagatānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ bhāvo atthīti iminā adhippāyenāha “sahetukānaṃ acakkhukānanti gabbhaseyyakavasena ceva arūpīvasena ca vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t:1048_2: Gabbhaseyyakāpi pana avassaṃ uppajjanakacakkhukā na labbhantīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1048_3: Sacakkhukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānanti kāmadhātuyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttanti idhāpi ahetukapaṭisandhikā ca acakkhukā labbhanteva.
tika-abh03t:1048_6: Kadāci hi tesaṃ paṭhamakappikādīnaṃ viya pavattiyampi uppādanirodhā hontīti.
tika-abh03t:1048_7: Ettha purisindriyāvasānesu indriyamūlayamakesu paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānehi gahitehi upapatticutivasena
tika-abh03t:1048_8: gacchantehi cakkhundriyādīhi niyamitattā jīvitindriyādīnaṃ pavattivasenapi labbhamānānaṃ upapatticutivaseneva
tika-abh03t:1049_2: āha “pavatte somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti arūpajīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t:1049_3: Etesañceva aññesañca pañcindriyānaṃ yathālābhavasenāti ettha etesaṃ jīvitindriyādīnaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattesu,
tika-abh03t:1049_4: aññesañca cakkhundriyādīnaṃ cutipaṭisandhīsūti evaṃ yathālābho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1049_5: Ayaṃ pana chedeyevāti ettha tassa tassa paripuṇṇapañhassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sarūpadassanena vissajjane vissajjite
tika-abh03t:1050_0: Yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1050_2: Vinā somanassena upapajjantānaṃ pavatte somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1050_3: no ca tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjatīti ettha “nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattāna”nti avacanaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa
tika-abh03t:1050_6: “Vinā somanassena upapajjantāna”nti ettha asaññasatte saṅgahetvā pavattivasena te ca nirodhasamāpannā ca na vuttā,
tika-abh03t:1050_10: pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyañca na uppajjati jīvitindriyañca na uppajjatī”ti evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1050_11: “sabbesaṃ cavantāna”nti ettheva asaññasatte saṅgaṇhitvā pavattivasena te ca nirodhasamāpannā na ca vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1050_12: Yassayatthake ca nirodhasamāpannā na dassetabbā na gahetabbāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1050_13: Na hi “nirodhasamāpannāna”nti vacanaṃ “asaññasattāna”nti vacanaṃ viya okāsadīpakaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1050_15: sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe”tiādivacanaṃ viya somanassindriyādīnaṃ anuppādakkhaṇadīpakaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1051_0: Atītakālabhede suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha
tika-abh03t:1051_1: jīvitindriyañca na uppajjitthāti ettha “upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1051_3: asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjitthā”ti ettha viya “upapajjantāna”nti vattabbanti?
tika-abh03t:1051_5: Yathā hi somanassamanindriyānaṃ vasena upapajjantā puggalā upapatticittasamaṅgino honti,
tika-abh03t:1051_6: na evaṃ somanassajīvitindriyānaṃ vasena upapattisamaṅginoyeva honti.
tika-abh03t:1051_7: Jīvitindriyassa hi vasena yāva paṭhamarūpajīvitindriyaṃ dharati,
tika-abh03t:1051_9: Tadā ca dutiyacittato paṭṭhāya “jīvitindriyañca na uppajjitthā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ arūpajīvitindriyassa uppajjitvā niruddhattā,
tika-abh03t:1051_11: Yathā hi “na nirujjhitthā”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ upapatticittassa dvīsu khaṇesu labbhamānaṃ sabbapaṭhamena upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena nidassitaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1052_0: Anāgatakālabhede uppajjissamāne sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā aññassa ca uppajjissamānatāva pucchitā.
tika-abh03t:1052_1: Tattha yathā paccuppannakālabhede sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayabhedehi uppajjamānasseva gahitattā “yassa cakkhundriyādīni uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t:1052_2: upapajjantassa tassa jīvitindriyādīni uppajjantī”ti upapajjantasseva pucchitānaṃ upapattiyaṃyeva tesaṃ uppādo sambhavati,
tika-abh03t:1052_5: upapajjantassa tassa jīvitindriyādīni uppajjissantī”ti upapajjantasseva pucchitānaṃ tesaṃ upapattito aññattha uppādo na sambhavati,
tika-abh03t:1052_15: Na hi upapajjantassa tassa cutito pubbeva somanassindriyanirodho na sambhavatīti.
tika-abh03t:1052_16: Ettha hi paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānattho pucchitabbatthanissayo mādisova upapattiuppādindriyavā ubhayuppādindriyavā
tika-abh03t:1052_17: attho paṭinivattitvāpi pucchitabbatthassa nissayoti evaṃ viya dutiyapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānatthameva niyameti,
tika-abh03t:1052_18: na tattheva pucchitabbaṃ anāgatabhāvamattena sarūpato gahitaṃ uppādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃsayatthanti.
tika-abh03t:1053_0: Paṭilome pana yathā anulome “uppajjissati nirujjhissatī”ti uppādanirodhā anāgatā sarūpavasena vuttā,
tika-abh03t:1053_1: evaṃ avuttattā yathā tattha saṃsayapadena gahitassa indriyassa pavattiyampi uppādanirodhā cakkhundriyādimūlakesu yojitā,
tika-abh03t:1053_3: Yathā hi uppādanirodhe atikkamitvā appatvā ca uppādanirodhā sambhavanti yojetuṃ,
tika-abh03t:1053_4: na evaṃ anuppādānirodhe atikkamitvā appatvā ca anuppādānirodhā sambhavanti abhūtābhāvassa abhūtābhāvaṃ atikkamitvā appatvā ca sambhavānuppattito,
tika-abh03t:1053_6: tasmāssa visesarahitassa abhūtābhāvassa vattamānānaṃ uppādassa viya kālantarayogābhāvato yādisānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1053_8: tannissayā tādisānaṃyeva upapatticutiuppādanirodhānaṃ jīvitādīnampi anuppādānirodhā saṃsayapadena pucchitā
tika-abh03t:1053_15: na vuttaṃ “ye arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantī”tiādinā jīvitindriyaupekkhindriyādīsu viya vissajjananti.
tika-abh03t:1054_2: no ca tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjissatī”ti ettha ye sopekkhapaṭisandhikā bhavissanti,
tika-abh03t:1054_3: te “ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantī”ti etena pacchimakoṭṭhāsavacanena taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāya
tika-abh03t:1055_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yesu ādimapotthakesu “atītānāgatavāre suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca
tika-abh03t:1055_1: nuppajjitthāti dhammayamake viya uppādakkhaṇātikkamavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1055_3: Yesu pana potthakesu “paccuppannātītavāre suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca nuppajjitthāti…pe…
tika-abh03t:1055_4: tasmiṃ bhave anuppannapubbavasena attho gahetabbo”ti pāṭho dissati,
tika-abh03t:1058_1: Pariññāvāre lokiyaabyākatamissakāni cāti dukkhasaccapariyāpannehi ekantapariññeyyehi lokiyaabyākatehi
tika-abh03t:1058_2: missakattā tāni upādāya manindriyādīnaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ viya pariññeyyatā ca vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1058_5: so abyākataṃ dhammaṃ parijānātī”tiādinā abyākatapadena yojetvā yamakāni na vuttānīti?
tika-abh03t:1059_0: Kasmā panettha dukkhasaccabhājanīye āgatassa domanassassa pahātabbatāva vuttā,
tika-abh03t:1059_2: nanu dukkhasaccapariyāpannā vedanākkhandhādayo kusalākusalabhāvena aggahitā kusalākusalāpi pariññeyyāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1059_3: yathā pana vedanākkhandhādibhāvo bhāvetabbapahātabbabhāvehi vināpi hoti,
tika-abh03t:1059_4: na evaṃ domanassindriyabhāvo pahātabbabhāvena vinā hotīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ domanassindriyassa pahātabbatāva idha vuttā,
tika-abh03t:1059_10: na pana sacchikātabbaniṭṭhanti bhāvetabbabhāvo eva tassa gahitoti.
tika-abh03t:1059_11: “Dve puggalā”tiādi “cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātī”tiādikassa parato likhitabbaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1059_12: Cakkhundriyamūlakañhi atikkamitvā domanassindriyamūlake idaṃ vuttaṃ “dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ na pajahanti no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventī”ti.
tika-abh03t:1060_3: so “puthujjano”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca na pajahitthā”tiādīsu ca abhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t:1060_4: “Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissantī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti
tika-abh03t:1060_5: domanassindriyañca pajahissantī”tiādīsu ca bhabbo eva bhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t:1060_6: “Ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissantī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti
tika-abh03t:1060_7: cakkhundriyañca na parijānissantī”tiādīsu ca abhabbo eva.
tika-abh03t:1060_8: Aggaphalasamaṅgī ca paṭhamaphalasamaṅgī arahā cāti duvidho.
tika-abh03t:1060_9: Sopi “arahā”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahitthā”tiādīsu ca abhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t:1060_10: “Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikarotī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha,
tika-abh03t:1060_11: no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthā”tiādīsu ca paṭhamaphalasamaṅgī ca bhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t:1060_12: “Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu itarovāti evaṃ puggalabhedaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t:1066_7: devanīyā vā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā,
tika-abh03t:1066_19: māravijayasabbaññuguṇaparahitanipphādanesu appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti gamanīyato,
tika-abh03t:1066_21: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi atikkanto atisayo vā devoti devātidevo.
tika-abh03t:1066_23: visuddhidevabhāvaṃ vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkāraṃ pattattā aññadevehi atirekataro vā devo devātidevo.
tika-abh03t:1066_25: Sakkādīhi devehi pahārādaasurindādīhi dānavehi ca pūjito.
tika-abh03t:1066_26: Kāyavacīsaṃyamassa sīlassa indriyasaṃvarassa cittasaṃyamassa samādhissa ca paṭipakkhānaṃ accantapaṭippassaddhiyā suddhasaṃyamo.
tika-abh03t:1067_0: Isisattamoti catusaccāvabodhagatiyā isayoti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ sataṃ pasatthānaṃ isīnaṃ atisayena santo pasatthoti attho.
tika-abh03t:1067_4: Atigambhīranayamaṇḍitadesanaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāma desesi pakaraṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh03t:1070_1: kiñca taṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti nayidaṃ pucchitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh03t:1070_2: Nidānakathāyaṃ paṭṭhānasamānane anulomādīnaṃ nayānaṃ paṭṭhānassa ca dassitattāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “sammāsambuddhena hi…pe…
tika-abh03t:1070_3: nāmāti hi vutta”nti tattha vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāḷiṃ āhari.
tika-abh03t:1071_2: Evañhi saṅkhepato paṭṭhāne ñāte vitthāro sukhaviññeyyo hotīti.
tika-abh03t:1071_3: Tattha ca nāmattho paṭhamaṃ vattabboti “tattha yesaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t:1071_4: nāmattho tāva evaṃ veditabbo”ti vatvā sabbasādhāraṇassa paṭṭhānanāmasseva tāva atthaṃ dassento “kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha. Pa-
tika-abh03t:1071_7: yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ tadupāgamuntiādīsu viya nānappakāratthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:1071_12: Atthato hi āpannaṃ nānāvidhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ nānā-
tika-abh03t:1071_14: Tattha ekassapi dhammassa hetuādīhi anekapaccayabhāvato ca ekekassa paccayassa anekadhammabhāvato ca nānappakārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:1072_0: Hetupaccayādivasena vibhattattāti etena dhammasaṅgahādīsu vuttato kusalādivibhāgato sātisayavibhāgataṃ paṭṭhānanāmalābhassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1072_6: sabbaññutaññāṇassa nissaṅgavasena pavattassa gamanattā gamanadesabhāvato ekekaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1072_7: Tattha aññehi gatimantehi atisayayuttassa gatimato gamanaṭṭhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1072_8: Tassa mahāvegassa purisassa papātaṭṭhānaṃ viya dhammasaṅgaṇīādīnaṃ sāsaṅgagamanaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ imassa ca
tika-abh03t:1072_9: mahāpatho viya nirāsaṅgagamanaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dassento atisayayuttagamanaṭṭhānabhāvo paṭṭhānanāmalābhassa
tika-abh03t:1073_1: Samantāti anulomādīhi sabbākārehipi gatāni catuvīsati hontīti attho.
tika-abh03t:1073_2: Etasmiṃ atthe catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānānīti “samantacatuvīsatipaṭṭhānānī”ti vattabbe samantasaddassa parayogaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1073_3: Atha vā samantā cha cha hutvāti etena anulomādisabbakoṭṭhāsato tikādichachabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1073_6: tasmā samantato paṭṭhānāni tāni catuvīsatīti katvā “catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1074_0: Hetu ca so paccayo cāti iminā vacanena hetuno adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa ca gahaṇaṃ siyāti taṃ nivārento āha “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti.
tika-abh03t:1074_1: Etenapi so eva doso āpajjatīti punāha “hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh03t:1074_5: Tassa hi paccayasaddassa ca samānādhikaraṇataṃ sandhāya “hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti,
tika-abh03t:1074_8: hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā tena tena hetubhāvādiupakārena tassa tassa dhammassa upakārattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1074_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ appaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā,
tika-abh03t:1074_10: so tassa paccayo”ti “mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo”ticcevamādinā dhammappadhānaniddesena dhammato
tika-abh03t:1074_11: aññā dhammasatti nāma natthīti dhammeheva dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1074_12: Idhāpi vā hetu ca so paccayo cāti dhammeneva dhammasattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1074_13: Na hi hetupaccayotiādiko uddeso kusalādiuddeso viya dhammappadhāno,
tika-abh03t:1074_19: Koci hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo,
tika-abh03t:1075_0: Upakārakalakkhaṇoti ca dhammena dhammasattiupakāraṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1075_5: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati
tika-abh03t:1076_2: manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t:1076_3: uppannā ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tiādīhi kusalabhāvassa yonisomanasikārapaṭibaddhatā siddhā hotīti
tika-abh03t:1076_5: Eteneva akusalābyākatabhāvā kusalabhāvo viya na hetupaṭibaddhāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1076_6: Yaṃ paneke maññeyyuṃ “ahetukahetussa akusalabhāvo viya sahetukahetūnaṃ sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo aññesaṃ taṃsampayuttānaṃ hetupaṭibaddho”ti,
tika-abh03t:1076_8: Alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā,
tika-abh03t:1076_12: taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya.
tika-abh03t:1076_14: tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu phassādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhakusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesatha,
tika-abh03t:1076_20: sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu viya sampayuttesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo,
tika-abh03t:1077_2: rūpāyatanādimatte yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ aṭṭhatvā “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti aniyamena sabbarūpāyatana…pe…
tika-abh03t:1077_3: dhammāyatanānañca ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā na koci dhammo na hotīti.
tika-abh03t:1078_0: “Chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne citte chandādayo
tika-abh03t:1078_1: dhurabhūtā jeṭṭhakabhūtā sayaṃ sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh03t:1078_2: taṃsampayuttadhammā ca tesaṃ vase vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato,
tika-abh03t:1078_4: Garukātabbampi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ paccavekkhaṇaassādamaggaphalānaṃ attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1078_5: tasmāyaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakatā adhipatipaccayatāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1079_2: cutianantarā paṭisandhīti yassa yassa cittassa anantarā yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1079_3: tassa tassa tadanantaruppādaniyamo taṃtaṃsahakārīpaccayavisiṭṭhassa purimapurimacittasseva vasena ijjhatīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1079_4: Bhāvanābalena pana vāritattāti ettha yathā rukkhassa vekhe dinne pupphituṃ samatthasseva pupphanaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t:1079_5: agadavekhe pana apanīte tāyayeva samatthatāya pupphanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:1079_7: tasmiñca apagate tāyayeva samatthatāya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1080_1: na atthatoti upacayasantatiadhivacananiruttipadānaṃ viya saddatthamattato nānākaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1080_5: Rūpadhammānaṃ viya saṇṭhānābhāvato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito heṭṭhā uddhaṃ
tika-abh03t:1080_6: tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādanasamatthatā samanantarapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t:1081_0: Uppādanasamatthatāti ca abyāpārattā dhammānaṃ yasmiṃ yadākāre niruddhe vattamāne vā sati taṃtaṃvisesavantā dhammā honti,
tika-abh03t:1081_2: Dhammānaṃ pavattimeva ca upādāya kālavohāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1081_3: asaññasattā cavantassa purimacutipacchimapaṭisandhīnañca nirodhuppādanirantaratāya kālantaratā natthīti
tika-abh03t:1081_5: Na hi tesaṃ antarā arūpadhammānaṃ pavatti atthi,
tika-abh03t:1081_7: na ca rūpadhammappavatti arūpadhammappavattiyā antaraṃ karoti aññasantānattā.
tika-abh03t:1081_8: Rūpārūpadhammasantatiyo hi dve aññamaññaṃ visadisasabhāvattā aññamaññopakārabhāvena vattamānāpi visuṃyeva honti.
tika-abh03t:1081_9: Ekasantatiyañca purimapacchimānaṃ majjhe vattamānaṃ taṃsantatipariyāpannatāya antarakārakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1081_11: na ca abhāvo antarakārako hoti abhāvattāyeva,
tika-abh03t:1081_13: bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viya ca nirantaratā suṭṭhu ca anantaratā hotīti tathā uppādanasamatthatā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacutīnampi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1081_14: Uppattiyā paccayabhāvo cettha anantarapaccayādīnaṃ pākaṭoti uppādanasamatthatāva vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1081_15: Paccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ pubbantāparantaparicchedena gahitānaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ alabhantānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1081_16: “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā anantarādipaccayabhāvo vuttoti
tika-abh03t:1081_18: Na hi kusalādiggahaṇaṃ viya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ aparicchedaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1081_20: teneva ca atītattike paṭiccavārādayo na santīti.
tika-abh03t:1082_0: Uppajjamānova sahuppādabhāvenāti etthāpi uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭena ṭhitiyāpi paccayabhāvaṃ nidassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1083_3: Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti,
tika-abh03t:1083_4: na ca purejātapacchājātabhāvehi upakārakassa upakārakā vatthukhandhā aññamaññapaccayā hontīti.
tika-abh03t:1084_0: Taruādīnaṃ pathavī viya adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1084_1: cakkhādayo ca cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ upakārakā cittakammassa paṭādayo viya nissayākārena khandhādayo taṃtaṃnissayānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1085_0: Tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissitoti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ nissayoti vadati.
tika-abh03t:1086_2: so attano phalassa uppādane samatthabhāvena suṭṭhukatataṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:1086_3: Tathā ca kataṃ attano santāne kataṃ hotīti āha “attano santāne”ti.
tika-abh03t:1086_4: Karaṇañca duvidhaṃ nipphādanaṃ upasevanañcāti dassetuṃ “nipphādito vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:1086_5: Tattha upasevito vāti etena kāyaallīyāpanavasena upabhogūpasevanaṃ vijānanādivasena ārammaṇūpasevanañca dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1086_6: Tena anāgatānampi cakkhusampadādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpasevanena yathāpaṭisevitānaṃ pakatūpanissayatā vuttā hoti.
tika-abh03t:1087_0: Yathā pacchājātena vinā santānāvicchedahetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ dhammānaṃ ye pacchājātākārena upakārakā,
tika-abh03t:1087_1: tesaṃ sā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā upakārakatā pacchājātapaccayatā,
tika-abh03t:1087_2: tathā nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārakabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1087_4: evaṃ sabbattha paccayānaṃ paccayantarākāravisiṭṭhā upakārakatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t:1088_0: Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsācetanā viyāti etena manosañcetanāhāravasena pavattamānehi arūpadhammehi rūpakāyassa upatthambhitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1089_0: Kusalādibhāvena attanā sadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ āsevanaṭṭho,
tika-abh03t:1089_2: Ganthādīsu purimāpurimābhiyogo viyāti purimā purimā āsevanā viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1090_4: Sā tāya uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭhe santāne sesapaccayasamāgame pavattamānānaṃ vipākakaṭattārūpānampi teneva kiriyabhāvena upakārikā hoti.
tika-abh03t:1090_5: Tassa hi kiriyabhāvassa pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti,
tika-abh03t:1090_7: Sahajātānaṃ pana tena upakārikāti kiṃ vattabbanti.
tika-abh03t:1091_0: Nirussāhasantabhāvenāti etena saussāhehi vipākadhammadhammehi kusalākusalehi sārammaṇādibhāvena sadisavipākabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1091_1: So hi vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāya payogena aññathā vā sesapaccayesu siddhesu kammassa kaṭattāyeva siddhito nirussāho santabhāvo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1091_4: Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyā rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati,
tika-abh03t:1091_7: Etena tappaccayavataṃ avipākānampi vipākānukulaṃ pavattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1092_0: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattenā”ti.
tika-abh03t:1092_1: Upatthambhakattañhi satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhāpakarūpāhārassa ca hoti,
tika-abh03t:1092_3: asati pana upatthambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1092_4: Janayamānopi hi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhayamānoyeva janetīti upatthambhanabhāvo āhārabhāvoti.
tika-abh03t:1093_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ viya pavattinivārake abhibhavitvā pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho,
tika-abh03t:1093_1: atha kho dassanādikiccesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi jīvane jīvantehi sukhitādibhāve sukhitādīhi adhimokkhapaggahupaṭṭhānāvikkhepajānanesu
tika-abh03t:1093_2: anaññātaññassāmīti pavattiyaṃ ājānane aññātāvībhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi
tika-abh03t:1093_4: Tesu tesu hi kiccesu cakkhādīnaṃ issariyaṃ tappaccayānañca tadanuvattanena tattha pavattīti.
tika-abh03t:1093_5: Itthipurisindriyānaṃ pana yadipi liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā atthi,
tika-abh03t:1093_7: Yathā hi jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1093_10: na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci pakārena upakārakā honti,
tika-abh03t:1093_11: kevalaṃ pana yathāsakeheva paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1093_12: tato aññenākārena taṃsahitasantāne appavattito liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā indriyatā ca tesaṃ vuccati,
tika-abh03t:1093_14: Cakkhādayo arūpadhammānaṃyevāti ettha sukhadukkhindriyānipi cakkhādiggahaṇena gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh03t:1094_0: Lakkhaṇārammaṇūpanijjhānabhūtānaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanādivasena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1094_1: cintanaṃ vā vitakkādīnaṃyeva sādhāraṇo byāpāro upanijjhāyanaṭṭho.
tika-abh03t:1094_3: “Sabbānipī”ti vatvā “sattajhānaṅgānī”ti vacanena ajhānaṅgānaṃ upekkhācittekaggatānaṃ nivattanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1094_4: Yadi evaṃ “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti eteneva siddhe “ṭhapetvā sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti kasmā vuttaṃ?
tika-abh03t:1094_5: Vedanābhedesu pañcasu sukhadukkhadvayassa ekantena ajhānaṅgattadassanatthaṃ jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh03t:1094_6: Satipi vā jhānaṅgavohāre vedanābhedadvayassa ekantena jhānapaccayattābhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1094_8: jhānapaccayabhāvo pana na natthīti “sabbānipi satta jhānaṅgānī”ti ettha gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t:1095_0: Yato tato vāti sammā vā micchā vāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1095_1: Ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā ahetukacittesu na labbhantīti idaṃ ahetukacittesu na labbhanti,
tika-abh03t:1095_4: Evaṃ atthe gayhamāne ahetukacittesu katthaci kassaci lābho na vāritoti ettakameva viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t:1095_6: Ahetukacittesu vā lābhābhāvadassanatthe pana imasmiṃ vacane savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayassa lābhābhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:1095_7: tasmā yena alābhena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ manodhātuādīnaṃ saṅgahasuññatavāresu jhānaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1095_8: taṃ alābhaṃ sandhāya esa jhānapaccayassapi ahetukacittesu alābho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:1095_9: Yathā hi sahetukesu vitakkādīnaṃ sahajāte saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekattagatabhāvakaraṇaṃ upanijjhāyanabyāpāro balavā,
tika-abh03t:1095_11: Imasmiṃ pana pakaraṇe dubbalampi upanijjhāyanaṃ yadipi kiñcimattampi atthi,
tika-abh03t:1095_12: tena upakārakatā hotīti savitakkāhetukacittesupi jhānapaccayo vuttova,
tika-abh03t:1095_13: tasmā ye evaṃ paṭhanti “na ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇaahetukacittesu labbhantī”ti,
tika-abh03t:1096_0: Samaṃ pakārehi yuttatāya ekībhāvopagamena viya upakārakatā sampayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t:1097_0: Yuttānampi sataṃ vippayuttabhāvena nānattūpagamena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t:1097_1: Na hi vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena ayuttānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇādibhāvena upakārakānaṃ vippayuttānaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:1097_2: Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi satipi avinibbhoge vippayogoyeva natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t:1098_2: “atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti ca evamādīsu vuttaṃ nibbattaupalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ atthibhāvaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh03t:1098_3: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakappadhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatāti āha “upatthambhakattenā”ti.
tika-abh03t:1098_4: Idañca upatthambhakattaṃ vatthārammaṇasahajātādīnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ atthibhāvena upakārakattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1099_0: Ārammaṇe phusanādivasena vattamānānaṃ phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hoti,
tika-abh03t:1099_3: Satipi purimataracittānaṃ natthibhāve na tāni natthibhāvena upakārakāni,
tika-abh03t:1099_4: anantarameva pana attano atthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ alabhamānānaṃ natthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ dadamānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1100_0: Ettha ca abhāvamattena upakārakatā okāsadānaṃ natthipaccayatā,
tika-abh03t:1100_6: sabhāvāvigamena nirodhassa appattiyā upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayabhāvaviseso dhammāvisesepi veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:1100_7: Dhammānañhi sattivisesaṃ sabbaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā tathāgatena catuvīsatipaccayavisesā vuttāti
tika-abh03t:1100_8: bhagavati saddhāya “evaṃvisesā ete dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayehi tadabhisamayāya
tika-abh03t:1101_0: Catūsu khandhesu ekassapi asaṅgahitattābhāvato nāmadhammekadesatā anantarādīnaṃ natthīti “nāmadhammāvā”ti
tika-abh03t:1101_1: vatvā na kevalaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāve bhajantānaṃ catunnaṃyeva khandhānaṃ nāmatā,
tika-abh03t:1101_2: atha kho nibbānañca nāmamevāti dassento “nibbānassa asaṅgahitattā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:1101_3: Purejātapaccayo rūpekadesoti ettha ekadesavacanena rūparūpato aññaṃ vajjeti,
tika-abh03t:1101_4: rūparūpaṃ pana kusalattike anāgatampi purejātapaccayabhāvena aññattha āgatameva.
tika-abh03t:1101_5: Vuttañhi “anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo –
tika-abh03t:1101_8: Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato…pe…
tika-abh03t:1105_2: so evaṃ veditabboti etena hetusaṅkhātassa paccayadhammassa hetusampayuttakataṃsamuṭṭhānarūpasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1105_4: Yo pana hetubhāvena yathāvutto paccayadhammo yathāvuttānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1105_6: Ubhayathāpi hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1105_10: Tathā tathā upakārakaṃ taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ dassento hi bhagavā taṃ taṃ upakārakataṃ dassetīti.
tika-abh03t:1106_2: Tena etassa hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1106_4: Tena na yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayabhāvena paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1106_6: Nanu ca sampayuttasaddassa sāpekkhattā dutiye hetusadde avijjamānepi aññassa apekkhitabbassa aniddiṭṭhattā
tika-abh03t:1106_7: attanāva sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayoti ayamattho viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t:1106_9: Hetusaddo hi paccattaniddiṭṭho “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettheva byāvaṭo yadā gayhati,
tika-abh03t:1106_10: tadā sampayuttavisesanaṃ na hotīti sampayuttā avisiṭṭhā ye keci gahitā bhaveyyunti evaṃ sampayuttasaddena
tika-abh03t:1106_11: attani eva byāvaṭena hetusaddena visesanena vinā yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti taṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:1106_15: “arūpino indriyā sampayuttakāna”nti ca vutte dutiyena āhāraggahaṇena indriyaggahaṇena ca vināpi āhārindriyasampayuttakāva gayhanti,
tika-abh03t:1106_18: Vajjetabbābhāvato hi tattha dutiyaāhārindriyaggahaṇe asatipi taṃsampayuttakāva gayhantīti taṃ na kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:1106_19: idha pana vajjetabbaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇanti.
tika-abh03t:1107_0: Evampi hetū hetusampayuttakānanti ettha hetusampayuttakānaṃ so eva sampayuttakahetūti visesanassa akatattā
tika-abh03t:1107_1: yo koci hetu yassa kassaci hetusampayuttakassa hetupaccayena paccayoti āpajjatīti?
tika-abh03t:1107_4: etadatthameva ca vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepi tassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t:1107_5: Atha vā asati dutiye hetusadde hetusampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh03t:1107_6: na pana hetūnanti evampi gahaṇaṃ siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ so vutto,
tika-abh03t:1107_8: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ hetūnaṃ aññesampi hetupaccayena paccayoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1107_13: tasmā te vināpi dutiyena āhārindriyaggahaṇena attanā eva āharitabbe ca isitabbe ca āhārindriyabhūte aññe
tika-abh03t:1107_14: ca sampayuttake paricchindantīti taṃ tattha na kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:1107_15: idha ca dutiyena hetuggahaṇena paccayuppannānaṃ hetunā paccayabhūteneva sampayuttānaṃ hetūnaṃ aññesañca
tika-abh03t:1107_16: paricchinnattā puna visesanakiccaṃ natthīti pañhāvāre “kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādīsu
tika-abh03t:1108_1: saddo purimavacanāpekkho vuttasseva niddeso “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakāna”ntiādīsu
tika-abh03t:1108_3: Ettha ca paccattaniddiṭṭho hetusaddo “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettha byāvaṭo sampayuttasaddena viya taṃ-
tika-abh03t:1108_4: saddenapi anapekkhanīyo añño ca koci niddisitabbappakāsako vutto natthi,
tika-abh03t:1109_0: “Hetusampayuttakāna”nti iminā pana paccayuppannavacanena asamattena paccayuppannavacanantarāpekkhena pubbe vuttena taṃ-
tika-abh03t:1109_6: te hetū ceva sampayuttakavisesanabhūtā tabbisesitā ca hetusampayuttakā.
tika-abh03t:1109_8: Aññathā “te hetū cevā”ti etassa paccattaniddiṭṭhena hetusaddena sambandhe sati yathā idha teneva taṃ-
tika-abh03t:1109_10: evaṃ pubbepi bhavituṃ arahantīti “niddisitabbassa apākaṭattā ‘taṃsampayuttakāna’nti na vutta”nti idaṃ na yujjeyyāti.
tika-abh03t:1109_11: Duvidhampi vā hetuggahaṇaṃ apanetvā taṃsaddavacanīyataṃ codeti pariharati ca.
tika-abh03t:1110_2: Yadi “cittasamuṭṭhānāna”nti vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpassa aggahaṇato taṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1110_3: sahajātapaccayavibhaṅge cittacetasikānaṃ tassa kaṭattārūpassa paccayabhāvo na vutto bhaveyya.
tika-abh03t:1110_4: Yadi ca tattha cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ paccayabhāvena taṃsamānalakkhaṇānaṃ kaṭattārūpānampi paccayabhāvo nidassito,
tika-abh03t:1110_7: Evaṃpakārena hi taṃsamuṭṭhānavacanena tattha tattha vuttaṃ samuṭṭhānavacanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1110_8: Nanu “cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānāna”nti vacanena cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittacetasikasamuṭṭhānatā vuttāti? Na vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1110_9: Cittacetasikānaṃ paccayabhāvo eva hi tattha vuttoti.
tika-abh03t:1111_5: viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā ārammaṇe sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti,
tika-abh03t:1111_6: tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe viruḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti,
tika-abh03t:1111_7: nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti imasmimpi sutte paṭisandhināmarūpassa viññāṇapaccayatā vuttāti āha “tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite”tiādi.
tika-abh03t:1112_0: Purimatarasiddhāya pathaviyā bījapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya purimatarasiddhe kamme tannibbattasseva viññāṇabījassa
tika-abh03t:1112_1: patiṭṭhānaṃ kammassa kaṭattā uppattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
tika-abh03t:1113_3: Vatthurūpamattampīti vadanto vatthurūpassa upatthambhakānaṃ sesarūpānampi tadupatthambhakabhāveneva arūpadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t:1113_5: Tattha kāyabhāvādikalāpānaṃ katthaci abhāvato katthaci abhāvābhāvato “vatthurūpamattampi vinā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1114_0: Pavattiyaṃ kaṭattārūpādīnaṃ paccayabhāvapaṭibāhanatoti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1114_1: nanu tesaṃ paccayabhāvappasaṅgoyeva natthi “hetū sahajātāna”nti vacanato.
tika-abh03t:1114_2: Na hi yesaṃ hetū sahajātapaccayo na honti,
tika-abh03t:1114_5: “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato dhammo uppajjati na hetupaccayā”tiādi ca labbheyya,
tika-abh03t:1114_9: yo pana hetūhi samānakāluppattimattaṃ gahetvā hetusahajātabhāvaṃ maññeyya,
tika-abh03t:1114_10: tassāyaṃ pasaṅgo atthīti idaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1114_11: Bhagavā pana vacanānaṃ lahugarubhāvaṃ na gaṇeti,
tika-abh03t:1114_12: bodhaneyyānaṃ pana ajjhāsayānurūpato dhammasabhāvaṃ avilomento tathā tathā desanaṃ niyāmetīti na katthaci akkharānaṃ bahutā vā appatā vā codetabbāti.
tika-abh03t:1117_1: Uppajjanakkhaṇeyevāti etena vattamānakkhaṇekadesena sabbaṃ vattamānakkhaṇaṃ gayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1117_2: Na hi uppajjanakkhaṇeyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ rūpādīni ārammaṇapaccayo,
tika-abh03t:1117_4: Tena ālambiyamānānampi rūpādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādivattamānatāya pure pacchā ca vijjamānānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayattābhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t:1117_6: Na ekato hontīti nīlādīni sabbarūpāni saha na honti,
tika-abh03t:1117_9: Tattha purimenatthena “uppajjantī”ti vacanena ārammaṇapaccayabhāvalakkhaṇadīpanatthaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhamma”ntiādi vuttanti dasseti,
tika-abh03t:1117_11: “Yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā”ti etassa vaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitasabbārammaṇādivasena vā idhāpi attho gahetabboti.
tika-abh03t:1118_0: Evaṃ vuttanti yathā nadīpabbatānaṃ sandanaṃ ṭhānañca pavattaṃ avirataṃ avicchinnanti sandanti tiṭṭhantīti vattamānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1118_1: evaṃ “ye ye dhammā”ti atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ sabbasaṅgahasamudāyavasena gahitattā tesaṃ uppajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1118_2: pavattanaṃ aviratanti uppajjantīti vattamānavacanaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1118_3: Ime pana na hetādipaccayā sabbepi atītānāgatānaṃ honti.
tika-abh03t:1118_4: Na hi atīto ca anāgato ca atthi,
tika-abh03t:1118_6: Evañca katvā atītattike atītānāgatānaṃ na koci paccayo vutto,
tika-abh03t:1118_7: tasmā idhāpi “uppajjantī”ti vacanena yesaṃ rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā ārammaṇapaccayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1118_9: Tesu hi dassitesu atītānāgatesu taṃtaṃpaccayā ahesuṃ bhavissanti cāti ayamattho dassito hoti,
tika-abh03t:1119_0: Ettha ca “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti ekavacananiddesaṃ katvā puna “te te dhammā”ti bahuvacananiddeso
tika-abh03t:1119_1: “yaṃ ya”nti vuttassa ārammaṇadhammassa anekabhāvopi atthīti dassanattho.
tika-abh03t:1119_2: Cattāro hi khandhā saheva ārammaṇapaccayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1119_3: te sabbepi ārabbha uppajjamānampi tesu ekekaṃ ārabbha uppajjamānaṃ na na hoti,
tika-abh03t:1119_4: tasmā vedanādīsu phassādīsu ca ekekassapi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ “yaṃ ya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1119_6: Tattha yo ca rūpādiko ekekova yaṃyaṃ-
tika-abh03t:1119_8: ye ca aneke phassādayo ekekavasena yaṃyaṃ-
tika-abh03t:1119_10: te sabbe gahetvā “te te”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1119_11: Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle ārabbha uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t:1119_12: tasmiṃ kāle nīlādīsu cittuppādesu ca ekekameva ārabbha uppajjantīti dassanatthaṃ “yaṃ ya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1119_13: te pana ālambiyamānā rūpārammaṇadhammā ca aneke,
tika-abh03t:1120_1: cāti imesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hotīti idaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena khandhapaṭibaddhānussaraṇakāle
tika-abh03t:1120_2: nibbānampi rūpāvacarakusalakiriyānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1120_3: Evaṃ sati yathā “appamāṇā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1120_6: Na hi nibbānaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhaṃ asaṅkhatattā,
tika-abh03t:1120_7: na ca pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbe nivuṭṭhesu appamāṇakkhandhesu ñātesu nibbānajānane na tena payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-abh03t:1120_8: Yathā hi cetopariyañāṇaṃ cittaṃ vibhāventameva cittārammaṇajānanassa kāmāvacarassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1120_9: evamidampi appamāṇakkhandhe vibhāventameva tadārammaṇajānanassa kāmāvacarassa paccayo hotīti.
tika-abh03t:1120_10: Diṭṭhanibbānoyeva ca pubbe nivuṭṭhe appamāṇakkhandhe anussarati,
tika-abh03t:1120_11: tena yathādiṭṭhameva nibbānaṃ tesaṃ khandhānaṃ ārammaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1120_15: tasmā nibbānaṃ na kassaci rūpāvacarassa ārammaṇanti “catunnaṃ rāsīna”nti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1123_3: Chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānanti ettha purimachandassa samānarūpena tadanantaraṃ niddiṭṭhena taṃsambandhena
tika-abh03t:1123_4: chandasaddeneva paccayabhūtassa chandassa sampayuttakavisesanabhāvo dassito hotīti “chandādhipati sampayuttakāna”nti
tika-abh03t:1124_6: Anavaññātanti avaññātampi adosadassitāya assādanena anavaññātaṃ katvā.
tika-abh03t:1125_0: Micchattaniyatā appanāsadisā mahābalā vinā adhipatinā nuppajjantīti “ekantenevā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1125_1: Kammakilesāvaraṇabhūtā ca te saggāvaraṇā ca maggāvaraṇā ca paccakkhasaggānaṃ kāmāvacaradevānampi uppajjituṃ na arahanti,
tika-abh03t:1126_0: Kāmāvacarādibhedato pana tividho kiriyārammaṇādhipati lobhasahagatākusalasseva ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo
tika-abh03t:1126_1: hotīti idaṃ parasantānagatānaṃ sārammaṇadhammānaṃ “ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa
tika-abh03t:1126_2: adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti etassa abhāvato “bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassā”ti ettha ca ārammaṇādhipatino
tika-abh03t:1126_3: anuddhaṭattā adhipatipaccayatā natthīti viññāyamānepi “bahiddhā khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1126_4: nissāya arahato kiriyadhammā puthujjanādīhi garuṃ katvā assādiyantīti iminā adhippāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1126_5: “Sanidassanasappaṭighā khandhā”tiādīsu viya khandhasaddo rūpe eva bhavituṃ arahatīti vicāritametaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1126_6: Puthujjanādikāle vā anāgate kiriyadhamme garuṃ katvā assādanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1126_7: “Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatī”tiādivacanato kiriyadhammā rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ adhipatipaccayo honteva,
tika-abh03t:1126_8: te ca “atītārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādivacanato anāgatā tebhūmakāpi adhipatipaccayo hontīti.
tika-abh03t:1129_4: tasmā taṃ cittaniyāmahetuvisesabhāvaṃ dassento “cakkhuviññāṇadhātū”tiādinā dhātuvasena kusalādivasena ca niddesamāha.
tika-abh03t:1129_5: Tattha “manoviññāṇadhātu manoviññāṇadhātuyā”ti vutte paccayapaccayuppannaviseso na viññāyatīti “purimā purimā pacchimāya pacchimāyā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:1129_6: Tathā ca sati dhātuvisesena cittavisese dassanaṃ yaṃ kātuṃ āraddho,
tika-abh03t:1129_8: “Manoviññāṇadhātu manodhātuyā”ti idampi na sakkā vattuṃ niyāmābhāvato,
tika-abh03t:1129_10: Na hi manodhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyāyeva anantarapaccayoti niyāmo atthi,
tika-abh03t:1129_11: tasmā pākaṭā pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo ādiṃ katvā yāva dhātuvisesaniyāmo atthi,
tika-abh03t:1129_12: tāva nidassanena nayaṃ dassetvā puna niravasesadassanatthaṃ “purimā purimā kusalā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:1129_13: Sadisakusalānanti vedanāya vā hetūhi vā sadisakusalānaṃ anurūpakusalānanti vā attho.
tika-abh03t:1130_0: Kāmāvacarakiriyāvajjanassāti kāmāvacarakiriyāya āvajjanassāti āvajjanaggahaṇena kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ visesetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1133_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo”ti ettha vuttassa “aññamañña”nti imassa attho vattabbo,
tika-abh03t:1133_4: na ca samānatthassapi saddantarassa atthe vutte saddantarassa attho vutto hoti,
tika-abh03t:1133_8: Rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti idaṃ yadipi pubbe “okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1133_9: tathāpi na tena khaṇantare paccayabhāvo rūpīnaṃ nivāritoti tannivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1133_10: Kañci kāleti keci kismiñci kāleti vā attho.
tika-abh03t:1133_11: Tena rūpino dhammā keci vatthubhūtā kismiñci paṭisandhikāleti rūpantarānaṃ vatthussa ca kālantare arūpīnaṃ sahajātapaccayaṃ pubbe anivāritaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh03t:1133_12: Evañca katvā “kañci kāla”nti vā “kismiñci kāle”ti vā vattabbe vibhattivipallāso kato.
tika-abh03t:1133_13: Tena hi “kañcī”ti upayogekavacanaṃ “rūpino dhammā”ti etena saha sambandhena paccattabahuvacanassa ādeso,
tika-abh03t:1133_15: Purimena ca “eko khandho vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā nāmasahitasseva vatthussa “nāmassa paccayo”ti
tika-abh03t:1133_16: vattabbatte āpanne etena kevalasseva tathā vattabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1134_0: Tayo na aññamaññavasenāti labbhamānepi katthaci aññamaññasahajātapaccayabhāve vacanena asaṅgahitattā tassa evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1134_1: Catusamuṭṭhānikassa rūpassa ekadesabhūte kammasamuṭṭhānarūpe samudāyekadesavasena sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1137_1: Nissayapaccayaniddese “rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kismiñci kāle”ti idaṃ na labbhati.
tika-abh03t:1137_3: tattha te eva dhamme dassetuṃ “cakkhāyatana”ntiādi vuttanti.
tika-abh03t:1137_4: “Vatthurūpaṃ pañcavokārabhave”ti vuttattā “ṭhapetvā āruppavipāka”nti idaṃ na vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-abh03t:1137_5: “tebhūmakavipākassā”ti vutte pañcavokārabhave anuppajjanakaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ ajānantassa tassa pakāsetabbattā.
tika-abh03t:1140_1: Te tayopi rāsayoti upanissaye tayo anekasaṅgāhakatāya rāsayoti vadati.
tika-abh03t:1140_2: Etasmiṃ pana upanissayaniddese ye purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ anantarūpanissayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1140_6: tesu “kesañcī”ti na sakkā vattunti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1140_7: Ye pana purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ ārammaṇapakatūpanissayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1140_8: te tesaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekantena honti,
tika-abh03t:1140_12: Tasmā yesu padesu anantarūpanissayo na labbhati,
tika-abh03t:1140_14: Siddhānaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ yehi paccayuppannehi akusalādīhi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1141_3: Na hi rūpābyākataṃ upanissayaṃ labhatīti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh03t:1141_4: Ārammaṇānantarūpanissaye tāva na labhati anārammaṇattā pubbāparaniyamena appavattito ca,
tika-abh03t:1141_5: pakatūpanissayañca na labhati acetanena rūpasantānena pakatassa abhāvato.
tika-abh03t:1141_6: Yathā hi arūpasantānena saddhādayo nipphāditā utubhojanādayo ca upasevitā,
tika-abh03t:1141_8: Yasmiñca utubījādike kammādike ca sati rūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh03t:1141_10: Sacetanasseva hi uppādanupatthambhanupayogādivasena cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ pakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1141_12: Yathā ca nirīhakesu paccayāyattesu dhammesu kesañci sārammaṇasabhāvatā hoti,
tika-abh03t:1141_15: Utubījādayo pana aṅkurādīnaṃ tesu asantesu abhāvato eva paccayā,
tika-abh03t:1141_17: Purimapurimānaṃyeva panettha upanissayapaccayabhāvo bāhullavasena pākaṭavasena ca vutto.
tika-abh03t:1141_18: “Anāgate khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ detī”tiādivacanato pana anāgatāpi upanissayapaccayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1141_19: te purimehi ārammaṇapakatūpanissayehi taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāya idha saṅgayhantīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1142_0: Puggalopi senāsanampīti puggalasenāsanaggahaṇavasena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajante dhamme dasseti, pi-
tika-abh03t:1142_1: saddena cīvarāraññarukkhapabbatādiggahaṇavasena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajante sabbe saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh03t:1142_2: “Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādīsu hi “senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassā”tiādivacanena
tika-abh03t:1142_3: senāsanaggahaṇena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajantāva dhammā upanissayapaccayena paccayoti imamatthaṃ dassentena
tika-abh03t:1142_5: Paccuppannāpi ārammaṇapakatūpanissayā paccuppannatāya senāsanasamānalakkhaṇattā ettheva saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1142_6: Vakkhati hi “paccuppannaṃ utuṃ bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādetī”tiādinā senāsanassa paccuppannabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:1142_9: vatthuṃ paccuppanne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādinā cakkhādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayabhāvañcāti.
tika-abh03t:1142_10: Paccuppannānampi ca tādisānaṃ pubbe pakatattā pakatūpanissayatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1143_0: Kasiṇārammaṇādīni ārammaṇameva honti, na upanissayoti iminā adhippāyena “ekaccāyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1144_1: tasmiṃ anuppannajhānuppādane sabbassa ca uppannajhānassa samāpajjane iddhividhādīnaṃ abhiññānañca upanissayoti
tika-abh03t:1144_3: Vuttampi cetaṃ “arūpāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ vipassanaṃ maggaṃ abhiññaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādetī”ti.
tika-abh03t:1144_5: paṭisandhiniyāmakassa cutito purimajavanassa ca vasena upanissayo,
tika-abh03t:1144_7: arūpāvacarakusalañca rūpāvacaravipākassa taduppādakakusalūpanissayabhāvenāti evaṃ paccekaṃ tebhūmakakusalānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1144_8: catubhūmakavipākassa tebhūmakakiriyassa ca yathāyogaṃ paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:1144_9: Pāḷiyampi hi pakatūpanissayo nayadassanamatteneva pañhāvāresu vissajjitoti.
tika-abh03t:1145_0: Iminā pana nayenāti lokuttaranibbattanaṃ upanissāya sinehuppādanalesenāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1145_1: Lokuttarā pana dhammā akusalānaṃ na kenaci paccayena paccayo hontīti na idaṃ sārato daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1145_3: arūpāvacaravipāko rūpāvacarakusalassa taṃ patthetvā tannibbattakakusaluppādanatthaṃ uppādiyamānassa,
tika-abh03t:1145_4: rūpāvacarakiriyassa ca pubbe nivuṭṭhādīsu arūpāvacaravipākajānanatthaṃ jhānābhiññāyo uppādentassa arahato,
tika-abh03t:1145_5: catubhūmakavipākānaṃ pana taduppādakakusalūpanissayabhāvavasena so so vipāko upanissayo.
tika-abh03t:1145_8: na pana tena taṃ kadāci diṭṭhapubbaṃ puthujjanādīhi sotāpattiphalādīni viya,
tika-abh03t:1145_9: tasmā tāni viya tesaṃ jhānādīnaṃ imassa ca aggaphalaṃ na jhānādīnaṃ upanissayo.
tika-abh03t:1146_0: Kiriyaatthapaṭisambhidādimpi patthetvā dānādikusalaṃ karontassa tebhūmakakiriyāpi catubhūmakassapi kusalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh03t:1146_6: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammesu pana utubhojanasenāsanānameva tiṇṇaṃ rāsīnaṃ pakatūpanissayabhāvadassanaṃ nayadassanamevāti.
tika-abh03t:1146_7: Imasmiṃ paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe āgatanayenāti idaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati na upanissayapaccayā,
tika-abh03t:1146_8: kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpa”nti evamādikaṃ upanissayapaṭikkhepaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1148_0: Taṃ rukkhā upanissāya, vaḍḍhante te vanappatī”ti. –
tika-abh03t:1152_1: Nayadassanavasena yāni vinā ārammaṇapurejātena na vattanti,
tika-abh03t:1152_2: tesaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapurejātadassanena manodvārepi yaṃ yadārammaṇapurejātena vattati,
tika-abh03t:1152_3: tassa tadālambitaṃ sabbampi rūparūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti dassitameva hoti,
tika-abh03t:1152_4: sarūpena pana adassitattā “sāvasesavasena desanā katā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1152_5: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmayato iddhividhābhiññāya ca aṭṭhārasasu yaṃkiñci ārammaṇapurejātaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1153_0: Tadārammaṇabhāvinoti ettha paṭisandhibhāvino vatthupurejātābhāvena itarassapi abhāvā aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1153_1: Bhavaṅgabhāvino pana gahaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ na vā kātabbaṃ paṭisandhiyā viya aparibyattassa ārammaṇassa ārammaṇamattabhāvato,
tika-abh03t:1162_1: Cetanāsampayuttakammaṃ abhijjhādi kammapaccayo na hotīti “cetanākammamevā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1162_2: Satipi hi vipākadhammadhammatte na cetanāvajjā evaṃsabhāvāti.
tika-abh03t:1162_3: Attano phalaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthenāti kammassa samatthatā tassa kammapaccayabhāvo vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1163_0: Pañcavokāreyeva, na aññatthāti etena kāmāvacaracetanā ekavokāre rūpampi na janetīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1166_1: Vipākapaccayaniddese yesaṃ ekantena vipāko vipākapaccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1166_3: Na hi āruppe bhūmidvayavipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh03t:1169_1: Kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitovāti asitapītādivatthūhi saha ajjhoharitovāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1170_0: Sesatisantatisamuṭṭhānassa anupālakova hutvāti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānassa āhārapaccayabhāvo vicāretvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh03t:1170_1: Na hi cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro nocittasamuṭṭhāno tadubhayañca cittasamuṭṭhānakāyassa āhārapaccayo vutto,
tika-abh03t:1173_1: Arūpajīvitindriyampi saṅgahitanti missakattā jīvitindriyaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ vajjitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1174_1: rūpārūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinibbhuttavohāro natthīti arūpānaṃ indriyapaccayabhūtāni paccayantarāpekkhāni
tika-abh03t:1174_2: cakkhādīni attano vijjamānakkhaṇe avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharantānipi indriyapaccayā siyuṃ.
tika-abh03t:1174_3: Yo pana nirapekkho indriyapaccayo avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:1174_4: so attano vijjamānakkhaṇe tesaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharanto nāma natthi.
tika-abh03t:1174_5: Yadi ca itthindriyapurisindriyāni indriyapaccayo liṅgādīnaṃ siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:1174_8: arūpaṃ vā arūpassa vinibbhuttassa indriyapaccayo atthīti.
tika-abh03t:1174_9: Sati cevaṃ itthipurisindriyehi avinibbhuttattā kalalādikāle ca liṅgādīni siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:1174_13: avinibbhuttattābhāvato ca tesaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ na pharanti.
tika-abh03t:1174_16: tasmā āpannavinibbhuttabhāvānaṃ tesaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ avinibbhuttānaṃ aññesañca samānakalāpadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayatāya
tika-abh03t:1174_20: te pana kalalādikālepi liṅgādīnaṃ tadanurūpānaṃ atthitaṃ icchanti.
tika-abh03t:1175_0: Jātibhūmivasena vuttesu bhedesu kusalajātiyaṃ rūpāvacarakusalameva āruppe ṭhapetabbanti “ṭhapetvā pana
tika-abh03t:1175_2: Paṭhamalokuttaraṃ pana domanassayuttañca visuṃ ekā jāti bhūmi vā na hotīti āruppe alabbhamānampi na ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1176_0: Ṭhitikkhaṇeti idaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa sahajātapaccayattābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1176_1: Uppādakkhaṇepi pana tassa indriyapaccayatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh03t:1176_5: Na hi asaññasattānaṃ indriyapaccayā uppajjamānassa rūpassa rūpajīvitindriyato añño indriyapaccayo atthi,
tika-abh03t:1176_7: Paṭiccavārādayo ca cha uppādakkhaṇameva gahetvā pavattā,
tika-abh03t:1176_8: evañca katvā pacchājātapaccayo etesu anulomato na tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-abh03t:1179_3: na kāyikasukhadukkhabhūtānīti imassa dassanatthaṃ somanassadomanassaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t:1179_4: Nanu ca “dvipañcaviññāṇavajjesū”ti vacaneneva kāyikasukhadukkhāni vajjitānīti sukhadukkhaggahaṇameva kattabbanti? Na,
tika-abh03t:1179_8: na pana yāni sukhadukkhāni jhānaṅgāni honti,
tika-abh03t:1179_9: tesaṃ jhānaṅgabhūto sukhabhāvo dukkhabhāvo ca visesito,
tika-abh03t:1179_10: tasmā somanassadomanassabhāvavisiṭṭhoyeva sukhadukkhabhāvo sukhadukkhānaṃ jhānaṅgabhāvoti dassanatthaṃ somanassadomanassaggahaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh03t:1179_11: Tena “dvipañcaviññāṇavajjesū”ti vacanena vajjiyamānānampi sukhadukkhānaṃ somanassadomanassabhāvābhāvato jhānaṅgabhāvābhāvoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1179_15: Kasmā pana na uddhaṭāti taṃ dassetuṃ “pañcannaṃ pana viññāṇakāyāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:1180_0: Abhinipātamattattāti etena āvajjanasampaṭicchanamattāyapi cintanāpavattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1180_2: Tattha upekkhāsukhadukkheheva taṃsamānalakkhaṇāya cittekaggatāyapi yathāvutteneva kāraṇena anuddhaṭabhāvo dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1180_3: Pubbe pana satta aṅgāni dassentena cattāri aṅgāni vajjitānīti tesaṃ vajjane kāraṇaṃ dassentena na samānalakkhaṇena lesena dassetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1180_7: tiṇṇaṃ pana vacanena tato aññassa jhānaṅganti uddhaṭabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:1180_10: Ye pana “jhānaṅgabhūtehi somanassādīhi sukhadukkhena avibhūtabhāvena pākaṭatāya indriyakiccayuttatāya
tika-abh03t:1180_11: ca samānānaṃ sukhādīnaṃ jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1180_12: na cittekaggatāyāti sā ettha na gahitā”ti vadanti,
tika-abh03t:1180_14: Yadi jhānaṅgasamānānaṃ jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1180_15: cittekaggatā cettha jhānaṅgabhūtāya vicikicchāyuttamanodhātuādīsu cittekaggatāya samānāti tassā anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbamevāti.
tika-abh03t:1180_16: Sesāhetukesupi jhānaṅgaṃ uddhaṭameva uddharaṇaṭṭhāne cittuppādakaṇḍeti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1183_1: Paññā vitakko sammāvācākammantājīvā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāvācākammantājīvāti imāni
tika-abh03t:1183_2: dvādasaṅgānīti ettha duvidhampi saṅkappaṃ vīriyaṃ samādhiñca vitakkavīriyasamādhivacanehi saṅgaṇhitvā
tika-abh03t:1183_7: micchāsamādhī”tiādīhi suttavacanehi micchāvācākammantājīvesupi maggaṅgavohārasiddhito tehi saha dvādasaṅgāni
tika-abh03t:1183_8: idha labbhamānāni ca alabbhamānāni ca maggaṅgavacanasāmaññena saṅgaṇhitvā vuttāni.
tika-abh03t:1183_10: evaṃ pana dassentena “maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānī”ti evaṃ uddharitvā tassa pāṭhagatassa maggaṅgasaddassa
tika-abh03t:1183_12: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ maggaṅgasaddassa micchāvācākammantājīvoti attho vattabbo.
tika-abh03t:1183_13: Tehi sammāvācādīhi paṭipakkhā cetanādhammā tappaṭipakkhabhāvatoyeva “micchāmaggaṅgānī”ti sutte vuttāni,
tika-abh03t:1183_15: Maggaṅgāni maggapaccayabhūtāni ca idha pāḷiyaṃ “maggaṅgānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-abh03t:1183_16: na ca aññaṃ uddharitvā aññassa attho vattabbo.
tika-abh03t:1183_17: Pariyāyanippariyāyamaggaṅgadassanatthaṃ pana icchantena pāḷigatamaggaṅgasaddapatirūpako añño maggaṅgasaddo
tika-abh03t:1183_18: ubhayapadattho uddharitabbo yathā “adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti.
tika-abh03t:1183_19: Idha pana “maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānī”ti pāḷigatoyeva maggaṅgasaddo uddhaṭo,
tika-abh03t:1183_20: na ca atthuddharaṇavasena dassetvā adhippetatthaniyamanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:1183_21: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ maggaṅgasaddassa micchāvācādīnaṃ atthabhāvo mā hotūti “sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappavācākammantājīvavāyāmasatisamādhimicchādiṭṭhisaṅkappavāyāmasamādhayoti
tika-abh03t:1183_24: Na hi tesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo yathāvuttā santi,
tika-abh03t:1186_1: Sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvatoti etena sampayogāsaṅkāvatthubhūto upakārakabhāvo vippayuttapaccayatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1189_3: Yo hi atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārako atthibhāvaṃ labhitvā upakārako hoti,
tika-abh03t:1189_5: Nibbānañca nibbānārammaṇānaṃ na attano atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakaṃ hutvā atthibhāvalābhena upakārakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1189_6: Uppādādiyuttānaṃ vā natthibhāvopakārakatāviruddho upakārakabhāvo atthipaccayatāti na nibbānaṃ atthipaccayo.
tika-abh03t:1190_1: tehi ekato puretaraṃ pacchā ca uppannatte sahajātādipaccayattābhāvato āha “āhāro indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-abh03t:1193_1: Paccayalakkhaṇameva hettha nānanti etena natthivigatapaccayesu atthiavigatapaccayesu ca byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1193_2: na attheti idaṃ yo paccayoti attho,
tika-abh03t:1193_4: byañjanasaṅgahite paccayalakkhaṇamatteyeva nānattanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-abh03t:1197_1: sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā hontī”tiādimapāṭho.
tika-abh03t:1197_2: Ettha ca lobhadosamohānaṃ paccekaṃ sattarasahi paccayehi paccayabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh03t:1197_3: sabbe hetū saha aggahetvā ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ amohādīnaṃ visuṃ gahitattāti dosassapi sattarasahi paccayabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh03t:1197_4: tathā ca sati dosassapi garukaraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t:1197_5: “Akusalo pana ārammaṇādhipati nāma lobhasahagatacittuppādo vuccatī”ti etthāpi lobhadosasahagatacittuppādāti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t:1197_9: atha kho saṅgahito purejātādīhi yathāvuttehi sesattāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ dosaṃ lobhamohehi saha aggahetvā
tika-abh03t:1197_11: sesānaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hotī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1197_14: Na hi etaṃ ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvadassananti rūpādīnaṃ pakatūpanissayabhāvo ca etena dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1198_0: Catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ bhedā cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayoti bhedaṃ anāmasitvā te eva gahetvā āha “catūsu khandhesū”ti.
tika-abh03t:1198_1: Micchāvācākammantājīvā tehi ceva kammāhārapaccayehi cāti ekūnavīsatidhāti idamevaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:1198_2: Na hi micchāvācādayo micchādiṭṭhi viya maggapaccayā honti cetanāya maggapaccayattābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:1198_7: Sesapaccayabhāvo ca cetanāya anekapaccayabhāvavacanena vuttoyevāti na idaṃ paṭhitabbanti na paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1198_10: vicikicchā pana adhipatipaccayo na hotīti taṃ tattha apaṭhitvā “vicikicchāissāmacchariyakukkuccāni tato
tika-abh03t:1199_3: mahābhūtāni pana vippayuttapaccayā na hontīti “purejātaatthiavigatavasena navadhā paccayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1199_5: Ettakamevettha apubbanti etasmiṃ purejātapaccaye sahajātanissayehi apubbaṃ rūpasaddagandharasāyatanamattamevāti attho,
tika-abh03t:1199_6: ārammaṇāni panetāni ārammaṇapaccayadhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāve vuttānīti sabbātikkantapaccayāpekkhā etesaṃ apubbatā natthīti.
tika-abh03t:1199_7: Indriyādīsu apubbaṃ natthīti rūpajīvitindriyassapi arūpajīvitindriyato apubbassa paccayabhāvassa abhāvaṃ maññamānena apubbatā na vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1199_9: Kabaḷīkārāhārassa ca purejātena saddhiṃ sattadhā paccayabhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t:1200_3: Vipākahetūsuyeva labbhatīti ettha amohavipākahetussa adhipatipaccayabhāvo ca lokuttaravipākeyeva labbhatīti.
tika-abh03t:1200_8: na ca yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissayo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1201_11: Tattha ārammaṇapurejātanti yadi kañci ārammaṇabhūtaṃ purejātaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1201_12: ārammaṇabhūtassa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayatā labbhatīti sā na labbhatīti na vattabbā.
tika-abh03t:1201_13: Atha pana vatthupurejātato aññaṃ vatthubhāvarahitārammaṇameva “ārammaṇapurejāta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1201_14: tassa nissayapaccayatā na labbhatīti “nissayindriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhatī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1201_16: ito vā indriyavippayuttato nissayindriyavippayuttato vā uttari ārammaṇādhipatiādi ca labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ veditabbanti attho vattabbo.
tika-abh03t:1201_17: Kammādīsu pana labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ na vakkhatīti purimoyevettha attho adhippeto.
tika-abh03t:1202_2: tena “kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantova atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1203_0: “Yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hetuadhipatīnañcāti imesaṃ vasenā”ti purimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t:1203_1: “yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ maggavajjānaṃ navannaṃ hetuadhipatijhānānañcāti imesaṃ vasenā”ti pacchimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t:1204_0: Samanantaraniruddhatāya ārammaṇabhāvena ca sadiso paccayabhāvo paccayasabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t:1204_2: “Iminā upāyenā”ti vacanato hetuādīnaṃ sahajātānaṃ sahajātabhāvena sabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t:1204_3: sahajātāsahajātānaṃ hetuārammaṇādīnaṃ aññamaññavisabhāgatāti evamādinā upāyena sabhāgatā visabhāgatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t:1205_1: na ajanakāti janakabhāvappadhānāyeva hutvā paccayā honti,
tika-abh03t:1205_5: na ca pavattantīti tesaṃ ubhayappadhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t:1205_6: Na hi te anantarādayo viya jananeneva pavattiṃ karontīti.
tika-abh03t:1206_5: ārammaṇānantarūpanissayānaṃ pana pubbe ārammaṇādhipatianantaraggahaṇehi gahitattā tesu ekadesena anantarūpanissayena itarampi dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1206_6: Purejātapacchājātāpi asabbaṭṭhānikā arūparūpānaññeva yathākkamena paccayabhāvatoti ettha purejātapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1206_8: na ca yugaḷabhāvo pacchājātena saha kathane kāraṇaṃ asabbaṭṭhānikadassanamattassa adhippetattāti taṃ
tika-abh03t:1206_9: tattha paṭhitvā “pacchājātopi asabbaṭṭhāniko rūpānaṃyeva paccayabhāvato”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1210_0: Ekekaṃ tikadukanti ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukañcāti attho, na tikadukanti.
tika-abh03t:1211_0: Paccayā cevāti ye kusalādidhamme paṭiccāti vuttā,
tika-abh03t:1211_1: te paṭiccatthaṃ pharantā kusalādipaccayā cevāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1211_5: Ettha paṭiccasahajātavārehi samānatthehi paṭiccasahajātābhidhānehi samānatthaṃ bodhentena bhagavatā pacchimavārena purimavāro,
tika-abh03t:1211_6: purimavārena ca pacchimavāro ca bodhitoti veditabbo.
